John then dropped the cloud and advanced Dana to the proper age. The 18 year old waif that had stepped on the stage was now a 28 year old, 6 foot 4 inch tall muscle-goddess. Her forearms alone were bigger than Regina's biceps. She got up off the bench and had to bend over slightly to see Regina over her almost beach-ball sized tits.

“Oh hello! Do you still want to do this? I can understand if you want to back out.”

“WHAT THE HOLY FUCK???? Where is that skinny girl who was on the stage? Where's Dana?”

“I'm Dana. But I haven't been skinny since I entered middle school.”

“Well John. Let's get going.”

“No way!! I want that skinny girl back! That woman, if that IS a woman, looks like she eats steroids!!”

“Fine...You want me to prove my identity? Johnny, go in my beachbag and get my wallet.”

John opened the bag and retrieve the wallet, with Dana's driver's license, her old college student ID and her IFBB pro-bodybuilder card. It was then that everyone realised who she was. She had appeared on the scene almost a year ago and upset the whole bodybuilding community. From the day she won everyone was scrambling to find out more information abou her. All they knew was her name and that John was her trainer and fiance.

“Well listen you two. If we're not going to have this lift-off, give Johnny and I our prize money so we can go home. It's too hot to be standing around in the sun all day.”

“Fine!! I don't know how you did it, but I'll find out one day...”

Regina had the workers pile the bar with 350 lbs. Intending to establish her dominance right from the beginning. She'd only attempted this lift once before and she was screaming in pain afterwards. But she was determined not to lose today. She lifted the bar off the rack and grunted her way through 5 reps, needing a spotter on the last two.

“What you got bitch??”

Dana smiled at her.

“Double it...”

“Oh no!! Not this shit again!!! You all are not gonna pull this same scam twice in one day!!”

“Jake. If you are so concerned about some trick being pulled. YOU put the weights on yourself. That way you can be certain of what was on there.”

“Fine....”

Jake loaded the bar, verifying that it was exactly 700 lbs of weight on the bar.

“Now. Let's see you move that!!”

Dana walked behind the bar.

“What? You don't believe that the weight is right?”

“I believe it's right. But I never told you I was BENCH-PRESSING the weight!!”

Dana grabbed the bar and began doing biceps curls with it to the crowd's count.

“17,18,19,20!!”

The crowd cheered wildly as Dana flexed her now 26 ½ inch biceps. John walked over to the throughly defeated Jake.

“I'll be taking my $10,000.00 now.”

Jake got out his check-book and made it out him.

“Thank you very much. Pleasure doing business with you. Come on Dana.”

"What's your name?" Jake asked the timid looking woman.

Immediately, he converted her muffin top into a toned six pack. He crafted her legs to be chiseled. Her arms were bulked up to be slightly bigger than Regina's. Her butt was tightened up to be highly muscular. Her breasts inflated four cup sizes. 11232.content:
John was walking along the beach as the sun started to go down. He felt great, being God and walking around with his omnipotence. But, he wanted to help more people and make a difference in someone’s life. So, he wished to be somewhere where he would meet someone whom he could help. He disappeared and teleported to the complete opposite side of the beach, where there was a long, wooden pier. A teenage boy was sitting at the end of the pier, with his legs hanging from the side of the pier, holding a fishing rod.

John carefully walked down to the pier and sat down next to the boy. The young lad had brown hair and bright blue eyes. He looked about sixteen years old. Thanks to John’s omnipotence, John figured out that the boy was an orphan and his name was Oliver. He was only fifteen years old. His real, biological parents had given him up for adoption because they couldn’t afford to raise him after he was born. So, Oliver was being raised by his aunt.

“Hey…” John said to the teen.

“Hi…” the boy said back.

“Are they biting?” John asked him.

“No… Not really. I haven’t caught a single thing all afternoon…” the kid grumbled.

John waved his hand, and suddenly, the boy felt something pull on his line. I stood up and began to reel in his line. There was a small fish hanging from the hook at the end of the line!

Oliver quickly pulled the fish off the hook and then he tossed the struggling little fish back in the water!

“What did you do that for?” John asked him. “You caught something and you threw it back!”

“Oh I wasn’t planning on keeping it!” Oliver laughed. “I just wanted to catch something for fun!”

John stood up and shook the boy’s hand.

“My name is John…”

“Hi. I’m Oliver, but everybody calls me Ollie!” the boy said quietly.

“So, do you live around here? Do you fish a lot?” John asked him.

“Yeah…” Oliver said, with a sad expression on his face. “Thanks for sitting with me. I usually have to do this all alone.”

“Why? Don’t you have a father?”

“No… I’m adopted. I live with my aunt. I’m all alone. I don’t have a father…”

John felt really sad. Oliver seemed like such a nice kid.

The two started walking along the beach. John wished for Oliver to trust him completely. No sooner had he made his wish or Oliver showed him his house where his old aunt lived. The old woman was almost 80 years old.

“I think I can help you, Oliver…” John said to the boy.

“How’s that?”
11232.title: a lost or lonely teenage boy on the beach

choices: Oliver grows a few inches taller when he becomes God.

112322.content:
Oliver looked up at John with curious eyes. What was he talking about?

"From now on, Oliver, you will be my teenage son." John said to the boy.

For a brief moment, the boy was confused. Then John just waved his hand, and everything was alright. Of course Oliver was his son and John was his father. This was normal now. Reality had changed.

"Sure, dad!" Oliver smiled. "You have always been my dad!"

John wrapped his arms around the boy and gently hugged him. He knew that the boy had never been hugged by his father before but from now on, this would be a regular thing.

"I love you, Oliver!" John said quietly.

"I love you too, dad!" The boy responded. "I will always love you."

"Good. How about we head on home for dinner?" John suggested.

"Ah dad, could we go for some pizza tonight?" Oliver asked.

John just smiled as he looked the boy in his deep, blue eyes.

"Sure!"

Then, John just snapped his fingers and instantly both John and Oliver were teleported to the front door of the nearest pizza restaurant!

"Holy cow!" Oliver gasped quietly. "Dad! How... How did you do that? One minute we're on the beach and the next minute were at a pizza place! What the heck?"

John decided to save time and just make Oliver understand that he's God without having to explain everything about the formula and his abilities. So he waved his hand and Oliver just knew everything.

"Oh... You... You're God? That... You mean... You can do anything?" Oliver asked his new father.

"Yes, that is correct, my son" John responded.

"Gosh that must be so cool.... I wish I had your powers..." Oliver sighed as the two sat down at a table with a box of pizza. "Then I could help lots of people!"

"Well, I'm preparing you for that, my son..." John replied quietly.

Oliver took a bite out of his slice of pepperoni pizza when he looked at his father.

"What do you mean?"

"I want you to become God really soon.... So just be ready!"John smiled.

"What? Me? Really?" Oliver wondered. "When are you going to make me God?"

John just stared at the boy with a smile.

"As soon as I make sure you are ready in your heart to receive your training!" He replied. "I want to train you and show you what you can do with your powers!"

"Oh...." Oliver said, when he saw an old man walking outside. He looked like a beggar. He was thin and he could barely walk.

"Do the right thing, my son...." John said.

Oliver took a napkin and wrapped a slice of pizza in it. Then he got up, walked outside with the pizza slice, and offered it to the beggar. The poor, old man happily accepted the slice of pizza from the boy. When Oliver returned, John was very pleased.

"I think you are ready to receive your powers, Oliver..." John said.

Oliver looked up at John with a huge grin.

"You're going to give me your powers? Are you serious? No joke?" The boy asked him.

John stood before his son and placed his divine hand on his son's chest.

"Your compassion and your honesty together with your innocence make you a great candidate. You just need to understand what it means to be omnipotent." John spoke.

"What is omi... Inpot... Omnipot...." Oliver stuttered.

"Omnipotent.... That is the same as almighty. It means you would become all-powerful. So nothing or nobody could stop you or hurt you." John explained. John then waves his hand to make sure that Oliver could say the word from now on.

"Oh... But I could still help others, right?" The teen asked.

John grinned. It was time to execute the transfer of power to the boy.

"Oh, yes... You could do anything... Nothing in the whole universe could stop you!"

"Ohh that is so cool!" Oliver exclaimed.

Then John snapped his finger and teleported him and his son back to the house.

1123222.content:
That week, John decided to give Oliver some more responsibilities and to see him carry them out. He gave him more chores to do and he watched as Oliver completed them. John just imagined how fun it would be to see Oliver complete his chores using his powers.

Oliver now had to clean the garage every week, take out the trash, sweep and mop the floors, clean out the aquarium every week, clean the bathroom, wash the dishes every evening, and more. But he did everything without complaining.

Finally, when Saturday rolled around, John and Oliver went to the beach. John snapped his fingers and Oliver was instantly wearing his sandals and swimming trunks.

“Hey! Are we going swimming?” the boy asked his Godly father.

“Yes! I have a surprise for you!” John said.

John snapped his finger, teleporting him and his son to the beach.

Once they arrived, John walked up to his son and placed his hands on the boy’s shoulders.

“I have seen you work and I know all your thoughts and emotions. You’re honest and caring and compassionate. From now on, you will receive all my Godly powers and you will become completely omnipotent, which you will remain for the rest of your life!” John said to the boy.

Then, John’s hands glowed as his powers transferred into Oliver!

Oliver felt his younger, shorter body filling up with incredible power! In fact, he was overflowing with power! He felt his body suddenly experience an amazing growth spurt, due to the fantastic powers that were filling him up! His body was just too small to contain all of it!

Then, on cue, Oliver’s arms and legs started to grow longer and thicker! His torso grew longer and wider as well. The boy was growing in every direction, practically adding another three feet to his frame until he ended up a giant!

“Uhhhh….” Oliver groaned for a moment, until he opened his eyes and looked down. He was now standing almost 9 feet tall, towering over John by 3 feet.

“Uh… Dad? DAD! What the heck? You shrunk!” Oliver gasped, looking down at his shorter father.

John stared at amazement at the giant godly boy. His legs were long and thick, his torso was lean and long and his arms were very long. His hands and feet were huge.

“Wow, Oliver! No, I didn’t shrink! The God-powers just have a different effect on you! They made you grow! You’re just really BIG now!” John explained. “I’m totally back to normal now, so you have all the powers!”

“Ahh… Yes! I feel different! I feel so… awake! I feel so… alive! I have so much energy! I’m so strong!” Oliver grinned.

“Yes! But you’ve become so BIG!” John grinned, looking up to his giant son. “You don’t fit in the house anymore… Not like that!”

“Oh! Well, I’ll try to shrink back to my old size…” the young God said.

Oliver closed his eyes and craned his neck back a little. He let out a slight moan before John witnessed the giant boy slowly dwindle back to his smaller size. However, something else about him changed while he shrunk. As the giant boy shrunk, his muscles increased! His chest pushed outwards and his biceps bulged into big round bowling balls. His stomach now sported thick abdominal muscles and his legs gained thick layers of quads and calves covered with veins.

When Oliver finally shrunk back to his original height, his body gained a significant amount of muscle, making the boy look like a young gymnast or junior bodybuilder.

Oliver slowly glanced around the old, familiar beach. This was the same beach where he had met John the first time a week earlier. He had become John’s son and now he was God!

“Thanks, dad! This is awesome!” Oliver said, as he walked up to John and embraced his father.

“Thanks, Oliie… Uhhh…” John groaned as he felt Oliver’s grip for the first time since the boy gained his powers.

“What? What’s the matter?” Oliver wondered, detecting a slight sense of pain in John’s voice.

“You… You’re so strong… You’re crushing me…” John moaned.

“Oh! Sorry dad!” Oliver said as he quickly let go of his father. “I don’t know my own strength!”

“Remember now, Ollie… Not only do you have big muscles, which made you stronger, you also have your additional strength just because you’re God…” John explained calmly.

“Right, it means that I’m VERY strong right now!” the boy replied. “Right?”

“Yes! You practically got unlimited strength now. So, how about we go for a swim?” John said, grinning as he looked down at the divine muscle boy.

Oliver and John then walked up to the shore. They walked into the water and waded for a few minutes, until Oliver dove in and splashed around. John started swimming as well, and the two of them swam laps for a few minutes.

When they came out of the water, John noted that he forgot to bring the bath towels.

Oliver then snapped his fingers, making two large towels appear out of nowhere. He handed one to John and he used one to dry off himself. When they had all dried off, it was now Oliver’s turn to teleport them home.

“Do you think you can teleport us home?” John asked Ollie. “Just think of our house and wish for us to be home!”

Before John could say anything else he found himself standing in the living room of his own house!

“I think I’m getting the hang of my powers now!” Oliver grinned.

“Very good, Ollie! You’re learning it very fast!” John grinned. “Training you is going to be easy. Tomorrow you get to do your chores!”

“Can I use my powers when I do my chores?” Oliver asked him.

“Of course! You don’t even have to ask that!” John replied.

“Ohh good because I need to wash the dishes tonight…” Oliver replied as he walking over to the kitchen sink where a pile of dirty dishes were waiting for him. He just waved his hand and all the dishes were cleaned, rinsed off, dried and put away in an instant!

“There! All done!” Oliver laughed. “That was easy!”

John saw how Oliver had become very good at using his powers and he wondered how Oliver would continue in his journey of becoming God…

1152.content:
The town has been in a slump for years, business' going under, or moving out. Maybe you should help the local community? You don't know what you can and can't do with this, but your development focused on mental control. You should just be able to think it to do it... hopefully.

You sit at your kitchen table and look at the bowl of fruit. It's a little past it's sell by date now, the bananas brownish, the apples a little mushy, and the less said about the peaches the better! Gazing intently at the bowl you try to think how they used to be. It seems more of a struggle than you thought, but you feel something....

Suddenly the stains of age and decay fade, the fruit in the bowl swelling and getting smoother till they all look fresh picked! Grinning you reach down and pick an apple and take a bite. Delicious! It works! It really works!

So, what to do now? Since you know you can affect produce perhaps you could help the farms in the vicinity to improve, getting better yields and more quality produce?

Or, maybe you could instead try something a bit more abstract? You could put an aura of interest on the town, making new businesses want to come here, new people want to move here and people to generally be more at home, comfortable and happy here. That should improve things.

One other choice would be the people themselves. Perhaps you could change the town's populace to be better? Healthier, happier, more skilled.
1152.title: Municipal development.

choices: Try a little change, just of Alison, and from here on, not changing her past.
You're too tired, just rest for now.
11523.content:
You reach out, feeling for minds nearby and gradually get a feel for dozens, hundreds, thousands and eventually tens of thousands of people, all nearby. It's hard to hold on to that many in your head, them feeling like points of light (can points of light be 'felt'? Apparently so), but you struggle and maintain it. Slowly, with them all in your attention, you try to emphasize better qualities.

They should look on the bright side more, take a better view of the world and the people in it. Be more forgiving, be friendly and helpful and generally more fun to be around.

You take a breath, sweat breaking out on your forehead. This is HARD!

They should be physically better, less illness and less prone to illness. Be generally healthier, stronger, fitter and quicker. They should generally look nicer, less skin trouble, fewer people with poor vision, less hunched backs and bandy legs, people living longer and better lives.

Now your sweating buckets! Your clothes are soaked! Gotta keep going.

They should be more skilled... *ungh!* better at... doing... *gasp* doing their jobs. Smarter, *Pant* better memory... and.... and....

*THUMP*



Later you dizzily wake to find someone standing over you, kneeling beside you.

"Are you OK?"

The woman is maybe forty years old... except as soon as you look at her you KNOW she is in her late fifties! Ooh! Headache!

You groan and slowly sit up with her help. She's surprisingly strong!

"Er, yeah. Just fainted I guess."

"Working out too much? You really should get a leotard or something for that. Shirt and jeans is no getup to get out with. Heh!"

You chuckle at her joke too, and then feel your clothes sticking to you. Yeah, you could use a change.

She helps you stand, and unbidden her name springs to your mind. Alison Susan Brewer. You must have somehow taken a snapshot of everyone's minds that you improved... or at least some basic knowledge of them. Wait, you're in your kitchen!

"How... how did you find me?" you gasp as you lean on her.

"Hmm? Oh, I noticed you from the sidewalk when I jogged by. Lucky I did or you may have laid there all day! Sorry about the lock, I'll pay for that to get fixed."

You glance over at your screen door, where the lock is ripped from the wall. Whoah, she's strong! Maybe you over did that a tad? But, the sidewalk is a long way off... Oh, vision has improved too hasn't it! She must have seen you collapsed on the floor from... what, seventy yards away? Through a window with the sun reflecting off it? Wow.

"I appreciate the help. I think I'll be OK, but can I get to a chair?"

"Sure. Gotta help out the new comers. Town motto! You should know that. Though how you got past the cordons I don't know!"

OK, what was that about? You do feel tired, but maybe you can use your powers just a little to find out what is going on?

You just slide carefully into Alison's head, not to read her mind but to know what she knows about the town... and almost pass out again!

"Oh, you sure you're gonna be OK?" She says as you waver.

"Yeah, yeah." You mutter as you grasp what you found in Alison's head.

Seems the changes you made had to be matched to reality somehow and they were... weirdly! The locals have ALWAYS been like this, but for some reason birthrates in the town are low for newcomers. Lots of people want to come here, in the hopes that their children will be supermen and superwomen (those terms are really used!), but seldom does that happen. No-one knows why it's the case, but the town borders are well defined, an odd, irregular line around the town. Inside, the locals are happier, healthier and better. Outside they are normal. It only affects those BORN here, but there has just been a police incident with some sort of fake bomb threat, and the usual practise was to get all the non-locals out of town... they are more delicate after all.

That's how your powers justified that everyone nearby be better, and still not mess up society in general. Weird!

It seems few of the locals want to leave, but a small number do, often going into police or military (men and women). There are ALWAYS headhunters trying to drag locals away to jobs out of town, but they rarely succeed.

What on Earth do you do now? That wasn't exactly what you meant... but it seems to have worked, sort of.

Tyler closed his eyes and silently stated some commands. All of Ryder’s clothes grew into big tank tops and Lycra shorts with large shoes that fit his big feet. His clothes would always fit him from now on. In an instant, Ryder was wearing black Lycra shorts and a blue tank top with blue high tops. He looked like a big wrestler.

“Come on, big guy, let’s go!” Ty said after he opened his eyes. Ryder noticed that he was suddenly dressed in nice clothes that fit him perfectly. So, the muscle boy just shrugged and followed Ty outside.

When the two boys passed one of the next houses down the street from Ryder’s house, they spotted two men unloading a moving van. They had used a lift to lower a large box out of the back of the truck and they now had to carry the box into the house. The two guys attempted to lift the box together but they couldn’t do it.

“Ohh man, this thing is over 80 pounds for sure…” one man said.

“Come on, Ben, we gotta get this thing inside…” the other man said.

Ty saw what was going on and he nudged Ryder to offer the guys his assistance.

“Hey! Go help them out!” Ty whispered to him.

“Me? I can’t lift that! It looks too heavy!” Ryder replied.

“Just try it!” Ty assured him.

Ryder then sighed as he walked over to the two men.

“Uhh… Do you guys need some help with that?” Ryder asked them.

The two men looked on at the young muscle teen standing before them.

“Well, kid… You look pretty buff, but this is a very heavy box… But sure, knock yourself out!” one of the men said.

As the man complimented Ryder, he felt a slight tingling and his biceps inflated a little more.

Ryder walked up to the box and casually lifted it up and off the ground with great ease. In fact, he held the box in the air with just one hand!

“Ohh… This isn’t that heavy at all!” Ryder grinned.

The two men just gasped at the sight of the kid lifting the heavy, 80-pound box before their very eyes!

“Dang! This kid is STRONG!” Ben gasped.

Ryder couldn’t believe this. The box felt like it weighed NOTHING as he held it in his hand.

“Uhh… Where am I supposed to put this?” he asked them.

“Here, follow us!” the men said as they led the boy through the front door where Ryder set the box down in the living room. Once he was done, Ryder came back outside, followed by the two men.

“Thanks, kid! You’re incredibly strong for your age!” Ben said.

“You got a lot of muscle on ya!” Jack added. “We couldn’t lift that box together and you lifted it all by yourself!”

“Uhh… I’m kinda strong… I guess…” Ryder said shyly as he began to blush.

“Say WHAT? You’re stronger than the two of us PUT TOGETHER!” Ben shouted.

Ryder was then overcome by that tingling sensation! His pectorals inflated some more and his biceps grew in his arms while his torso expanded and became wider… All at the same time!

“I could have sworn I just saw the kid’s muscles grow…” Ben mumbled.

“Uhhh… I gotta go…. Nice meeting you guys…” Ryder said as he and Tyler continued their walk down the street…

Tyler decided to go to the shopping mall nearby, but why do it by walking when you can just teleport.

In a matter of seconds he was at the entrance to the mall.
He heard thoughts of every single person, some were less appropriate then others.

The moment he walked past a sports shop Tyler heard a guy say:

The guy was looking at bodybuilding magazines and his name was Tony, he was 16 and even though he was tall he also was very skinny.

"I see you're checking the magazines." Ty pointed out

"Of course not! Even though I know everything" replied Tyler

After about 5 minutes Tony finished his story.

"...and that's why I want to get muscular." finished Tony

"You're going to. You'll grow however big you want just imagine it..."

And so Tyler prepared to start his work.
First he froze time so no one will see how Tony grows, even Tony.
Then he took Tony's clothes off and the growth began starting from Tony's chest and arms.

Tony's pecs began to grow outwards and sideways broadening his shoulders in the process, the two pecs now were like two giant watermelons under his skin.

Bellow them, the flat stomach developed 8-pack of deep abs that were hard as steel.

Returning to Tony's now thick arms that developed two biceps that were now for sure size of a basketball if not bigger, actually it looked like his biceps had biceps.

Tony's legs had trouble holding his huge upper body until they grew to become two pillars made out of solid muscle.

Ty was surprised that this guy didn't need a bigger bulge, since his brother had a small one before the young God grew it.

"And now to the clothes" said Tyler giving Tony a T-shirt and a pair of jeans that weren't too tight "Screw the shirt. With a body like this he doesn't need one." and so Tyler removed the T-shirt.

At this very moment time continued flowing again.

"Whoa! I'm huge! Now I'll show Trent who's the boss!" Tony realized his change really fast and flexed his arms in disbelief "Thank you Ty, or should I say thank you the Demigod Tyler!"

"No problem big guy! Go get 'em!"

And so Tony went outside the store. All girls looked at him and pointed out his massive bare chest and a lot of guys showed a ton of envy.

"So who should I do next?"

123221.content:
Tyler was feeling on top of the world! He was feeling awesome! No wonder. He was literally the most powerful kid on earth. In fact, he had a young God! He had the power to do whatever he wanted, just by thinking of it. This was awesome!

He had just buffed up a kid named Tony in the sports store and it was easy! All he had to do was give the order and the kid’s muscles just grew! This was majestic!

Tyler decided to just stick around the mall a little longer since it was the weekend and the mall was very crowded with people all over the place. So, he just thought about being in the food court and presto, he disappeared and popped up in the middle of the food court, which was located in the very center of the sprawling shopping mall. He had just teleported by willing himself over there!

“Ahh… This is so awesome! I can just teleport and be anywhere I want to in a split-second!” he grinned as he looked around. He spotted a burger place and stood in line. When his turn came, he ordered a burger and fries and paid with money which he made magically appear in his pocket of his shorts.

When he sat down he spotted a short, chubby boy who was sitting all by himself at a table in the corner. Using his omniscience, he knew that the boy’s name was Brian and that he was also 13 years old. Ty ordered Brian to walk over to his table and to join him.

Brian suddenly got up and walked over to Ty’s table and sat down opposite him.

“Hi… How are you?” Brian asked him.

“Hey there, Brian! Glad you could join me!” Ty grinned.

“How… How did you know my name?” the boy asked him. “And, what’s your name?”

“I’m Tyler. I just saw that you were sitting there all by yourself so I figured you wanted someone to talk to…” Ty replied.

“Uhh… Yeah… I’m waiting for my mom… She’s talking to a dietitian in the health food store…” Brian sighed, looking down at his belly. Brian was chubby and he had some fat on his arms and on his legs.

“You’re kinda ashamed of yourself, huh?” Ty said.

“Uhh, yeah… How did you know?” Brian asked him.

“You’ve been depressed since your parents got divorced last year…” Ty said casually while taking a bite out of his burger.

“WAIT! How… How do you know all that?” Brian said, feeling a bit annoyed.

“I know everything.” Ty replied.

“How come? You’re freaking me out! Who are you?” Brian said angrily.

“Chill out, Brian.” Ty continued calmly. “Your parents got divorced last year so it’s only normal for you to feel depressed. Now, we still need to fix your weight problem but I think I can help you with that…”

“What? How? WHO ARE YOU?” Brian shouted this time.

Then Brian got up and turned around and started to walk away.

“Stop right there.” Ty ordered.

Brian stopped walking on a dime.

“Come back and sit down.”

Brian felt compelled to walk back and sit down at the table opposite Ty.

“How… How did you do that? I can’t leave… You made me come back… Who… Who are you?” Brian asked, feeling a bit scared this time.

“I’m here to help you, Brian.” Ty said calmly. “I’m God”.

Brian sat there and stared at Ty for a whole minute with his jaw wide open.

“You’re also getting hungry, huh?” Ty finally said.

Brian just nodded.

Ty snapped his fingers and a tray with a hamburger and fries appeared on the table in front of Brian, identical to what Ty had been eating.

“Enjoy it, my friend!” Ty smiled. “My treat!”

Brian started to pour some ketchup onto the tray and he started to dip his fries into the red sauce before he chewed on them. With every bit, he somehow felt his muscles expand and his fat melt away.

Once Brian had finished all his fries, all his fat had melted away and he was now looking skinny!

Brian actually paused and looked over at his arms and his chest when Ty took note.

“Do you like how you look so far?”

“Uhh… yeah… I never heard of fast food making you lose weight!” Brian grinned.

“That only happens when you have lunch with God!” Ty laughed. “So, eat your burger, dude!”

Brian picked up his hamburger and took a big bite out of it. As he chewed and swallowed his food, he felt his biceps and pectorals inflate. With every bite of the burger, his muscles grew and became bigger and bigger! Once he had finished eating his entire hamburger, he had transformed into a young junior bodybuilder!

“Wow! Look at this!” Brian laughed as he flexed his arm and admired his bulging bicep as he held up his fist.

“Now, that’s more like it, big guy!” Ty grinned. “I like how you look. Why don’t you get up and stand in front of the table for me?”

Brian stood up and stood before Ty, showing off his muscles. Brian now sported thick quads and large, round calves. His pecs were bulging orbs of muscle and his abs were like a washboard on his torso.

“You’re looking awesome, Brian! No more mister fat guy!” Ty smiled as he got up and stood in front of him. “You’re all buff now! You don’t need any diet pills!”

Ty snapped his fingers and Brian’s mother came out of the store and she met Brian. Then, they turned around and walked away. Ty was happy that he was able to help another young man using his awesome God-powers in the mall!

What does Ty do next?
