12422.content:
"John, this is my cousin Sean."

John looked the boy over from head to toe. The two of them had driven over to Sean's house, some fifteen minutes south of campus, and were now standing on the front porch and talking to each other. Just like his friend, this young teen was Japanese in origin, though unlike his friend he had been born after the family had moved to the US. He appeared fairly short for his age, not even 4' 10", and had a slender build; he could probably pass for eleven or twelve, though his longer, shaggy hair made him look a little older. He had a nice smile, though, and his friend spoke very highly of him.

"Nice to meet you, sir," the boy said, sticking his hand out and shaking it with John.

Well mannered too, John thought. "Likewise, Sean. And you don't have to call me 'sir', you can call me 'John'."

"Okay... John." He seemed a little uncomfortable calling this stranger by his first name, but got over it quickly.

John smiled, motioning at his friend beside him. "Your cousin has vouched for you, saying that you've been a real hard worker, both in school and with basketball. Is that right."

Sean nodded. "Yes sir. I've gotten straight A's so far, all the way since Kindergarten. And, well... Not to brag, but I'm really good at basketball. I know I am. It's just..."

"Yes?" John could tell that there was more to the story than just this.

"Well," Sean said, trying to find the right words, "it's just that I'm so short. I've always been a little short for my age, but in the past couple of years, most of the other boys have started to get their growth spurts and I haven't. I can still dribble and shoot better than any of them, but Coach keeps saying I may not have the physical stature for this game. Last year, I got bumped from the starting rotation to the bench, and, with tryouts tomorrow, I'm worried that I might not even make the team this year."

Nodding, John placed his hand on the boy's shoulder. "Hmmm, I think your cousin was right when he said that you were the best person to give my formula to."

Sean scrunched up his nose in confusion. "Formula?"

"Yes." John fished out the small plastic vial from his bag full of the orange liquid, handing it to the curious boy. "I know it sounds far-fetched, but if you drink that, it will give you the powers of a god."

As he took the vial in hand and examined it, Sean's eyes widened. "A god?"

John found himself getting more excited as he talked. "You'll be able to do anything you want to, Sean. I'm sure that, with this, you'll be able to find some way to make sure that you get on the team this year."

"Wow." Sean stared at the vial for several moments, sloshing the liquid back in forth inside it, but then his smile started to fade. "But, I can't take this. I'm sorry."

"What?" John blinked, not expecting his offer to be rejected. "Why not?"

Reaching his hand behind his neck, Sean sighed, looking up at John with conflict evident in his eyes. "I've worked so hard to get where I am, you know? I don't want to take something that suddenly makes everything instantly effortless. It feels too much like cheating."

Considering this for a moment, John finally started to nod. "I think I understand what you're saying, Sean. But what if you only make changes to yourself when you have to, and focus on using your powers to help others? That's not cheating, is it?"

"Hmm, well..." Sean looked back and forth between the vial and John's face, trying to make up his mind. "I guess not. And I suppose that I've proven to myself that I have the self-discipline to use these powers responsibly. Right?"

John smiled in relief. "That's the spirit. And that's a very mature thing to say, Sean. Are you sure you're only thirteen?"

Sean chuckled. "I'm pretty sure, sir-- I mean, John. Though, I suppose, if I wanted to, I could change that, after I've taken this formula."

"You could do that," John said, laughing. "Though I'd suggest you avoid doing that, at least for a while. Your teenage years can be some of the most amazing years of your life, you know, as long as you're not constantly looking past them to the future. Enjoy what you have now, Sean. That's my two cents, anyways."

"Sounds like good advice." Sean grinned, unscrewing the top off of the vial and bringing it up to his nose. "Hmm, that smells more fruity than I expected." Hesitating for just a split-second, he finally brought the vial to his lips, drinking the formula down in one gulp. It tingled his throat as it went down, a tingle that slowly started to spread throughout his entire body. It wasn't an entirely unpleasant sensation, though it sure was a little weird. "I-is that it?"

"That's it, Sean." John said as he took the vial back from the boy. "You now have the powers of a god. I know you'll use them responsibly. And if you ever have any questions about it for me, or just want to chat, you can always give me a call. My number is 850--"

"--555-3312." Sean finished for him.

"Of course!" John grinned sheepishly. "You know that now, I suppose. Of course, since you're a god, you could always just teleport me to you, or you to me, or communicate telepathically, or-- Well, I guess you get the idea."

Sean nodded, shifting his weight from foot to foot. "Thanks so much, John." Still feeling a little nervous, he nevertheless summoned up the courage to lean in and give John a big embrace. Though he had just met the man, he had given him such an amazing gift that he knew he would never forget him.

"You're welcome, Sean. I'll talk to you later!"

"Bye!" And with that, his cousin and John walked down the porch steps back to their car, leaving the teen to discover and experiment with his powers as he saw fit.
12422.title: Sean's Reward

choices: ...for you to see how tall you can make me
...for you to see how big you can make my manhood
124221.content:
Sean's head was overrun with thoughts and feelings. He instantly knew he had all of these amazing powers and knowledge, and his brain and body seemed to be able to easily figure out how to use them, but with so many options before him, he couldn't quite figure out what to do first. After collecting his thoughts, Sean realized that he couldn't handle this alone (or rather, he could, but he didn't want to). He needed the help of his best friend, Evan.

Evan and Sean had known each other since before either of them could remember; as two of the only Asian-American families in their neighborhood, their parents set up playdates for them as toddlers (even though Evan was nine months older than Sean), hoping that they would become friends for life. Surprisingly, it worked; the two had continued to stay close as they grew up, and now there was nobody in the world that Sean was closer to than the fourteen-year-old Korean boy. Sure, their paths had diverged somewhat over the last few months. Evan had started high school back at the beginning of the school year, and had started to go through a bit of a rebellious phase, dressing more esoterically, hanging out with a different group of friends, and staying away from home when at all possible, and his grades had started to suffer as a result. Yet, the one thing that didn't change was his loyalty to Sean, and the relationship between the two had never been closer.

They were so close, in fact, that Sean was the only person whom Evan had confided his biggest secret in: the fact that he was pretty sure he was gay. This had initially come as a fairly large surprise to Sean, but after the shock had died down, Sean realized that the one thing he felt more than anything else about this was jealousy. Sean himself had yet to feel any sort of strong sexual attraction to anyone, guys or girls, and he was starting to wonder if he might be asexual. Then again, he knew he still had plenty of time to figure that out. And, in the mean time, he would make sure that Evan knew that his friend was there to support and encourage him through whatever he went through.

And, in a similar manner, Sean knew that he couldn't try any of his new powers out without Evan there to support him and experience it with him. So he started to pull out his phone, but as he did so, he realized it was unnecessary. If he wanted to, he could teleport Evan there, or speak directly into his mind even. However, without knowing the backstory first and what was going on, Evan might start freaking out (as any reasonable person would), so Sean decided to go through with the phone call, waiting to speak to his friend face-to-face before explaining anything about the formula. Evan quickly agreed to come on over, and twenty minutes later, he was riding up the sidewalk on his skateboard, skidding to a stop in front of him. "Hey, Sean, how's it hanging?" He leaned in, and the two embraced tightly, Sean standing up on his tiptoes, trying to get as close as possible to the eye level of his significantly taller friend.

Sean grinned, always a little embarrassed and unsure with just how to answer that question, but never more so than today. "It's... well, I don't quite know how to explain what's happened to me in the last half hour or so, Evan, but... let's just say it's huge. A big freakin' deal."

Evan's eyes lit up. Sean wasn't the type for hyperbole, so if he said something was a huge deal, well... it certainly was worth paying attention to. "Oh really? Well, don't keep me in suspense! Spill it!"

"Okay, well..." Sean took a deep breath. "Long story short, a friend of my cousin's came over and gave me a formula that he said would give me the powers of a god. And... I think it did. But I wanted to wait till you were here to test it out and make sure."

Sean looked into Evan's eyes, bracing himself for the laughter and disbelief that assuredly was coming. However, Evan instead simply crossed his arms, whistling. "Wow... well, Sean, if that's true, then life has just gotten a whole lot more interesting for us now, hasn't it?"

"Heheh, yeah, I guess it has." Sean was a little puzzled by Evan's use of 'us', but he realized that if anyone would benefit from the power Sean had now, Evan would almost certainly be among them. "I guess I'm just not sure how to start. You know, what I should do to test them out and stuff."

Evan rubbed his chin with his hand, thinking for a moment. "I suppose you could start huge and try to blow up the planet and then put it back together or something like that..." He stopped for a moment, seeing the cringe on Sean's face. "But something tells me that's not really your style. Why don't you do something small to start out?"

"Like what?"

"How about this?" Evan pulled out his phone from his pocket, pointing at a large crack that ran diagonally across the display.

The younger teen let out a small gasp when he saw the crack. "When did that happen?"

"Last Tuesday, when I bailed pretty hard off the steps out in front of the downtown library." He smacked one hand into another as if to illustrate his collision. "Landed right on top of the pocket that my phone was in. Also had a pretty sick bruise on my thigh for a day or two."

"Geez, Evan," Sean said, shaking his head. "You've got to be more careful."

"Yeah, yeah, I know." Grinning, he gave Sean a soft punch in the arm. "But anyways, why don't you see if you can fix it? It'll be a simple test of your powers, and it'll also save me about ninety bucks."

Rolling his eyes, Sean chuckled. "Okay. But I'm not going to suddenly be your go-to phone repairman from here on out, understand? Now gimme just a second..." He focused on the phone, unsure of what to do at this point, so he just pictured the crack on the phone disappearing. As he did so, he saw the glass start to fusing together, the display healing itself and, within a second or two, back to being as good as new.

"Awesome!" Evan exclaimed running his fingers along the surface of the glass. "It's like the crack was never there!"

Sean let out his breath in a long, satisfying exhale. "I did it. The formula works," he said, more in relief than in amazement.

"Then we can have all sorts of fun!" Evan's grin grew wider as he stuffed his phone back into his pocket. "In fact, if you want to test out your powers even further, I've got another idea of what you should change."

"What's that?"

"Me!"

His eyes bulging, Sean's jaw dropped open a little. "You? What do you have about you that you could possibly want to change?"

"Well, what I was thinking is..."
124221.title: Can't Do This Alone

choices: Sean grows to slightly shorter than Evan
Sean grows to 6'6", then he grows Evan some more
1242211.content:
“Well, what I was thinking is…” Evan said, “… for you to see how tall you can make me.”

“Sure! I want us to be in my room now!” Sean ordered.

Instantly, there was a flash of light, the two boys disappeared from the front patio of the house, and they both popped up standing in the center of Sean’s bedroom.

“Hey, it worked! I did it!” Sean grinned, looking around and recognizing his own bedroom.

“Holy smoke! You teleported us!” the taller Evan exclaimed. “That was freaking amazing! Man, you weren’t kidding about those powers of yours!”

“Nope!” Sean laughed, as he started to get a lot more comfortable using his God-powers. “I’m getting the hang of this.” Sean folded his arms as a show of confidence. He began to realize that he was practically in control of… everything, everyone, everywhere, anywhere!

“Sean! You… You’ve become… Omnipotent or something!” Evan reasoned.

“You got it, my friend! I want you to know exactly what I’m capable of!” Sean smiled.

Evan blinked for a moment as he began to understand just who his best friend had become.

“Ohhh… My… God…” Evan said softly as he covered his mouth with his hands. “You… You’re God! For real”

Evan took a step back and placed his right knee in front of him, bowing his head.

“It’s okay, Evan… “Sean said calmly. “You don’t have to bow before me, dude. We’re friends!”

Evan stood up again, feeling awkward about looking down on his friend Sean, who was clearly so much more powerful than he was. Sean quickly picked up on his emotions, but decided to put him at ease.

“Hey, don’t worry about being taller than me, Evan! In fact, I want that. I’m gonna make you even taller than you are NOW!” Sean grinned.

In an instant, Evan shirt, shorts, socks and running shoes disappeared, leaving him standing before Sean wearing only his underwear.

“Whoa! What… My clothes!”

“Don’t worry… You’ll have them back… I’ll make them even cooler than they were. But first, I want to fix you up!” Sean explained.

Evan was suddenly overcome by an odd pins-and-needles sensation, which ran all over his body! He was having a tremendous growth spurt, especially in his legs and arms! He suddenly realized that everything around him was getting smaller as his legs and arms were growing longer!

“Hey! Wowww!” Evan gasped, as he quickly stretched the astounding height of 6-foot-6-inches in a matter of seconds.

“There! That is a good height for you!” Sean stated. At that very moment, Evan stopped growing.

“Now, let’s put some really cool basketball clothes on you!” Sean chuckled, clearly enjoying the changes he was making to his pal.

In a split second, a very nice pair of black Nike Air Jordan high tops appeared on Evan’s feet, along with really nice black shorts and a cool red-and-black Chicago Bulls NBA jersey on his larger torso. His arms bulged considerably, showing off his larger biceps, plus he sported more defined pectorals and thicker calves on his legs, not to mention his ripped six-pack abdominal muscles.

“Holy smoke! I look like I just spent a year in the gym!” Evan shouted, when he saw his reflection in the giant mirror which appeared on Sean’s bedroom wall. “I’m all big and buff and TALL!”

Sean walked up to him and craned his neck.

“Much better now, huh?”

Evan agreed, however, he couldn’t help but feel a little awkward about being over a foot-and-a-half taller than his Japanese friend, who was responsible for the miraculous growth spurt in the first place.

“Yeah, but… When are YOU gonna do something about YOUR height and muscles, Sean? After all… You need to get on the basketball team, dude!” Evan responded. “You need to grow yourself, next!”

Sean turned around and examined himself in his new, giant mirror. He had to think about how he was going to alter his own physique. He liked the idea of Evan still being the bigger of the two. He realized that he could make himself taller and then he could always grow Evan even taller than him again later.

“Let me see… How big do I want to make myself?” Sean wondered out loud…
1242211.title: ...for you to see how tall you can make me

choices: Sean and Evan make changes to their friends at school
Sean and Evan muscle up some boys
Sean helps out his buddies at school
12422112.content:
Sean looked up at Evan and he realized that his buddy was right. All his life he had hated the fact that he was too short to play basketball and he got benched for being the little guy. Now that he had gained these cool god-powers, the best thing he could do for himself was to make himself taller.

So, Sean concentrated and closed his eyes, imagining himself growing to a big, tall, hulking 6-foot-4-inch-tall Japanese basketball star. Then, it also happened the way he imagined it, since all his wishes and desires come true from now on. He was overcome by the intense feelings of pins-and-needles all over his body, as his short frame expanded in every direction! His arms stretched out, his legs grew longer and thicker, and his torso became thicker, deeper and wider… all at once! Muscles expanded tremendously and within moments, Sean was a big, towering athlete!

“YEAH! Now, that’s more like it! You’re almost as tall as me, now!” Evan grinned. “Just a few inches to go, big guy!”

Sean just folded his big arms as he looked on at Evan.

“Not so fast, big guy! I don’t want you to be so close to my height!” the young god noted.

“Oh well…” Evan grinned. “You can shrink me, then!”

“Or… I can make you even taller!” Sean grinned.

With that said, Evan suddenly had ANOTHER growth spurt, growing to a staggering 7-feet-tall!

“WHOA!” Evan gasped when the growth spurt ended. “I’m really, REALLY big now!”

“Perfect! That’s how I want it! I want you to be the big man!” Sean grinned. And that’s how it was to be. The divine youth had spoken.

So, what do they do next?
12422112.title: Sean grows to 6'6", then he grows Evan ...

choices: Miguel buffs up other guys on the soccer team
Miguel helps another boy at the gym
Miguel helps a classmate at school
Miguel helps his father Eddie or his uncle John
12423.content:
You park the car at the entrance to the large gym where you were supposed to meet your cousin Eddie. He’s just like you in his 30’s with a good job, wife and a kid. In fact, the wife got sick just a few years ago and passed away unexpectedly. So, you were hoping that your latest project would help your cousin out.

“Hey, Eddie…” you say to him as you both walk into then large gym. “How’s your kid doing?”

“Miguel is doing alright! There he is, on the weight bench by the wall! In front of the dumbbell rack!” Eddie says, pointing at a short kid wearing a tank top and shorts while lifting a barbell with weights. “He’s been lifting now for two months and he loves it!”

“Great! I like it! A kid with dedication and discipline!” you reply.

“Yes, he stays busy with the gym, with school and with the soccer team, of course…” Eddie adds.

“Does he do anything else outside of school, the gym and soccer?” you ask him.

“Well… There isn’t much time for much else due to studies and homework… But he helps at the church on weekends. They collect canned food and they give it to poor families…” he responds.

“Good! So, he also does some community service?”

“Yes! He helps coach a few boys in soccer before and after his own practice session at the park where the soccer fields are. That’s just down the street from here. But, overall, Miguel is a good kid.” Eddie smiles.

“Good! I think he can be a guinea pig for my formula, Eddie!” you say to him.

“Oh, yeah? What are you working on?”

“Eddie…” you say quietly as you lean closer to him. “I developed a serum which will make any person omnipotent!”

Eddie stared at you with his jaw wide open.

“Does it work on anyone?”

“No. Only on young people below a certain age. He can’t be older than eighteen. He needs to be a good physical condition in order to drink it!”

“Well, he plays soccer and he lifts weights!” Eddie responded. “He’s a great shape!”

“Great! I’ll meet you and Miguel at the house when he’s done with his workout, okay?” you suggest.

You get in the car and you drive to Eddie’s house, which is only a block away from the gym. You grab the plastic container containing the orange liquid and you walk up to the front door just when the SUV pulls up and parks in front of you.

“Hi, Uncle John!” the boy smiles as he walks up to you.

“Hey, Miguelito! You’re getting big!” you say, giving the kid a big hug.

“Show him what you got!” Eddie says as you walk into the house and you sit down on the couch with Miguel sitting next to you.

“Miguel, do you see this container? The serum in here is something I created! Okay?” you tell the boy.

“Oh, okay!” he nods.

“If you drink all of this, it will make you omnipotent!”

“Uhh… What does that mean?” Miguel asked you.

“You will have Godly powers!” you answer.

“Wow!”

“Do you want to try it?” you ask the boy.

“Sure!”

Miguel unscrewed the cap from the container, and he started to drink the liquid. It only took him a minute to drink every drop of the serum which was in the container. When he was done, he set the empty container down on the coffee table.

“Thanks, Uncle John! That tasted like Orange Juice!” the boy smiled.

Eddie then turned to you.

“Did it work?”

“So, Miguel, is there anything you always wanted to have here at the house?” you ask the boy.

Miguel stood up and walked over to the back yard. The small patio only had room for a trampoline and a few potted plants.

“Yeah, I always wanted a hot tub in our back yard!” the young God said.

Then, like magic, a bright flash of light illuminated the yard, blinding everyone. Once the light faded, there was a nice, round hot tub installed in the corner of the back yard, filled with water and with lights on the inside. A Tiled path led from the patio to the hot tub.

“Whoohoo! Nice!” Miguel cheered. “My wishes come true!”

“Unbelievable!” Eddie gasped. “You did it!”

“There ya go, Eddie! Miguel has the powers of a God!” you explain to Eddie as he watched Miguel get in the tub. “Keep me posted on his new adventures, okay?”

Eddie was smiling as he looked on, wondering what Miguel would do the next day at school, during soccer and at the gym…
12423.title: A 13-year-old boy on the weightlifting team

choices: An 8-year-old boy
A 10-year-old boy
A 12-year-old boy
A 14-year-old boy
1243.content:
Your best friend takes your container and goes into one of the bedrooms where he ends up giving it to his son.

The boy gives a curious look, but after a short explanation, he drinks all the God Formula in one big gulp.

Both you and your friend smile as you witness the boy as he becomes a young God!

How old is the young God? He is...
1243.title: He will give it to another younger relative of ...

choices: Michael turns you and Kevin into kids as well
Michael visits his best friend from school who is a nerd
12431.content:
You drove up to your best friend's house. His name was Kevin, and he had a son named Michael. Everyone named him Mikey or just Mike. Kevin worked as a bookkeeper at a large firm so he wasn't home much. Mike was just starting the second grade in elementary school and he was having a hard time fitting in because the boy was rather shy and quiet but still very smart.

You walk up to the door and ring the doorbell and wait as Kevin opens the door. Kevin smiles as he opens and lets you in. He's always been happy to see you especially since his wife died of cancer a year before. Kevin has had a struggle raising Mikey on his own because of his work but he has managed somehow but you have jumped in and taken Mikey to the movies or to the toy store on an occasion. You love Mikey like your own kid, even though Mikey suffers from asthma and a mild case of epilepsy. Kevin has to constantly take Mikey to the doctors because of this so you hope that your formula will cure all of the boy's illnesses in one shot.

You sit down on the couch and you show Kevin the container with the God-formula.

"Is this it? Is this the formula which you have been working on for the last three years?" he asks you.

"Yes! Now, if we give this to Michael, it will cure him of his asthma and his epilepsy!" you tell him.

Kevin shakes the container.

"Wow, John...You won't know how much this means to me... If this really works..." he replies.

"It will make your son omnipotent...He will become extremely strong and powerful... He will never be sick or hurt again! he will live forever!" you explain.

"John... I'm very grateful.... I don't know what to say..." Kevin smiles.

He stands up as he slowly walks to the bedroom down the hall. You get up and follow him.

Both of you walk into a bedroom at the end of the hall.

A young boy, eight-years-old, is sitting at his desk, doing his homework. He has brown hair and brown eyes.

"Hey, sport!" you say to the boy. He looks up to you and smiles.

"Hi, Mr. James!"

Michael jumps of the chair and walks up to you. He gives you a firm hug.

"Hey there, champ! I brought you something that will make you feel better..." you say to him as you show him the container. "Here, drink all of this!"

You and Kevin stand back as Michael holds the container and sniffs the orange liquid from the cap.

"What is it?" he asks.

"It will make you feel great!" you reply. "It will make you stronger!"

"Ohh..."

He looks at Kevin, who nods.

"Go ahead and drink it, son. Have you taken a puff from your inhaler?"

"Yeah!"

"Go ahead! Drink it!"

Michael tilts his head back a bit as he slowly gulps down your formula. You see the quantity of your formula in the container decrease as the young boy drinks from it, slowly transforming into a young God.

After a few moments, Michael has consumed every drop of your formula.

"Ahhh... That was delicious!" he says as he hands you your container, which is completely empty. "That was good timing since I was really thirsty from doing all my homework!"

"Wow! School just started and you got homework already?" you ask him.

"Yeah... I got three assignments!" Michael replied. "I had math, English, and... Uhh..."

Michael just stood there for a moment, when he froze.

"Michael?" I asked him.

He closed his eyes and moaned for a moment. I figured the God-powers were about to kick in.

Then, his entire body was suddenly surrounded by a bright, blue glow! It was amazing! It was like he had become an angel!

Michael suddenly started to levitate in mid-air as his entire body started to rise up off the ground!

"Ohmygosh!" Kevin gasped. "What the heck is happening?"

"His God-powers are kicking in!" I said to him. "Don't touch him! He's gonna be alright!"

Michael's body rose up to almost five feet above the ground! The blue glow around his body was very bright for a few moments!

Michael cringed for a moment until he opened his eyes again.

"Michael? Are you alright? Son? SON?" Kevin asked in a panic.

"I feel great, dad..." Michael replied calmly, with his voice seeming to come from all corners of the room."I've never felt better!"

"What... What's going on?" Kevin asked me. "What did you do to him?"

You turned to face Kevin as Michael slowly descended back to the floor in all his wonderful divine glory.

"Your son is now... God!"
12431.title: An 8-year-old boy

choices: A bully came to pick on Kevin during recess
One of the geeky students stole Michael's video game from his backpack
124311.content:
Kevin stares at you with complete disbelief.Then he looks at Michael, his son. There is still that amazing, bright, blue glow that completely surrounds his body all over, including his arms and legs.

"This is awesome!" Michael grins. "I... I've never felt this good in my life!"

Then the boy stares at you and at Kevin.

"You know what would be cool?" Michael says, with his voice coming from all corners of the room, like it is being broadcast in stereo sound. "If both of you were kids and you were the same age as me!"

You feel a powerful tingling spread all over your body! Then it hits you: The young God had spoken! he had expressed his wish and that must be obeyed! Michael is eight years old and he wanted you and Kevin to be the same age! Before you realize it, you begin to regress! The same happens to Kevin!

You look over to Kevin and gasp as Kevin loses all his fat and muscle! His height shrinks away, but so does his big belly. His big, long arms shrink down and his thick legs dwindle down to the legs of a young boy. His face becomes smooth and young-looking. His hair grows longer on top of his head while he loses all his hair on his arms and legs. He shrinks down until he is about four-foot-six inches tall! His clothes adjust so he's wearing shorts, a t-shirt and those Croc sandals on his feet! When you look down at your own self, you look no different from Kevin! You have become the same age as him! You're an inch shorter than Kevin!

"Hey!" you say in a squeaky voice, sounding like a total kid now, "I'm a little kid!"

"Whoa! I'm young again!" Kevin gasps.

"You two are now my best buds!" Michael smiles.

Indeed, you feel like Michael is your best friend, just like he said.

Then Michael turned around, and his small TV screen turned into a giant 64-inch plasma TV, hanging from the wall. Another screen appeared next to it, and he had two Xbox machines in his room with all the latest games. He also had a Playstation and a Wii.

"You guys want to play some video games?" Michael asked his new friends.

Just like typical 8-year-old boys loved to do, you, Kevin and Michael decided to play some games for a few hours. Afterwards, Michael made two large pizzas appear out-of-nowhere.

The three of you spent the night in his new, enlarged bedroom until the following day, when all three of you returned to school where you magically found yourselves taking the same classes with him in the second grade. Nobody saw anything unusual about you and Kevin being new students at the elementary school.

Things went pretty well until...
124311.title: Michael turns you and Kevin into kids as well

choices: Michael plays Cody during his soccer practice like a real video game!
John and Kevin get to try out the Cody Controller during soccer practice
1243112.content:
Michael brough several of his games in his backpack to school with him the following day, and kept them in his backpack until recess. He pulled them out and showed them to some of his friends in the cafeteria, but some of the other kids took note, including Cody, one of the more geeky kids in school. Cody was really shy and timid, but he was a big video game geek and pretty much one of the biggest nerds in the second grade.

Cody sat near the back of the classroom and he usually kept to himself, but he was still very smart and he was an ace in math and science. He was pretty cool with Michael although he didn't talk much. He was usually just thinking about video games and he couldn't wait to get out of class so he could get home and play his favorite video games once he got home. So, he was really interested in seeing Michael's games but he couldn't get close enough to the table where Michael was sitting so he could get a close look at all his games.

Once recess was over, the students all made a line outside of their classroom and waited for the teacher to allow them to enter the classroom. They all set their backpacks on the floor once they arrived at their seats and Michael sat down and realized that a few of his games were missing from his bag. When he looked up, he saw that Cody was sitting right next to him, and he was admiring a few of his games at his own desk, including his car racing game and his soccer game.

"Dude! You got the Evolution Pro 2014 Soccer game already?" Cody whispered to him. "Man! That game just came out like a few weeks ago!"

"Hey man! Don't be looking at my games in class! I don't want to get in trouble! I'll let you look at my games after class, okay?" Michael whispered back to Cody as he snatched the games away from him and put them back into his backpack.

"Awww dude... I love soccer games... I wish I could play soccer in real life as good as I play them in the video game..." Cody sighed.

Cody was a short kid with blond hair and blue eyes and he was skinny as well, but he was always friendly although he seemed shy and timid at times. But the remarks he made game Michael an idea.

"Wait... I got an idea... Meet me after class!" he said to Cody.

About an hour-and-a-half later, when the sixth period was over, the boys walked outside.

"So... Tell me about this idea of yours?" Cody asked him.

"I got a great idea!" Michael smiled.

"Oh yeah?"

"You play soccer, right?"

"Yeah! I have to play at six tonight!" Cody replied. "At the field located at Tom Brown Park! Why?"

"Dude! I can make you play soccer like a pro!" Michael grinned.

"How will you do that?" Cody wondered.

"I'm gonna make you play like a champ... I'll show you!" Michael said, as he started walking towards his house. "Come to me house!"

In an instant, both Cody and Michael were standing in Michael's bedroom!

"Hey! How did I get in your room so fast?" Cody gasped out loud.

"I teleported us, Cody! That way we wouldn't waste time!" michael explained as he got an old Xbox controller out of his desk drawer.

"What? But... But... How...?" Cody wondered. "And... What are you doing with that old game controller?"

"From now on, this is becoming the Cody Controller!" Michael explained, as he closed his eyes and concentrated on the controller. Several new buttons magically appeared on the face of the controller, which was gray-colored and had handles on both sides along with numerous fire buttons and a joystick near the thumb. It also had a button which was a slider on the left side as well.

"What... How did you do that?" Cody asked him. "And... What does it do?"

"The Insert and Extract buttons will allow whoever is using the controller to insert you into any digital video game as a game character, and they can remove you and put you back into real life by pressing the Extract button. Also, the Jump button makes you jump. They can also press the Kick, Throw, and Run buttons." Michael explained.

"Holy smoke! Do they work?" Cody asked.

"Yes... Of course! But YOU can't use it because you can't control yourself! Only other people can use it!" Michael grinned.

"I don't get it..." Cody frowned. "What are you talking about? What game can you play with this?"

"Dude! YOU are the video game!" Michael said, as he pressed the Jump button. This caused Cody to hop five inches in the air and then land back on his feet again!

"Hey! What... What the heck??" Cody gasped. "You made me hop!"

Michael pressed the button three times in a row.

Cody hopped straight into the air... three times ina row... landing on the balls on his feet before his calves flexed and launched his body straight up into the air again! This happened three times in a row!

"Holy... Cow!...Mike!" Cody shouted after his third jump.

"There! Works like a charm! Now... I'm gonna make you play soccer tonight... You'll be my soccer game... for REAL!" Michael smiled. "Tomorrow we'll take you to the mall where we'll have fun with you at the video arcade!"

"Wow...." Cody gasped.

"You'll be the character of any video game we put you in!" Michael explained.

Cody couldn't wait till soccer practice....
1243112.title: One of the geeky students stole Michael's v...

choices: John uses the Cody-controller to make Cody wear various sports gear
Kevin goes to the video arcade and inserts Cody into a video game
12431122.content:
Since Cody and Michael played on the same soccer team, John and Kevin walked up the bleachers and took their seats on the highest row, overlooking the soccer field from the best angle. Since they were sitting so high up, they were able to see the entire soccer pitch, from goal to goal.

"I can see the entire pitch from here!" Kevin said. "Give me the Cody-controller! Quick!"

Kevin took the odd-shaped game-controller in his hand and flipped the power-switch to the ON position, which caused a small, red light to turn on as well.

"Time to make our friend shine on the soccer field!" Kevin grinned, as he looked down over the field as he scanned the field for Cody.

Once he spotted his friend, he moved the joystick forward by tapping it with his thumb. A yellow light flashed next to the red light. This was the "Send Command" indicator for Cody.

In the meantime, Cody's legs suddenly started to move forward, causing the boy to run towards the goal before him.

"Hey! What's happening?" Cody wondered, realizing that one of the boys was using the controller on him.

"Dude! This is even better than playing a real video game!" Kevin cheered.

The ref blew the whistle and the game started. One of his teammates kicked the ball, and another boy passed it. Finally, the ball rolled towards Cody.

"Time for action!" Kevin grinned, as he bit his lip.

Kevin used the fire buttons and the joystick in combination with the slider to make Cody run faster, or to move him in different directions. Cody started to kick the ball forward by dribbling the ball towards the goal before passing it to an open teammate. Then, Kevin made Cody run right in front of the goal. The other teammate passed the ball back to him, and Kevin pressed the right buttons, making Cody kick the ball HARD... and straight into the goal! He scored!

GOAL!

Everybody cheered as Cody ran back towards his own goal as all his teammates congratulated him. It was his very first goal in the season!

"Whoohoo! Good job, Cody!" John cheered out loud.

"Wow... I have no idea how I did that!" Cody chuckled to himself, realizing that it was probably one of his friends who helped him play so well using his controller.

Michael ran towards him and gave him a high-five.

"Good deal, dude! Keep this up and we'll win!" Michael smiled.

"Uhh... Thanks!" Cody laughed.

They played the rest of the game and won. Cody had one more assist and the team won the game 3 to 1.

Afterwards, Michael decided to take the guys to the mall for some fun with Cody...
12431122.title: John and Kevin get to try out the Cody Controll...

choices: John makes Cody play in a sports game
John makes Cody play in a shooting game
124311222.content:
About an hour after the soccer practice match had ended and the boys had showered and changed, they walked over to teh shopping mall, which was just down the street from the soccer field. There, they entered the video arcade area, where dozens of arcade game machines were set up for the kids to play.

Luckily, these games only cost a quarter each to play, and Michael quietly wished for several Dollars' worth of quarters in his pocket, so there was plenty for everyone. Michael gave everyone a few quarters and the boys wandered around, looking for a game to play.

John spotted a Ninja-fighting game called Ninja Warrior. Cody joined him and the two boys played a round of the game using their quarters.

"Man! I want to try this game and play in it!" Cody said.

"Okay! Let's try that!" John said, as he took the Cody-controller and aimed at the game machine and pressed the "Insert" button.

Suddenly, Cody disappeared from where he was standing, and he appeared, in digital form, on the game screen, completely dressed as a Ninja Warrior himself!

"Hey!" Cody said, with his voice coming from the video game machine. "I'm a Ninja!"

Cody's face looked the same but he had the body of a big, muscular man with long black hair, tied together in a ponytail. He was wearing long white robes and he was able to jump, leap high and throw magical weapons.

"Okay... let's FIGHT!" the game said as an opponent appeared.

John used to Cody-controller to make Cody fight another Ninja Warrior. It was cool hearing Cody's voice as he grunted and groaned while he kicked and punched at the other Ninja. Cody got hit a few times, but John was able to make him fight very well.

During the second round, a more powerful opponent actually beat Cody and knocked him out. But John had a "restore" button, which gave Cody another life. This made Cody come back for another fight. That way, Cody would never die in a game.

After the game was over, John pressed the "Export" button, and Cody appeared standing in the arcade again, wearing his normal clothes.

"That was freaking awesome!!!" Cody cheered. "That was great, being in a video game!!!!"

Michael just smiled as John and Cody looked around for another game to try...
124311222.title: Kevin goes to the video arcade and inserts Cody...

choices: John finally picks a sport and lets Cody play something on TV
John decides to make Cody play in a video game instead
1243112221.content:
John and Michael just stared at Coddy before looking at the video game controller.

"We can have evern MORE fun with Cody!" Michael grinned, as he waved his hand over the controller. "I just inserted programming where we can program Cody to wear uniforms for ANY sport! Look, you can scroll down a list of sports on the small digital display on the controller!"

"Really?" John said eagerly.

John then moved his thumb over the dial as it scrolled down a long, digital list on the screen.

"Just his the Jump button to select one!" Michael instructed.

John scrolled the list until it stopped on BASEBALL. Then he hit the JUMP button.

Cody leaped into the air and when he landed on the ground, in a flash of light, his entire physical being changed into that of a baseball player!! He was now wearing long white pants, cleats, the button baseball shirt with long sleeves and a glove in one hand and a baseball in the other.

"Okay... batter up! Time to play ball!" Cody said to them.

There was a TV set hanging on the wall, and it was showing a baseball game on ESPN.

"Aim the controller at the TV and press on "INSERT!" Michael said.

John did that and Cody disappeared instantly. Then, in a split second, he appeared on TV, up next to bat at an MLB game on national TV!

Cody had a hit right away and he made it to first base!

"Wow! We turned him into a baseball player!" John gasped.

"Yeah, he's playing instead of the regular MLB player. We can keep him in or take him out with the controller!" Michael grinned.

"Let's send him back here!" John said as he pressed on "EXPORT" on the controller.

Instantly, Cody appeared standing before them, wearing his baseball uniform.

"Wow, that was fun! I was on TV!"

John scrolled down the long list of sports on his controller.

"Dang! We can turn Cody into a player of any sport we want to with this! So we can send him to any game on TV or any video game?"

"Yeah!" Michael laughed.

John selected Ice Hockey from the list and Cody hopped in the air. When he came down, he was wearing ice skates, thick socks, an ice hockey jersey, and a helmet with thick leather gloves. He was holding a hockey stick in his hands.

"Time to hit the ice rink!" Cody grinned.

John then selected Swimming and pressed the Jump button.

Cody leaped in the air and landed wearing only a Speedo and goggles. He was tall, lean and muscular, like a swimmer!

"Darn, this is awesome! We can make him do anything!" John grinned.

"Time to swim laps in the pool!" Cody said.

John wondered what to do next to Cody...
1243112221.title: John makes Cody play in a sports game

choices: He begins by making his own form more 'divine' then changing some friends of his
He goes somewhere like school to change things there
He asks his father to start making him lil brothers he can bless with power too
12432.content:
After you arrive at your best friend's house, you see his son Nick, short for Nicholas, playing video games on the couch. He is in every respect a completely average, normal 10 year old boy. He's about 4'6", not particularly bright nor strong nor much of anything else. He's not popular but he's not bullied. Which really makes him the perfect subject.

You ask Nick to pause his game for a moment and explain about the formula, which rests in it's clear container, shining with an internal golden energy, "So Nick, this stuff here, will make you into God."
"Like...I'll be smarter and stronger or something?"
"In a matter of speaking. Really though, you won't just be stronger or smarter, you'll be infinitely strong and truly all-knowing. Nothing will be beyond you."
Nick seemed interested but he did not quite seem to grasp the scope and scale of what you were speaking of, "But why give this to me?"
"I wanted to give it to someone worthy, someone good, someone who wouldn't become power-made or abuse their new might. I think that person is you, Nick."

That stunned him into silence. He'd never been so well entrusted with anything before, and now here you were, with his own dad's permission even, offering him without any strings attached, the ability to become God. Eventually he just quietly nods, and holds out his hand to take the container from you, opens it up, and starts drinking it all down in big, long gulps.

"Oh man, that tasted amazing!" Nick said energetically, before suddenly freezing up.

Nick's body raised into the air as he groaned, a golden light now shining from within him, as the power of the universe began to flow into him. Knowledge, strength, the energy of countless stars and galaxies poured into his body, becoming more and more and more still. Nick was not physically changing but both you and your best friend knew that he was changing in ways mortal minds could never comprehend, only a mind like Nick's...only a mind like GOD's could truly know.

And did he know. As he came back down to the ground, he was still the average looking 10 year old he was before, but he looked at you both with knowledge in his eyes, an understanding of the universe no one had ever had except for him.

He let out a quiet breath and looked at you, "Thanks for making me God. It's all so...simple, at least to me. I know everything that has, is, will, or could ever happen. I could change anything and everything with less than a thought and make it so that to everyone it would've always been that way, or not. Nothing truly is beyond me. It's amazing, really and truly amazing, thank you again."

"Of course Nick! I knew I could trust you, I knew you were the right choice!" you say, grinning from ear to ear.
"Indeed. Well though, if I'm God, I guess I oughta go and start 'being' God now, huh? I suppose the only question left is...where to start?"
12432.title: Nick's Ascension

choices: "To the park"
"To the mall"
"To the public pool"
"To school"
"To the gym"
124321.content:
You stand in the corner of the small bedroom as Nick contemplates his next move, which is his first act as the new God.

“I want to fix up my own self first!” he says. Then, he turns towards the other side of his bedroom, which magically triples in size! Now, he suddenly has a large flat screen TV set in his room, along with a large desk and a huge 48-inch computer monitor… Two of them! He has two large laptops on his desk and his bed doubles in size. His room is suddenly enormous, with one wall having a massive mirror bolted to it, from the ceiling to the floor.

Nick positions himself before the mirror and his clothes instantly vanish, leaving him standing there wearing nothing but his underwear. He looks like a normal kid, until his muscles start to grow before your very eyes! His chest becomes bigger and his shoulders grow wider while his flat stomach suddenly gains those impressive six-pack abdominal muscles. He grows those thick, impressive traps and delts, giving him the look of a young kid bodybuilder.

“Ahh, that’s much, much better!” Nick grins as his arms and his legs follow suit, instantly bulging with solid, thick muscle all over his limbs. Nick now sports awesome biceps and triceps, and he has big, bulging calves and massive quads, that will make any wrestler or pro soccer player squirm. The kid looks incredibly jacked for a 10-year-old boy!

“Yessss!” he cheers, flexing and posing before the mirror. You can’t help but stare at the boy and feel incredibly impressed.

Finally, the young muscle kid waves his hand, and now he’s wearing Spandex shorts and a tank top. He turns towards you and grins.

“How do I look, John?”

“Uhh… Like a young bodybuilder, Nick!” you reply.

“Yeah… I wanna see what happens when I change one of my friends! Hmm…” Nick ponders for a moment. You wonder what he will do next. Suddenly, Nick turns the other way and faces the area in front of his desk. There is a large open space there. He snaps his fingers, and another boy instantly appears standing in that spot! The boy appears to be the same age as Nick, with short, straight, black hair and glasses. He looks around in confusion before he sees Nick standing before him.

“HEY! WHOA! Where am I? What the heck? Who…? NICK? Nick, is that you? What the heck happened to YOU?” the boy shouted as he slowly strolled over to the young God.

“This is my new bedroom, Percy!” Nick just smiled. “You’re my first guest!”

“But… How did it get so BIG? And… What happened to YOU? Where did all the muscles come from? And… How did I get here?”

“Wow! Dude! That’s a lot of questions! Okay, I want you to understand who I am, right now!” Nick said calmly as he folded his big, muscular arms before his chest.

Percy blinked for a moment and then his jaw dropped wide open.

“Say WHAT? You… You’re GOD? Dang, dude! That’s just… crazy!” Percy exclaimed.

“I know, right? I changed my room and I gave myself some bigger muscles! How do I look?” Nick smiled as he flexed his big arm in front of his best friend.

“Oh, man! Dude! You’re a muscle man! Nobody will bother you at school anymore! You look fantastic!” Percy responded.

“Glad you like it, Percy, because I want you to be just as big as me!” Nick answered.

“What? Say what?” Percy gasped as he began to feel an intense tingling sensation all over his body. Then, he was about to experience an amazing growth spurt, which struck every muscle, all at once!

Percy let out a loud roar as his arms, his legs, his chest and his torso all inflated with muscle, all at the same time! Within seconds, the skinny, nerdy kid morphed into a strapping muscle boy, with thick, muscular arms and legs while sporting ripped abs and bulging arms. He now had big calves and large, wide quads. Percy still looked like a nerd, but with large muscles all over his body!

“WHOOAA!! DUDE! What did you DO to me???” Percy gasped when the growth spurt ended abruptly.

“There! Now, you look like my friend! We can go out and do cool stuff!” Nick smiled, as Percy’s clothes morphed into shorts and a matching tank top, identical to the one that Nick was wearing.

“Okay, so… What are we gonna do now?” Percy asked him.

“Let’s go out and help some other kids! Let’s go…” Nick suggested….
124321.title: He begins by making his own form more 'divi...

choices: ...changed that group more.

1243211.content:
"Let's go to the park." Nick said, and with that, both boys vanished instantly, and were teleported immediately to the nearby park
"Whoa!" replied Percy.
"Percy, I told you, I'm God."
"R-Right. Just gonna take time to get used to that is all."

The two looked around. Nick of course, being God, knew everything that was going on at every point on Earth all at once, but regardless, he still asked,

"Hey, anybody you see that you think deserves some help, Percy?"

Percy stood there a few moments, crossing his far more muscular arms across an equally more muscular chest, pondering carefully. Finally he pointed at a group of six people, three older teenagers and three pre-teen boys. The three teenagers were Chad, Ian, and Greg, while the three pre-teen boys were Ryan, Caleb, and Nathan. All three teens were harassing and bullying the three pre-teens, who tried their best to fight back how they could, but they were really quite powerless on the whole, which Nick knew he would have to change so that this didn't continue on any longer.

The first change to hit from Nick's power, was that all three teens suddenly felt dizzy and woozy, as any muscles they had practically melted off of them, while all three boys starting growing. It wasn't just a little bit of muscle either, but a LOT. They were practically Hulking out, packing on muscles that equaled Nick and Percy's muscles put together each! It was really quite the sight to behold.

All three were absolute powerhouses now. They flexed up huge biceps, each one as big as their heads, with deep tricep bellies, thick forearms, and cannonball delts. Their chests and abs were less muscle and more like diamond-hard armor-plating, and their back and lats were almost 3 feet wide when flexed. Their legs were absolutely mighty, with huge thighs and calves letting them run and jump effortlessly and as much as they wanted, and so much more.

Now each teenage boy also got a special punishment from God. For Greg, he had been calling Ryan a 'shrimp', and thus for his punishment, he found himself shrinking to six inches tall, now 100% at the mercy of his also now super-buffed up younger brother. Chad had been making fun of Nathan's weight, so all of that excess fat that had been on Nathan's body now appeared on Chad's instead, plus, any excess weight Nathan might gain in the future, would always go to Chad from now on. Ian was the last, who had been calling Caleb a 'brat', so now he finds himself shrinking like Greg, but also becoming younger, until he was 2 years younger than Caleb.

For those six along with Nick and Percy, their memories and personalities had not changed, but for the rest of reality, this had always been the case. The three boys had always been huge and super-strong, and the three others had always been a child, or fat, or shrunk to a few inches tall. Meaning nobody would question anything that had transpired.

So for his next trick, Nick...
1243211.title: "To the park"

choices: Nick makes Percy grow much taller
Nick changes Percy into a muscle giant
Nick shrinks Percy down to 6 inches tall
Nick grows Percy into a 12-foot giant kid
Nick does something else to Percy
12432112.content:
Nick looked on with glee at his handiwork so far. He had improved his own body tremendously and he willed for his best buddy from school, Percy, to pop up in his bedroom, adding a hundred pounds of muscle to the nerdy boy’s frame by simply thinking it. Then, he teleported himself and Percy to the large park down the street, where he helped three boys who were being bullied by three older teens. The preteens were transformed into young bodybuilders, only by making a silent command. The three teens were reduced to a younger kid, a tiny boy and a fat boy, with minimum effort. Being God was awesome!

Nick and Percy just glanced over and witnessed how the three preteen boys, Ryan, Caleb and Nathan, were huddling together, flexing their huge muscles as they were comparing their biceps and their quads. They were laughing out loud and admiring their huge, muscled physiques. On the other hand, Greg was now a tiny, six-inch-tall kid, wandering around and staring at the giants before him. Chad, the chubby kid, was eating a cookie and Ian was now 8 years old, 2 years younger than his brother.

“Holy smoke! You completely changed those guys!” Percy remarked, especially when he spotted tiny Greg walking around at six inches in height. “Look how small he is!”

“I can shrink or grow anybody I want!” Nick stated confidently. “I can do just about anything, just by thinking it! I love my powers!”

Percy and Nick just wandered around the park, stopping occasionally to look at the kids who were walking around or who were busy with their various activities.

Nick stopped by the baseball field and saw a younger boy play catch with his older brother. The younger boy was about 6 and the older was 11 years old. The older boy was slightly annoyed that the little bro had a hard time keeping up with him. So, Nick quietly willed for the younger boy to age until he was the same age and height as his brother. Now, there were two boys, age 11, playing catch on the baseball field, and they could both easily throw and catch each other’s balls.

When they strolled by the tennis court, they spotted four girls, trying to play a doubles’ match. One of the girls was 5 years old and very short, while the three others were all about 12 years old. The poor little girl was struggling to return the balls and the other three girls were clearly irritated that they couldn’t play a fair tennis match. So, Nick quietly made the smallest girl grow to 12-years-old, and the four girls were now able to play a fun tennis match together!

Finally, they wandered past a basketball court where they found three boys playing a quick pick-up game. However, there was one boy standing in the grass near the side of the court. He looked younger and he was much shorter than the other three. Nick discovered, thanks to his powers, that the boy was the same age as the others, but he was just very short for his age.

So, Nick pointed his finger at the shorter boy, who suddenly experienced a growth spurt. The boy’s legs and arms suddenly grew, making him a foot taller within seconds! His hands and feet grew in proportion, and the little guy suddenly had the physique of a natural basketball star!

“Hey guys, wait up!” the boy shouted, as he just leaped on the court and stole the ball from one of the other players before dribbling towards the hoop and scoring his first basket. It was an awesome sight!

“Wow! Look at that kid! Look how tall he is!” Percy sighed, pointing at the tallest boy on the basketball court. “It must be so cool to be tall like that! I wish I were tall like him!”

Nick just grinned as he heard Percy state his deepest desires.

“Oh, so you wanna be a big guy, huh?” Nick chuckled. “I can arrange that!”

“What?” Percy replied. “What do you mean?”

Before Percy could react further, he was overcome by an intense tingling sensation while Nick just looked on with a wide grin on his face…

124321121.content:
"Uhn!" Percy said as the tingling became more intense, before his body began to inch taller. His muscles shifted, his frame widened, and he just grew taller, but nothing else right there on the spot. In just a few moments, he's gained 6 inches in height, then he keeps growing a few more, gaining a foot in height.
"There! That more what you were hopin for big guy?" Nick asked up at him with a wide grin.
"Absolutely! This is awesome!" Percy said, throwing his arms up in excitement.

Percy then ran off to go play basketball, having a ton of fun as he bobbed and weaved, scoring basket, the game eventually turning into 1v1 against the other tall boy that Nick had grown, and they played for nearly an hour before they had to stop and he returned, grinning again.

"This has to be the greatest day of my life!" Percy said, "I've never had so much fun before. But...I gotta go home."
"Not a problem man! See you tomorrow!" Nick replied with a smile, then waved goodbye as Percy teleported home.

From there Nick simply held out his hand and moved it from left to right, causing time to spring forward through the evening and all night, stopping at 8 am the next morning when he teleports Percy back to the park.

"It's gonna take time getting used to that, Nick...erm...Lord Nick?" Percy said.
"You can call me just Nick, don't worry."
"Alright, thanks Nick, just also gonna take time getting used to my best friend being God."

The two watched as new kids, different ones from yesterday began filtering into the park to play this morning, as it was still the weekend. In particular the two saw three people/groups that looked like they could be fun to mess with.
124321121.title: Nick makes Percy grow much taller

choices: Percy and Nick spot a classmate at the park
They spot a lonely girl at the park
The boys find a boy in a wheelchair
1243211211.content:
Percy had just been teleported back to the park when he saw Nick standing before him.

“Man, I need to get used to you teleporting me like that!” he mumbled.

“Get used to it! I’m in charge of where you’re gonna be at from now on, dude!” Nick grinned, as the two boys walked around the park.

“Oh, look over there! There’s a kid kicking a ball around, all by himself!” Percy pointed out. Indeed, there was a boy, about 7 years old, kicking a soccer ball around. He was just kicking it by himself, with nobody else around him.

“Hey! He’s twelve years-old, but he’s small for his age. His name is Jack. I bet he could use some help, since there’s a bunch of guys playing soccer on that field over there!” Percy learned quickly, thanks to his awesome omniscience. “He’s got no friends and no siblings, and the other kids don’t like him because he’s small. I can fix that! Plus, he’s wearing old clothes and shoes!”

“Oh! What are you gonna do to him?” Percy asked his divine pal.

“Bless him like crazy! Just watch!” Nick added.

Suddenly, a limousine pulled up, close to where they were, and a nice lady wearing expensive clothing walked up to the boy.

“Jack? I got you some nice clothes, my son! Here, go and change, okay?” the lady said. Jack took the clothes from the lady and he changed in the restroom. When he came out, he was no longer wearing the old shoes and worn shorts and t-shirt. Now, he was dressed with the latest and most expensive soccer cleats, the nicest soccer jersey and the coolest shorts with shin guards and athletic socks.

Another boy came out of the limo and walked towards him.

“Jack, go play with your twin brother, Jason!” the lady instructed.

The other boy was the same age and height as Jack. In fact, both Jack and Jason suddenly grew six inches taller than they were, adding over thirty pounds of solid muscle to their frames. In an instant, Jack and Jason were the biggest and the most athletic boys in the whole park.

Soon, the other boys ran up to them and invited them to join in their soccer game, all while Percy and Nick were looking on.

“Hey! You made Jack’s family rich!” Percy noted.

“Yeah! I also made them older and I gave Jack a twin brother. He will never be lonely again!” Nick smiled, as he looked around the park for other people to change…
1243211211.title: An extremely small, shy boy, playing alone.

choices: ...makes Alex even more powerful just to see how far he can take it.

12432112113.content:
Nick next saw a nine year old boy named Alex sitting in one little quiet spot off to the side watching the other children play. He knew everything about Alex's life instantly, how he'd been born unable to walk, was always sickly and weak, and barely could be outside for more than a little while. He was only at the park in order to socialize even a bit and get a little fresh air and sun.

He wouldn't let Alex suffer any longer than he had to. The first thing changed was his legs. Without a moment's hesitation Alex felt an urge to stand, and then he did! He stood, he walked around, he ran! Each moment that passed his energy grew, not faded. His body was growing bigger, and stronger. Before long he found himself floating in the air! He could fly! His muscles were large, and super-strong, he casually lifted up his mother's wheelchair accessible van with one hand, and still his power grew!

His mind was not left alone either, he had struggled with even basic comprehension in his lessons at home but now his mind was a super-genius level intellect, with knowledge pouring into his mind at incredible speeds, and he understood everything. He had the brainpower worth dozens of doctorates and degrees now rattling around in his head, and he knew he could learn so much more with such ease.

His strength had been ramping up by leaps and bounds every moment. He felt as strong as Superman...no...ten Supermen...no, a hundred Supermen! It was almost mind-blowing the level of power he had coursing through his body now, he felt like he could punch out a galaxy, or pluck the tiniest flower from the ground. It wasn't just strength though, every single superpower Superman had, his super-speed, super-strength, cold breath, heat vision, all of it.

Meanwhile Percy just watched, mouth agape, as Almighty Alex, as he was now known, flew around above the park in his superhero outfit, which his clothes had morphed into. He wasn't jealous that Alex had become so strong, just astounded someone could be made so powerful. Nick wasn't exaggerating, he really WAS God.

So next, Nick...
12432112113.title: The boys find a boy in a wheelchair

choices: Alex flies around and helps with small things around the city.
Alex helps stop crime.
Alex prevents an extinction-level event.
124321121131.content:
Nick grinned from ear to ear at the power he'd granted Alex, taking him from a poor boy in a wheelchair to one of the most powerful beings in the universe, a totally unstoppable superhero who had no weaknesses...but he still had limits. Nick wanted to make sure that those were gone now.

Just as Alex had grown used to his suddenly and newly gained power, floating a few feet in the air, his body suddenly went stiff and he groaned loudly, as his power began to multiply even more. He rapidly doubled in power in every way, then doubled again, and a third time! He'd grown eight times his own power already and still more poured into him from whatever unknown source it was coming from.

He grunted, feeling his muscles swelling, growing, becoming even stronger still, his body growing to 6 feet tall just so he could pack on far more power-filled muscles to boot. His superhero outfit changed from having an 'AA' across his chest to an 'A^3' representing how much stronger he'd become, along with his new name of 'Absolutely Almighty Alex'.

Nick however stopped there, knowing that for all his power, Alex had about reached his limit, at least not without making him into a full God like he himself was. Which, that wasn't really what Nick wanted. Instead Alex felt a need to fly down and land in front of Nick, finding himself saluting, which in this case, meant flexing up both of his massively muscular arms, showing off his huge biceps, to Nick.

Alex couldn't understand why he was doing it, but he just knew deep down he had to report to Nick...whose name he somehow knew, on any superhero goings-on he would be up to from now on.

"Hey boss," Alex said, "Nothing to report yet, but here I am."
"Yep, hey Alex. This is my friend Percy." Nick replied.
Percy didn't say anything, he was completely stunned into silence.
"Anyways, I trust you'll use your powers wisely."
"Of course boss! You know it's been my dream for years to be a superhero! I won't ever use them for my own gain, but purely for the benefit of anyone else in the world, no matter who they may be, if they're in trouble, I'll be there."
"Excellent! I know you'll do nothing but good, Alex. Alright, go ahead and get goin then."
"Right boss!" Alex saluted again by flexing his arms, then flew up and away.
124321121131.title: Absolutely Almighty Alex

choices: Nick joins Percy and Alex at a fast food place
Alex and Percy have a sleepover
Percy helps Alex solve a crime
Alex stops a bank robbery
Nick grows Alex some more
1243211211312.content:
Alex took off from the large public park and flew around town, clearly enjoying his awesome superpowers, which had been awarded him by Nick. Never in his life had he dreamed of flying around as a mighty superhero, since he had always been confined to a wheelchair.

While Alex was flying around town, he heard a police siren coming from below. Immediately, he tried to determine where the sound was coming from, and he dove down to find the patrol car. He spotted it quickly, speeding down the road and chasing another vehicle. In fact, the car was heading straight towards a busy intersection, where a boy was busy crossing the road at a red light!

Alex increased the speed and soared towards the boy, who was hobbling down the crosswalk on crutches. One of his legs was in a cast, so he was going very slowly. Unfortunately, the boy was unaware of the high-speed chase!

Alex landed right in front of the boy, and he braced himself to block the car, that was coming straight at him. His arms were extended straight in front of him as the front end of the car slammed into his hands!

BAMMM!!!!

The teenage superhero was pushed back by just a few inches as the car was stopped just inches from running over the innocent boy, who was crossing the road. Luckily, nobody got hurt, all thanks to Almighty Alex!

The driver of the car saw that he was stopped so he got out of the car and started running when he noticed three police cars approaching him from behind. Then, Alex leaped in the air and grabbed the man from behind, lifting him just slightly in the air, ending the chase.

As the officers arrived, Alex was just hovering a few feet above the ground, holding the man in his arms when the officers pointed their guns at the man.

“Okay! Hands up! NOW!” one of the officers shouted.

Alex set the man on the ground so he could get arrested by one of the officers.

In the meantime, Alex quickly turned towards the boy in the crosswalk, who was clearly in a bit of a shock.

“Hey there, buddy! Can I give you a ride to where you’re going?” Alex asked the boy, whose name was Harry.

“Sure, I’m on my way to my uncle’s house!” Harry smiled, as he passed on his uncle’s address to Alex, who was more than happy to pick him up and fly him over to his uncle’s place. Alex had a lot of compassion for people with disabilities, of course, so he wanted to do anything in order to help them.

After a short, 5-minute flight, Alex landed right in front of the house. When he set Harry down, he looked over the boy and realized that Harry’s left leg was broken.

Then, something amazing happened. Alex reached down with his hand and touched Harry’s leg. Instantly, both Harry’s legs started to bulge with muscle! His quads grew thicker and wider, practically bursting out of the cast! His calves exploded with muscle as well, as Harry now sported the legs of a marathon runner. He was suddenly able to stand, jump and walk without the need of the crutches!

“Hey! What happened? What did you do to my legs? I’m healed! I can walk again!” Harry exclaimed, as he hopped and jumped a few times.

Harry just tossed the crutches in his uncle’s garage before he thanked Alex. From there, he said goodbye before entering the house. Alex wasn’t sure what had happened, but he wondered if Nick had anything to do with it.

Once Harry was inside of the house, Alex leaped into the air and continued the patrol of the city from the skies.

After another hour, he landed back at the park where he spotted Percy, who had just come from working out at the gym. Nick was still at the gym, but he was very much aware of what was going on. Alex walked up to Percy and the two boys sat by the large water fountain. Both boys were tall and muscular, of course. And, both had their lives changed by Nick.

“Wow! It’s so cool to see you again!” Percy said to the superhero. “You look amazing!”

“Aww, thanks! I have Nick to thank for it!” Alex shrugged. “He’s awesome!”

“I can relate to that!” Percy smiled, as he flexed the bulging muscle on his arm. “I used to be a skinny, nerdy kid!”

“Not anymore! In fact, I had always wanted to have a friend like you!” Alex smiled.

“Like ME? What are you talking about? You’re a superhero! Everybody wants to have a guy like YOU as their friend!” Percy giggled.

“Yeah, but you’re tall, smart and you got muscles… I really like that about you!” Alex whispered.

“So, you wanna hang out?” Percy shrugged.

“Sure, dude! I’ll take you for a ride around town. Maybe we can grab something to eat somewhere?” Alex suggested. “Maybe you can spend the night at my place?”

Before Percy could reply, Alex leaped into the air and he swept him up from behind, carrying his new friend high into the air. The two boys just chatted and laughed as Alex flew him low over the city. Of course, Nick knew that the two boys were hanging out together and he was very pleased.
1243211211312.title: Alex helps stop crime.

Nick changes Percy's height - making him taller or shorter

124321121132.content:
Both Percy and Nick just watched in awe as Almighty Alex flew around, landing before the two boys, with his long superhero cape blowing in the wind. Somehow, Alex realized that Nick had authority and that his superpowers had come from him.

“Hey, Nick… Percy! How are you guys doing today?” the mighty teen superhero asked them. Alex was taller and far more muscular than either of them. His uniform was bright and colorful, and his body was ripped with huge muscles bulging everywhere.

“Glad to see you, Alex. We’re doing great this afternoon. Everything seems quite fine right now. If we see or hear anything, we’ll call on you. You can always hear our voices, no matter where you’re at. Thank you for protecting us and the people of our city!” Nick told him sincerely.

“Great! Thanks, you guys. I’ll catch up to you later!” Alex smiled, before he leaped into the air and flew in a wide circle overhead, always keeping an eye on the boys from the sky.

“Wow! That’s just amazing! I can’t believe it! I just saw you turn a kid in a wheelchair into a superhero! That was just incredible. Not only that, but he’s so big… and powerful! Just fantastic!” Percy exclaimed, as he watched Alex fly overhead. “Your powers are amazing!”

“Well, I’m just now getting started and I’m still learning how to use my powers, Percy! This is just the tip of the iceberg. I can do infinitely more than this! I just haven’t done anything yet because this is just my first day! I need to practice using my powers, first!” Nick chuckled. “I need people to practice on!”

“Oh? Well… Uhh… You can practice on ME!” Percy just blurted out. “I wanna feel you change me and do stuff, like make me bigger, taller, older, smaller, shorter, younger, or whatever else you’re capable of!”

“Uh… Yeah, I can do all those things! I just need to try them out!” Nick grinned. “So, do you want to help me test my powers?”

“Sure, I’ll be your test case!” Percy shrugged. “You’re my best friend. Whatever you do to me, I know you can always change me back!”

“Okay, let’s go back to my house then!” Nick suggested, before he snapped his fingers.

In an instant, both boys were standing in Nick’s bedroom.

“Now, are you ready for some changes?” Nick grinned.

“Yeah! Bring it on!” Percy smiled, standing in the middle of the room.

“Want me to change your age, your height, your gender, or your weight?” Nick asked his buddy, letting him decide the first experiment.

Percy thought for a moment before he blurted out his choice.
124321121132.title: ...decides to change Percy more.
