1243211211322.content:
"My height! Uhm...make me smaller!" Percy said quickly. At first he regretted it but he changed his mind just as fast, feeling like he could trust Nick.
"One shrinkin, coming right up...or down rather!" Nick said.

Percy immediately felt dizzy as the world began to grow around him, or rather, he shrank. Nick didn't go crazy with it, making him shrink at a slow, steady rate, getting smaller and smaller. Inch by inch vanished from his height, although he did at least keep his muscles, so that was something.

Four feet became three, three became two, two become one, and finally he stopped at 6 inches tall. Nick picked Percy up and set him on his desk, letting him look around. A part of Percy, understandably, felt fear from all of this. He did feel a kind of dread that only someone so small could feel, but he knew Nick would never let him do anything.

He called out, "Make me smaller!"

Nick heard him, and picked Percy up, going and laying on his bed as Percy felt himself getting even smaller. 6 inches became 5, then 4, then 3, then 2, then 1. Percy was placed onto one of Nick's huge pecs, but he was not done shrinking. Percy was half an inch tall, a quarter, an eighth, a sixteenth, a thirty-second, a sixty-fourth, and finally one-hundred twenty-eighth of an inch tall. He was absolutely tiny! A speck! A speck to a speck really! Looking out, Percy only saw miles and miles (at his scale anyways) of Nick's pecs! He would need to run for hours just to reach the other end of ONE pectoral muscle on Nick's body.

It was truly mind-boggling someone could be so small. Thankfully he knew Nick would never let him come to harm, so he just laid back and relaxed, closing his eyes and resting. Eventually though he opened them when he felt dizzy again, and...
1243211211322.title: Down, down, down

choices: Percy explores Nick's abs
Percy explores Nick's arms
Percy explores Nick's legs
Percy explores Nick's groin
Percy does something else
12432112113221.content:
Percy felt dizzy for a moment and he sat down on the soft, flesh-colored ground. He bowed his head as he was overcome by that tingling sensation one last time. As he opened his eyes, he saw the vast, expansive body before him expand even more so, suggesting he was shrinking thanks to Nick’s amazing divine power over him!

When the shrinking stopped, Percy took a deep breath before opening his eyes again. Percy realized that he was sitting on top of a hill, which was Nick’s right pectoral. When he stood up, he tried carefully to come down the large, steep flesh-colored hill. Everything seemed so big and wide to him, it was hard to believe that the vast landscape was nothing more than his friend Nick’s upper body!

Percy realized that he was shrunk down to an incredible size. He was small. He was very, very small. Wow, it was just mindboggling to him how small his friend Nick had made him. On the other hand, his pal Nick just seemed gigantic now. His body was the size of a small island! Percy could see the vast landscape of a rugged hills and valleys, which were giant abdominal muscles. Beyond that, way in the distance, Percy could make out the groin and from there, he saw two long peninsulas sticking out, separated by a large, deep canyon. Those were Nick’s legs!

Just as Percy made it down the steep pectoral hill, he began the march towards the abs and the legs. He had just started the long hike down Nick’s gigantic torso, when he heard a loud, thundering voice, booming from above.

“PERCY! YOU ARE WALKING ACROSS MY BODY AT A FRACTION OF AN INCH IN HEIGHT! HAVE FUN EXPLORING MY BODY! I WILL WATCH YOU AND GROW YOU BACK WHEN I DECIDE TO DO SO!” Nick bellowed out from high above him.

“Whoa! I hear ya, Nick!” Percy groaned, covering his ears due to the thundering voice. “Ughh… So loud!”

Percy didn’t mind, though. Who else would ever get the chance to explore his best friend’s body while being only a fraction of an inch in height? This is only possible when your friend is God!

So, what does Percy explore first?
12432112113221.title: ...he was shrinking more.

choices: Percy talks to Nick in his dreams
Percy wakes up and Nick visits him in his bedroom
Percy wakes up and his 8-year-old son comes in the room
Percy wakes up and he grows back to normal size again
Percy wakes up and hangs out some more in Nickville
12432112113222.content:
Percy rested for a moment on the flesh-covered ground, when he felt dizzy again. Every time he felt this, it indicated that he was shrinking. He was amazed that he could possibly become even smaller than this. He was smaller than a speck of dust. How small was Nick going to make him? But Percy wasn’t worried because he was walking around Nick’s body after all.

Percy closed his eyes again. But, this time, when he opened them, he saw that he was in a small town. He was in the middle of a small street, surrounded by small buildings on either end. There were shops and houses on both sides of the streets, along with people walking and riding bikes. He got up and walked around, it was as if he landed in a small village. However, when he looked down, he saw that the ground was still the same color as Nick’s pectoral. It was as if Percy had shrunk and ended up in some super tiny civilization which Nick had created. This village was built on one of Nick’s pectorals! It seemed as if Nick had become a giant planet, and these people were the inhabitants!

Percy entered a small coffee shop where he sat down at a table. A friendly lady walked up to his table and asked him what he wanted to drink. So, he asked for a cup of coffee and a bagel, since he was quite hungry. She returned a few minutes later, and the food was delicious. As Percy looked at the menu and the signs everywhere, he spotted the same name all over the place: “Nickville”.

“So, this is Nickville?” he asked the waitress.

“Yes! Gosh, we never get visitors around here! We’re one of the only settlements on this planet! But, it’s so nice living here! You should like it here very much!” she responded.

“Is there a place where I can spend the night?” Percy asked her.

“Sure! There is a bed and breakfast right upstairs! Just walk outside and knock on the door next to the entrance to the café.” The lady instructed.

Percy finished his meal before he walked outside and knocked on the door. A young man opened, and he introduced himself. He stated that he was visiting, and he was looking for a place to spend the night. So, the young man showed him in and let him wait in the living room.

A nice couple walked up to him. They were Steve and Tara, and they had two children, both boys, named Tyler and Liam. Tyler was 10 and Liam was 13. Liam was the boy who had let Percy in the house at first.

Percy didn’t quite know how to explain where he came from, so he just said that he was from far away. All he wanted to do was spend a night at the house, so Steve showed him the guest bedroom. Once he got settled in, he got back out into the living room, when Steve and Tara asked him some questions.

“So, Percy, where did you come from?” Tara asked him.

“Hmm…. How do I explain this? I was a bit bigger than I am now, and I was shrunk by God so I could be here, on this planet, and in this place!” he responded.

“Ohh… You were shrunk by Nicholas Almighty?” Steve asked him. “He sent you here?”

“Wow, praise Lord Nick!” Tara added.

“Uhh…. Yeah! I mean… We’re living on his body!” Percy explained.

Tara clasped her hands together and smiled.

“Isn’t he wonderful? We owe our very existence to Lord Nick! If it weren’t for him, we would all be dead by now!” she added.

“Really? I mean… why?” Percy asked.

“We had all fallen on tough times. We were all homeless at some point. We lost our jobs, our homes, our cars, all our money… But Lord Nick rescued us from our helpless lives on Earth and he shrunk us. He took us away from our lives of drugs and alcohol and crime on the streets and he shrunk us down and placed us in this clean, happy environment. Everyone here is so happy. There is no crime here. This place is run by Lord Nick himself!” Steve explained.

“Ohhh, wow! I’m truly blessed because… I know Nick… Lord Nick… in person!” Percy grinned. “He’s a personal friend of mine from school!”

“Everyone who lives in Nickville has been rescued from homelessness, poverty, drugs, crime, alcoholism, and the like. People who were on drugs were suddenly clean. People who were scarred by drugs and years of alcohol abuse were suddenly healthy. People who were handicapped were suddenly healed. We all disappeared from earth and got shrunk and sent to live in this community. We were all given a second chance here and we love it!” Tara explained. “And, our kids are strong and healthy now, where they would never have had a future on earth!”

“Holy smoke! I… I don’t know what to say! This place is amazing!” Percy uttered. “I’m so glad I got to meet you guys!”

“Stay as long as you want! I guess you’ll stay here until Lord Nick grows you back, right? We will pray to Lord Nick for him to allow you to stay with us for a few days!” Tara replied.

“Thank you! I appreciate that!” Percy smiled.

And, with that said, Percy went upstairs to his bedroom where he crawled in bed and fell asleep in just a few minutes!
12432112113222.title: ...Nick had created a micro-sized civilization ...

choices: ...almost everyone from Earth was tiny and living there
...Percy was back to normal
...something else had changed in regards to the micro-civilization.
124321121132225.content:
Percy slept a peaceful night's rest and woke up the next morning feeling oh-so refreshed. He got up and yawned, stretching a bit then headed into the dining room where the family was already getting ready for breakfast. He smiled at them and they smiled back, having put out a setting for him.

"So, how do you guys have anything here like electricity, food, water, etc?" Percy asked.
Steve looked at Percy, "Lord Nick gives us everything we need."
"Yes, when we were brought here Lord Nick said we would never worry about anything again, but we would have to stay here in turn." Tara continued.
"Nick makes sure nobody wants for anything, but you can't leave?"
"That's correct, and honestly...considering our old lives, no one here would ever even imagine wanting to return to a normal life on Earth." Steve replied.

It wasn't a bad deal at all. These were people who'd suffered and dealt with a lot of bad things in their lives, usually through no fault of their own, and were brought here by the new God in order to live a better life. What was better than living a peaceful life of plenty on the pectoral of God himself? Percy could not really deny the appeal of such a thing. Once he finished breakfast he waved goodbye to everyone and headed outside again.

Since there was no need for money or to work jobs, people simply did as they wished, pursuing whatever interests might've been back on Earth but poor circumstances didn't allow them to achieve. The biggest thing is that everyone here loved working out, and the younger, the more they seemed to do it. Later in the day even Percy was walking by a big gym, and saw Tyler and Liam training together along with a bunch of other boys their age, pumping their muscles and having a very good time doing it. He grinned and headed inside, joining them in their exercising then going back to the bed and breakfast for dinner and then bed.

He could really get used to this place, honestly he almost wished more people were here, it seems like not having to worry about anything at all really helped bring out the best in people. Even if they didn't all come, Percy was really having the time of his life here. All the same, the next morning...
124321121132225.title: Another day in Nickville

choices: Percy wants to go back to Nickville
Nick sends Percy somewhere as a giant
Nick lets Percy float away so he can explore other areas
Nick makes Percy bulk up so he can play any sport he wants
Nick does something else
1243211211322253.content:
When Percy woke up the next morning, he walked out and headed to the small café. He had no idea what to expect when he saw Tyler and Liam there. The two boys looked considerably bigger!

“What happened to you two guys?” Percy asked them.

“I guess our workouts and our contact with you must have been pleasing to Lord Nick! When we woke up this morning, we saw that our muscles had grown a LOT!” Tyler explained.

“Yeah! This is the biggest growth spurt we have ever had, since we started lifting weights in the gym! So, this must have everything to do with you!” Liam smiled. “Thanks, dude!”

“Wow, are you serious?”

“Yeah, people are rewarded when they do things that please Lord Nick!” Tyler smiled. “I guess we had made him happy by talking to you!”

“After all, you’re his friend and you know him personally!” Liam added.

“Well, yes! I’ve known him for a long time! But I had no idea that he had a whole civilization of people living on his pecs! That is incredible!” Percy smiled. “Basically, Nick is like a god and an entire planet to you guys! Wow… This is so exciting! Darn… I hope I get to tell him how awesome he is…”

“Oh, don’t worry. Lord Nick knows. He’ll grow you back to your real size soon!” Liam grinned.

“Well, Percy, if you grow back, please don’t forget about us. I hope Lord Nick shrinks you back again soon so you can come back to visit us again!” Tyler sighed sadly.

“Oh, absolutely! I like it here! I think I’ll make it a weekly think for Lord Nick to… Uhh…. Shrink me down and let me spend some time on his pecs so I can be with you guys in Nickville!” Percy laughed.

“Well, we got everything here, so just see this as a little place to go on vacation, okay? If you ever feel tired or stressed out from the big, harsh, real world, then just tell that to Lord Nick so he can shrink you!” Tyler nodded.

“Great! Thank you, guys!” Percy said.

Percy then walked outside and wandered off. As he walked further away from the building, he suddenly became tired. He fainted and fell on the grass. When he woke up, a minute later, he was laying on top of Nick’s very muscular body.

“Uhmmm… Nick?” Percy groaned, as he rubbed his eyes.

“There! You’re all done growing back! Did you have a fun time in Nickville?” the young God asked him.

Nick looked on at the muscle kid, carefully rubbing his hand over Nick’s abs.

“You… You have a whole city of people living on your body!” Percy stuttered. “That is just… awesome!”

“I know, right? Did you like it there?” Nick whispered back, placing his hands behind his head.

“Yeah… I… I enjoyed it very much…” Percy smiled. “I felt so at home, there. It was so relaxing.”

Nick just smiled as he looked back at his pal.
1243211211322253.title: ...something else had changed in regards to the...

choices: ...fatten you up and let you relax?"
...give you twice the muscle as before?"
...let you choose any change you want, without limit?"
1243211211324.content:
"Try altering my weight. Not muscle, but something else for now."
"Alright, that's different, let's try that out."

Nick asked Percy to sit down, which he did, relaxing on his body. He felt that dizziness hit him again, but this time he wasn't growing, but getting thinner. His body was losing all the muscle and even added height he'd gotten from Nick's changes to him so far. He felt weaker, not just in his muscles, but just overall, he felt like he had no energy at all. His body quickly returned to the original size he had when this all started then kept right on getting thinner still.

It felt a bit hard to breathe, as even his diaphragm was weaker now, each breath took so much more work. An oxygen mask suddenly appeared and he breathed in much easier, taking in long, slow breaths. He looked down, and saw Nick's big, muscular arm beside his own, giving him a bit of support as Nick had sat down beside Percy. He realized just how thin and weak he looked, even before he gained muscle he looked better than this, he was downright emaciated now, especially when compared to Nick's big, bulging, muscular, healthy arm.

There was a bit of jealousy running through Percy seeing the differences between them, but it wasn't strong, more that he wasn't really a fan of being THIS weak. Thankfully it did not last long, and Percy felt his body returning to his very original self before Nick made any changes to him.

"Whoa...dude, that...was really different." Percy said, finally able to talk more.
"I know right? You looked SO weak, like I wondered if you could even walk at that point." Nick replied.
"I thought the same thing. Still though, thanks for not leaving me that way for long. I really prefer being a big, muscular guy instead." Percy said.
"I get you man" Nick said with a grin and flexing up a big arm for him, "Who wouldn't want big muscles after all?"
"Not anyone I would know."
"Alright, for being such a good sport, and as thanks, how about this for your next change, I'll...
1243211211324.title: Almost like paper

choices: ...you to be free to be anyone else's big brother too."
...you to become my new dad."
...for us to merge and become one."
1243211211325.content:
"Make me buffer!" Percy said, having been inspired by Almighty Alex's ascension just before.
Nick laughed, "Well being God I knew you would say that, Percy. I'll grant your desire, but you will have to agree to let me do other stuff to you, alright?"
"Of course Nick, like I said I trust you completely, I won't ever complain about anything you do, promise."
"Alright I'm glad about that Percy, really."

With that, suddenly Percy found himself teleported into the room of a young boy named Kyle, who was just six years old. Kyle looked up in awe at Percy and his big, muscular body, and he ran forward to hug Percy as tight as he could.

"Whoa, uhh, hey there Kyle." Percy said, somehow knowing his name.
"You're...you're here! I...i was praying to God, I was so scared because my dad...well...he...he left my mom, and I just felt this really strong need to pray, and...now...now you're here! I prayed and God sent me a big brother!"

Percy was needing a moment to comprehend his new scenario. Apparently this is part of what Nick met. He reached down and lifted Kyle up, smiling at him and gently ruffling his hair.

"Yes, yes indeed, God sent you a big brother, me. You were right to pray, after all. Good things happen when you do. Like how I appeared."

Kyle was just sobbing though, and not replying. It's clear that his father leaving really hurt Kyle deeply. Still, Percy knew he'd been sent here on purpose by Nick to help Kyle out. He carried Kyle to his mother, who completely accepted Percy into their lives without even a moment's hesitation, if he'd been sent by God, who was she to question it?

Percy thus began his new life with Kyle and his mother, being a big brother for him. He helped Kyle go to/from school, helped with homework, made sure Kyle ate well, read him bedtime stories, took him to the park, and so on. He once called his old family up, who knew what had happened but also did not question it whatsoever, completely accepting that he was part of Kyle's family now, and they wished him well. It seems the powers of Nick as God really had no limits.

As promised, Percy's muscles did grow, because he felt an insatiable need to train. Whenever Kyle watched him train it seemed like his muscles grew faster too. Whenever he wasn't with Kyle he felt every waking moment had to be spent training and exercising his muscles, and they responded by growing and growing. He was getting what he asked for after all, not that he was complaining.

One night though, as Kyle was laying in bed, about ready to sleep, he told Percy, "Big brother, earlier I prayed, and I asked for...
1243211211325.title: Nick increases Percy's muscles

choices: Two teens start to workout in the gym
Two other preteen boys begin to workout in the outdoor gym
A boy and his sister walk up to the outdoor gym
1243211212.content:
Two preteen boys were playing on the swing set and they were taking turns going down the slide. Nick saw this and wondered what would happen if the slide and swings were to morph into weightlifting gear instead?

So, Nick just waved his hand and transformed the swing set into a nice, leather bench press with a rack and a barbell, along with several metal plates to go along with the bar. The slide morphed into a leg extension machine along with a rack of dumbbells, ranging in weight from 5 to 50 pounds, in pairs of two. The playground suddenly changed into a nice, small, outdoor gym, specifically made for the three preteen boys, who were wandering around there.

The boys, Tyler, Dexter and Simon, were age 10, and they were short and skinny. Now, thanks to Nick’s power, they all had the desire to try out the weights on the playground, which changed before their very eyes. Nick made it so the boys’ muscles would grow easily and quickly, as soon as they started to use the equipment.

Dexter and Simon took turns on the weight bench, and they noticed how their arms and their chests started to bulge with new muscle almost immediately. Tyler began to use the leg extension machine, and his quads started to bulge right away, forming into thick, wide, and large mounds of muscle on his legs right above the knees. Then, they switched, and Tyler tried the bench press while the other boys used the leg extension machine. They also tried out the dumbbells and the barbells. Within about an hour, the three preteen boys had bulked up considerably, transforming from three skinny boys to three muscular kids!

“Look at them! They’re all buff now!” Percy remarked.

“Yeah! I nice, little outdoor gym is much more useful than a playground, right?” Nick laughed.

Just then, a few other kids joined in and Percy and Nick just hung out, as two other boys started working out. Who else started to use the outdoor gym?
1243211212.title: A small group of boys playing in the main playg...

choices: Focus on Tyler and Simon going home.
Focus on Dexter and Jack training to get bigger.
Focus on Ian and his little brother Taylor.
12432112122.content:
Seeing what had happened, two more boys of the same ages as the first ones, came over to the newly made outdoor gym and wanted to join them. Their names were Jack and Ian. They ooh'ed and aah'ed at the muscles that the first three had gained, poking and feeling them as the three boys flexed for them.

Being friendly the first three quickly helped the two new boys begin working out too. Ian and Jack watched as their own muscles started growing with incredible ease, gaining biceps, pecs, abs, calves, the works all over their own bodies. Their clothes morphed into sleeveless shirts and shorts, along with athletic shoes. In short now they were a group of total muscle boys all hanging and working out.

Nick expanded the gym to be larger, adding in more machines and free weights, including heavier ones, letting them pump up and grow bigger still. On top of that, a protein shake dispenser machine appeared beside the outdoor gym, each boy heading over to it at some point to grab one and gulp it down to help feed their muscular, growing bodies.

They were all clearly having a ball, and having just an absolutely great time as they trained and even spent a bit of time wrestling or messing with each other. When they weren't training they took turns running laps around the park itself, to help get in some cardio.

The only boy not spending as much time with the group was Ian, who had a little brother named Taylor who liked playing in another part of the park nearby, so Ian, being a newly buffed-up muscle boy, wanted to spend more time with his beloved lil bro. Taylor was surprised by Ian's suddenly muscular body, but Ian was a good older brother, and the two of them quickly began having a very fun time playing together elsewhere.

Eventually Tyler and Simon had to head home, they were neighbors so they left together. Dexter and Jack were still at the gym, while Ian was off playing with his little brother Taylor.
12432112122.title: Two more to the bunch

choices: Nick decided to go to the beach
Nick decided to help a youth baseball team
Nick decided to help a youth basketball team
Nick decided to help a youth wrestling team
Nick decided to help a youth gymnastics team
1243211213.content:
“Man, we just suck. The weather has been horrible, and we haven’t had a chance to practice at all!” one kid grumbled as the eleven boys huddled up together by the metal bench on the sideline, as they were about to face the best youth soccer team in the district.

Of course, thanks to his Godly abilities, Nick overheard every thought, every emotion and every conversation at the park. He and Percy teleported to the soccer field and they stood there, looking over the young team of boys who were all dressed in red-and-white jerseys and shorts. The boys were all about ten years old and they hadn’t practiced all week because of the rain. So, they were very ill-prepared for the match.

“Oh wow! Those guys are facing a tough team! And, they’re not ready!” Nick noted, just as the team got on the field for a group photo. Just as the group huddled together for the photo, Nick waved his hand and stopped time.

Everything and everyone froze. Nick was the only one who could move, as the boys were squatted together and standing next to each other on the field before a photographer. Nick walked up to the team where nobody moved. They didn’t even blink. Nick then waved his hand and snapped his finger, causing all eleven boys to gain muscle in their legs and arms. One by one, the boys gained strength in their quads and calves. They all grew three inches taller, and they gained additional muscle in their physiques, specifically their backs, shoulders and chests.

When Nick was all done, he snapped his fingers, and everyone unfroze. Right away, once the picture was taken, the boys stood up and they all felt different. For some reason, every boy on the team felt bigger, taller and stronger. What was going on? The boys all looked at one another and they felt strong, powerful and full of energy. They just couldn’t figure out what caused them to feel so different.

The preteen boys won the soccer match easily. They scored five goals in a row and they totally outran, outkicked, and outscored the boys on the other team. Percy and Nick looked on and cheered loudly when the referee blew the final whistle.

“Wow! Did you see that? They were awesome!” Percy cheered. “It’s just amazing what a big difference a little height and muscle can make!”

“I just love giving a few kids some more height and muscle!” Nick smiled. “It’s the coolest thing to do with my powers! I wanna buff up some more guys!”

“Let’s walk around or go somewhere else, then!” Percy suggested.

Nick pondered for a minute before he decided to…
1243211213.title: A large group playing soccer.

choices: ...it was an anatomy class, and he was going to be studied.
...it was science class, and he was the test subject.
...the class didn't matter, every other guy was now as buff as him.
1243214.content:
"School?" Percy asked, "But it's Saturday."
"Not anymore, now it's Monday." Nick replied, rather matter-of-factly.

Percy was stunned into silence, but just as Nick said that, his mother came up and said it was time to go to school, Percy's backpack magically appearing in his hand. They went downstairs and ran off to school instead of being driven there, their big, muscular legs moving them easily the half-mile there in only a few minutes.

"Wow that felt great! I'd never even ran a half a mile, let alone that easily!" Percy said, feeling exhilarated.
"Isn't having big muscles so awesome?" Nick asked with a grin.
"Totally!"

The two boys headed inside, and for the first time ever, people were looking at Percy with awe and wonder. In this new reality the two boys were the real stars of the school. He was stopped and asked to flex over and over again, kid after kid feeling his big, muscular body all over. He felt so much more confident than ever before, gladly flexing and showing off for the enjoyment of everyone, because this is what it really meant to be a muscle guy like him, and not some bully only in it for themselves.

They got to the cafeteria for breakfast and sat down at a table together, Percy couldn't stop grinning, "Nick! This is just too great! I love being like this even more than I did before. I love that I can show off, be strong, and nobody gets hurt. I even stopped some other bullies from hurting another kid and they actually apologized to him and me for it."
"Yep, that's exactly it." Nick nodded as he drank his milk, "I knew you were worthy of it Percy, I knew you were wanting to be this way and would use it wisely. That's why I chose you to be the first guy I buffed up, along with because you are my best friend."
"Thanks Nick, really, thanks."
"Sure thing, Percy."

Once the two of them finished their breakfast and headed their separate ways, since they did not share classes (which Nick could change, but he declined, figuring they didn't 'have' to spend every moment together necessarily). When he got to his first class, Percy saw...
1243214.title: "To school"

choices: Nick grows Percy even more later on
Nick grows one of Percy's best friends
Nick decides to keep Percy as a giant for awhile
Percy wants to shrink back a bit
12432141.content:
Percy walked into his anatomy class and took a seat in the front row as the teacher began to talk. The lecture hall was large and there were over a hundred students there. The teacher, a nice young lady, started to show slides showing drawings of the human body and all the muscles contained within the male body when the large projector suddenly went blank.

“Oh, dear! I guess the projector broke! So, can we get a volunteer? I need a tall boy to get up here, preferably just wearing shorts, so I can use him to point out the muscles on his body!” the teacher said.

Percy didn’t say anything at first, but several of the boys started to tap him on his shoulder, since he had already earned a reputation for being a big, buff guy.

“Come on, Percy! Get up there and show off your big muscles!” one boy shouted.

“Let’s go, Percy!” another girl hollered.

Pretty soon, all the kids in the room were shouting on key.

“PER-CY! PER-CY! PER-CY! PER-CY!”

Even the girls who were on the cheerleading squad got into it.

“He’s got muscle!
Show no mercy!
Flex those guns!
Go, go PERCY!”

“Ohh, man…” Percy just groaned as he finally got up and fished his shorts out of his bag. He ran into the hallway, to the cheers of the entire room, coming back and wearing just his shorts. As he walked in, he flexed his arms, showing off his biceps, causing everyone in the room to go crazy!

“Get up here, Percy!” Mrs. Brown said, signaling for Percy to get on stage next to her.

Mrs. brown used her pointer to point out the different muscle groups on Percy’s body as he stood there, on stage, in front of everybody.

While that was going on, something else was happening. Percy started to GROW!

Percy began to grow bigger and taller while he stood there, in front of everyone. Luckily, his shorts grew along with him. His arms, hands and feet doubled in size as his legs grew incredible long. His muscles also increased in size, so Percy just became incredibly HUGE. His torso practically doubled in size as his shoulders, his arms and his chest became very big and wide, including his muscles. His pecs were enormous, and his arms were very thick and long by now. Not to mention his abs, which were like bricks on a wall. Within moments, Percy was standing about 12 feet tall, towering over Mrs. Brown like a giant!

She had no trouble at all pointing out where the various muscle groups were since Percy had become so massive, it was easy for everyone to see him. She made Percy turn around and the students marveled at his wide back, his large, long legs and his bulging calves. Everything about Percy was just enormous by now. Percy stood there like a giant!

Once the presentation was done, Percy changed in the other room and put on his clothes. All his clothes had adjusted to his new size. When Percy returned to the room, he saw how he was now the biggest and the tallest kid in the classroom, by far!

When the bell rang, he got up and walked out the hallway. Getting through the doors was a challenge now, since he had to duck under all the doorframes. Once he was out in the crowded hallway, he was standing twice as tall as all the other students! He was the giant in school, in height and in muscle!

Just about every other student at school barely reached his waist. To Percy, the students were only half his size. If you also took into consideration how muscular Percy was, then he was a true giant in every sense of the word! He towered over every person who was on campus!

“How’s the weather up there, big guy?”

Percy turned around and looked straight DOWN when he spotted Nick standing before him.

“Watch out where you’re going with those long legs and those big feet of yours, man! You may just step on someone with that huge size of yours!” Nick laughed.

“Nick! Dude! Look at me! I’m so BIG!” Percy exclaimed.

“I have to look at you, big guy! You’re hard to miss!” Nick giggled. “You look great at this size! Darn, I’m temped to grow you even more, later! I really like seeing you at this size!”

Percy just strolled next to Nick for a few minutes. He started getting used to being the BIG guy at school.
12432141.title: ...it was an anatomy class, and he was going to...

choices: Percy rescues a drowning kid at the pool
Percy rescues someone from a burning house
Percy rescues a scared boy from a tree house
Percy rescues a lost dog from a streaming river
Percy has a huge growth spurt
124321411.content:
Percy was getting a little dizzy from looking down. It was like the distance from his head to the ground was so HUGE. It felt weird being a giant! Whenever he felt dizzy, it was as if the distance was slightly increasing! Every small growth spurt seemed like it was amplified. Every time he felt that tingling sensation, it appeared that he was adding another inch to his height and another few pounds of muscle to his frame.

“Uhm, Nick… Am I… Am I still growing?” he asked his much smaller, divine friend.

“Yup! I never ordered you to stop growing!” Nick smiled. “You will keep on growing in height and in muscle, big guy! All that muscle and size just looks amazing on you!”

“Whoa! I’m turning into a hulking giant!” Percy uttered.

People would stop in the crowded hallway to glance at the massive, towering muscle boy. Some of the students would walk up to him and rub his gigantic quads or his huge, ripped abdominal muscles. Occasionally, one of the taller boys would manage to reach over and rub his pectorals. But that’s where it would end. Percy was now bigger and taller than every kid in the whole school. In fact, standing at 12 feet tall, he was twice as tall as most teachers, and with all his muscle, twice as big as everybody on campus. He truly stood out as a giant.

As the boys finally left the main building, they strolled around the vast parking lot. One of the teachers, Mr. Jackson, came up to them. He was grumbling about his car since he had a flat tire but no jack to raise up the back of his vehicle.

“Do you think I’m strong enough to lift a car?” Percy asked Nick.

“I don’t doubt it. If not, I can give you all the muscle you’ll ever need, big man!” Nick just smiled. Nick just loved seeing Percy grow bigger and stronger. Nick just wanted Percy to get even more massive, so he quietly commanded Percy to gain another one-hundred pounds of muscle right there, on the spot.

Percy stopped while walking to Mr. Jackson’s car, groaning loudly. His arms, his quads and his torso expanded with muscle in a dramatic way as his muscles inflated even more, all thanks to Nick’s divine commands. Percy looked even bigger than the biggest pro bodybuilder now, with huge, wide shoulders, thick python arms, and massive, round quads which were wider than those of even the largest bodybuilder. He was truly the largest teen on the planet with the biggest muscles of any human being on earth!

So, Percy casually strolled over to Mr. Jackson’s truck, where the teacher was patiently waiting. He placed his large hands on the rear bumper before squatting down and easily lifting the rear half of the 4-thousand-pound truck like it was as light as Styrofoam. He casually stood there, holding up the large truck until the tire was changed, then lowering the truck back down on the ground.

“Gosh! That wasn’t so heavy at all!” the towering teen grinned, flexing his massive arms.

A small crowd had formed around the truck, where students came to watch the amazing feat of strength. People wanted to see Percy lift the truck since it required superhuman strength and Percy was the only person capable of doing that.

“Wow! It’s so cool having a big guy like him at our school!” one kid uttered.

“I wanna be friends with Percy!”

“Wow! Percy is the best!”

Percy got mobbed by several students until the crowd dispersed and everybody went home when the school bus arrived. Percy walked around until he spotted Nick.

“How does it feel, big guy?” Nick chuckled, craning his neck upward as he stared at the bottom of Percy’s massive pecs as he walked right up to the giant boy.

Of course, Percy had another growth spurt while talking to Nick, growing another inch taller.

“Uhmm… I’m just worried I’m gonna become too big!” Percy worried.

“It won’t happen!” Nick smiled. “I’ll make sure your house and the school will adjust to your size! There will be chairs, desks and tables built for your size! You’ll be treated like a celebrity!”

“Ohh! That’s a relief!” Percy smiled, reaching down and grabbing Nick before setting the boy on his massive shoulders. Percy enjoyed walking home with his pal sitting on his broad shoulders. They would discuss what they would do during the rest of that afternoon…

12531.content:
When Andy’s mom, Kate, walked over to the mailbox, she was delighted when she saw that she had received a package from John. She always liked John very much, and she adored his work and his scientific experiments. Andy was always fascinated by his work as well, and always wanted to know what John was working on.
“Hey, Andy, I got a package for you from Uncle John!” she said, as she dropped the box on the boy’s desk. Andy was sitting at his desk, studying for a math test for school.
“Oh, a package? For me? I wonder what it is!” Andy wondered as he grabbed a knife and cut it open.
Inside, he found a small, plastic tube containing an orange, concentrated liquid. Also, there was a thumb drive included in the package. Andy grabbed the thumb drive and inserted it in his laptop. After a few seconds, a video started to play. It showed his Uncle John in a video on the screen.
“Hi there, Andrew! I hope you’re doing well. If not, then this will help you. Included in the box is a small flask containing a serum I invented. This is what I call the God Formula. If you drink all of it, it will make all your wishes and desires come true. Everything you order, wish or command will happen. You will be in complete control of everything and everyone around you. Enjoy the formula and let me know what you think. This is my gift to you. Cheers! Uncle John.” His Uncle spoke in the video.
“Say what? In control of everything? You’re kidding! Is this for real?” the boy questioned as he unscrewed the cap of the flask and drank the orange liquid, finishing all of it, till the very last drop.
“Ah, that tasted just like orange juice!” Andy giggled, just as the awesome power started to manifest itself within the body of the short, skinny, 12-year-old boy. He was nothing out of the ordinary, with short, black hair and brown eyes and a slender figure. All the sudden, he felt his muscles burning, like he just completed an intense workout in the gym. Of course, he had never worked out in the gym before!
Andy’s muscles quickly inflated with divine muscle, all over his short frame, making him quickly resemble a teenage athlete in no time! He grew into a young muscle kid, with big, bulging biceps and broad shoulders. His chest barreled out, becoming thick and wide, thanks to his large pectorals. He now had well-defined abdominal muscles along with big, wide quads and bulging calves! He morphed into a young, strapping athlete within just a few seconds!
“Ohhhhh!” he groaned softly as he endured a muscle growth spurt. Then, he turned towards a blank wall in his room, wishing for a large mirror, which instantly appeared.
“Wow! I’m big and strong!” Andy cheered as he flexed his arms. “This is awesome!”
He turned around and posed, checking out his Hulking quads, calves and abs. He was a young, pre-teen bodybuilder now!
“Let’s see. What should I do now?” he pondered for a moment, enjoying his first minute as a young God.

13121.content:
(I’m going to write this in 3rd person P.O.V.)

John was so excited. He knew he had succeeded in creating the most powerful serum in all of history. He had set out to make something else and then he stumbled upon this weird formula which could allow anyone to manipulate reality and change things. He continued to work on it and presto! He finished it! Now… Who would he give this to? Who would use it? Who would test it? He couldn’t try it on himself because he needed to take notes and document his findings. He needed to give this to another person, so he could see how someone would react to the serum and use their abilities. But…. Who could he trust enough, to give it to?

Then, John remembered Emily. His awesome girlfriend! They had been seeing each other for over two years now, and she had always been by his side. She was happy and outgoing, and she always wanted to help everybody. She was involved with school and church and she loved doing stuff with kids and animals and so on. She had a playful and fun-loving personality, so, why not?

John sent a text message to Emily and told her that he was coming over with a special gift for her. About ten minutes afterwards, he showed up at her doorstep, holding a plastic container in his hand filled with an orange liquid.

Emily was about 5-feet-tall with red hair and deep, blue eyes. She was 28 years old and she was short and flat. She had a great, outgoing personality and she was always happy to see John when he came over. John was always busy working, studying or tinkering around in his lab, so it was a treat when he took time off from all that and showed up at her house.

“You made me a container with orange juice?” Emily asked John. “Why? I can buy that in the grocery store, honey!” she giggled.

“No, no, no, no! This isn’t orange juice, sweetheart! This is a super special serum! This will make you into a Goddess!” John explained. “Just drink it and everything you want will come true! You’ll be in complete control of everything and everyone!”

“Really? You want to give me a gift like that?” Emily asked him as she took the container in her hands.

“Yes! You do so much good work and you help so many people…. I think you’ll do great things!” John smiled.

“Ohh, John… Thank you so much!” she giggled as she unscrewed the cap of the container and poured all of the contents into a big, plastic mug. Then, she picked up the mug and drank everything from a straw.

Emily was thirsty enough that she took everything. She emptied the mug and she drank everything till the last drop!

“Wow… That tasted just like orange juice!” she laughed as she set the empty contained on the table.

“Tastes good? So… Feel anything yet?” John asks Emily at this point.

Then, it happened. It kicked in. Emily stood up and she looked around the room. She could hear things. She could hear everything. She could feel things. In fact, she could feel anything and everything from everyone just about everywhere. She could sense and hear things. Voices, thoughts and feelings from everyone located everywhere!

“Ohhh wow…. This is just…. Like… Wow….” Emily said quietly. “I feel your excitement…”

John was just thrilled to death. He knew his serum worked. He was hoping Emily would somehow make herself grow or something since he had a secret fetish for tall women. But, he didn’t say anything to her.

“Hang on… Let me try something!” Emily said as she walked up to him.

Emily walked up to John, who was just over 6 inches taller than her. She was 5 feet tall and she now knew everything about John, including his wishes, desires, his fantasies and dreams. She suddenly knew that John liked tall women, even tough he had never told her that himself.

“Hey, John! Check this out!” she grinned as she stood before him while looking up to him.

John gasped loudly as he suddenly witnessed his girlfriend having a massive growth spurt while she stood before him! Her legs, her torso and her arms all grew rapidly, as she slowly inched up and began to tower over John, inch by inch, until she was suddenly standing over six inches taller than him and making him crane his head because he now had to look UP to her! Emily was just over six feet tall now! She had grown a whole foot taller in just a few seconds! Luckily, all her clothes seemed to grow along with her as the young woman suddenly became a true, towering Goddess!

“Holy crap!” John gasped, now looking her straight in her chest, as he took in the big, beautiful, slender and tall, redhead Goddess who was standing before him. “You look… amazing!”

“I know you like tall women, John…” Emily smiled as she wrapped her long arms around his smaller frame. “So, I figured I’d give myself a growth spurt! I hope you like it!”

“I LOVE it!” John grinned.

John had to stand on his toes to give her a kiss, but he didn’t mind. And Emily loved being taller than him. But, she was the Goddess now, so he had to get used to her being in charge from now on.

So, what do they do next?
13121.title: She is Emily, slim, red hair, blue eyes, 28 yea...

choices: You get married
She changes you physically
13122.content:
Of course, you know exactly who you wanted to have as the alpha and omega. That was Kate.

You still remembered your first date as though it was yesterday. You'd found her on some dating site and met up in a cafe on the university campus. The weather was awful but it was cosy and warm inside. All you knew was science and abstract metaphysics - you didn't exactly have any relationship experience. And Kate ... Kate was amazing from the moment you first saw her. A little quiet but extremely cute, Kate was into dancing and playing guitar. Somehow you just knew you had a spark right from the beginning - she was beautiful, kind and friendly.

As you went on more dates, Kate came to learn about your research and took great curiosity in it. She'd often talked with you about how she'd change the world if she was a goddess - such as, ending hunger, poverty, disease, homelessness and more on a whim. And although her assumption was that you'd try to become a god yourself, you knew Kate would have put much more thought into it than you had. Plus, you'd seen Kate with a heart of gold frequently when you were out together. She was always finding ways to help people, but then she also always had time to give you a loving kiss afterwards. In the years you'd been together, she'd often surprise you by coming over to your apartment looking for a cuddle ... and sometimes, she was in the mood for something more. You shuddered as you remembered all those times she'd made you feel like you were a god. It just felt right to give her this, after everything she'd done for you.

...

Kate came home from university, looking amazing like she always did. She was surprised to see you there, waiting for her.
"Hey, sweetheart" you said sheepishly.
After an initial moment of surprise, Kate wasted no time in embracing you and pulling you in for a passionate kiss. "What are you doing here?" she asked.

"Kate, I love you. You're more important to me than anything else in the universe. You're so kind, so beautiful inside and out, and so perfect. I wake up and go to sleep every day thinking how lucky I am that you love me too. So, uhm, there was something I wanted to ask you."
You got down on one knee and presented a small box to Kate. "Kate, will you make me the happiest man alive?"
Kate's eyes filled with tears as she interrupted you. "Yes! Yes!" she cheered "Of course I'll marry you! I can't wait!"

"Oh" you said "Uhm ... well, I want to marry you too, but that's not actually what I wanted to ask."
"What?" asked Kate, looking confused.
"You know how I've been working on a god formula? Well ... it's finished. It's, uhm, right here in this box. I want you to have it. Nothing would make me happier."

Kate looked at you stunned for a moment. "Me? But I thought ... I mean, you'd make such a good God, I just ..."
"You deserve it. I'm serious. Every time we talk about this, I'm amazed by how thoughtful and perfect you are. If there's anyone who deserves to be omnipotent ... it's you."
"You sure?" asked Kate.
"Positive"

Kate picked up the box and opened it. Inside was a small vial of orange, slightly glowing liquid.
"So I just drink this, right?"
"That's right" you said, getting turned on at the sight of Kate in her final moments as a human.

"Listen" said Kate "If I do this, I want you to know something. The first thing I'm going to do, after becoming a goddess, is turn you into a god. You won't be able to overrule my will, or stop my powers, or harm me in any way, but aside from that you'll be omnipotent as well."
"But..."
Kate put her finger to your lips. "That's the only way I'll do it. You deserve it, too. I want us both to rule the universe together, as a couple, husband and wife. I'd never rule the universe for one second without you by my side."
You sighed. "Alright" you said "I'll do it. I'll be a lesser god, you be the main one. I'll never be able to fathom how lucky I am to have met a super generous girl like you."
"Are you kidding me?" replied Kate "I'm the lucky one. How many guys offer their girlfriends this kind of gift? And I'll make sure that, as a goddess, you'll always get the thanks you deserve."

You both kissed again, one last time. Then, Kate uncorked the vial. "Alright, here goes" she said timidly "I love you."
"I love you too" you said.

Then, with a brilliant, wonderful flash, Kate brought the vial to her lips and let the liquid flow into her.

Almost immediately, you felt the world around you shift. Kate still looked the same as the last of the drink spilled into her mouth, but you knew she'd never be the same. It was final. She was a goddess, now and forever.

"Wow" she said "That felt awesome! Alright, now, as promised ..."

And then you felt a similar flash, followed by a sudden burst of power welling up inside you, beginning at your heart and quickly spreading through your whole body. Indeed, in a single instant, you became more powerful than the whole universe, but even this was an infinitesimally small fraction of the power Kate possessed. Although any onlookers would have noticed absolutely nothing happening, inside you could feel powers of a scale you'd never even imagined.

"Now that we're god and goddess" smiled Kate, discarding the empty vial "I think it's time I went through my list."
"Your ... list?" you asked.
"Yeah! I wrote down a list so that when you became God, you wouldn't forget anything" said Kate, as a long list appeared in her hand, written over several sheets of scrap paper "Of course, now that I'm a goddess I might as well do it all myself."

You glanced down the list, using your new powers to see through the pages. It went all the way from big things, like an end to all wars, to smaller changes like making everybody keep a healthy weight, to things you'd never even thought of, like making flies less of a nuisance.

"Looks good" you said.
"Thanks" she said, causing the list to vanish and everything written on it to be put into immediate effect.

The world shifted around you once again. Everything looked much the same on the street, except the apartments looked a little nicer, the street in better condition, the trees a little greener, the sun a little brighter ... everything just looked slightly nicer than it was before. After a moment, you saw a car drive itself down the street with a happy family inside playing a card game.

"I knew I wouldn't regret this" you said.
"And now that I've helped the world and made it a better place" smiled Kate "It's time for us to do something together."

132221.content:
As Emily entered through the doors of her high school, she was greeted by a loud commotion around the area where the row of lockers was. At first she tried to avoid it, but then she recognized one of the boys.

It was Aaron, one of the nerdy boys in her math class. The poor kid got into a fight with Chad, one of the boys on the football team. Chad was bigger, taller and stronger than Aaron and he held Aaron in a headlock as he stood behind the shorter, scrawny boy. Clearly, Aaron didn’t stand a chance. Aaron was short with straight, black hair and he wore glasses.

“Come on, man! Let go! Let me go!” Aaron shouted.

“Give me a copy of your homework! Now! I didn’t do mine, so I need to turn in yours with my name on it! GIMME!” Chad shouted.

Emily hated cheaters. Chad never did his homework and he would steal the homework sheets from the nerds and put his own name on it, so he could still pass all the classes and not get kicked off the football team. Of course, it didn’t help that Aaron was such an easy victim, either. But, what could she do to help Aaron?

Then, she realized that she was a Goddess now. She could do anything and still make everyone believe that whatever happened, was perfectly normal! So, she decided it was time to even the score a bit between Aaron and Chad.

Suddenly, Aaron felt an odd tingling everywhere, throughout his entire body. Then, his massive growth spurt started to take place! While Chad had his arm around Aaron’s neck, Aaron started to grow taller, bigger and stronger, all within seconds! His legs grew longer, his arms bulged with muscle, and Aaron’s chest, his legs and his torso all increased in width and in height. Within moments, Aaron was suddenly taller than the football player and he had the strength to yank Chad’s arm over his neck, freeing him from Chad’s grip.

“Now… Leave me alone!” Aaron roared as he grabbed Chad by his shirt with both hands and he hurled him against the steel locker doors. He slammed him against the lockers with so much force, that Chad’s body just slumped down to the ground. He was in that much pain. Finally, one of the teachers came and broke up the fight. The students who witnessed the fight indicated that Chad had started it, so the teacher got Chad to his feet and walked him to the Principal’s office.

Meanwhile, Aaron was standing there, he was gasping and panting, and he had burst out of his shirt and his jeans. Emily quickly made his clothes adjust to his new body, and Aaron looked normal again, but bigger and taller… and more muscular. Since Aaron always got picked on, she decided to leave him like that. He now looked like a cute nerd with big muscles.

Later on, Emily walked into her math class and she sat down next to Aaron.
“Hey, big guy…” she said to him.

“Hi…” he said shyly. Aaron had always been shy with girls.

“You were really great out there! It was time someone put Chad in his place!” she smiled.

“Ohh… Uhh… Thanks! I don’t know what happened. I guess he had me in a headlock and then… I just had the muscle to break loose!” Aaron whispered back.

“What are you doing after class today?” she asked him.

“Nothing. Studying. Why?”

“Wanna hang out? Come with me to my place. We both get the same math homework!” Emily said quietly, as she looked over at the big, hunky boy.

“Uhh…. Sure…. I guess!” Aaron shrugged.

Emily was looking forward to later on, where she could have him over for more studying, more Goddess magic, and maybe some more growth?

Stretching, she doesn't object as you take her bikini-clad body in: the G-cup breasts, the jutting ass, the muscle tone, all on an amazing seven-foot form. You have no idea how she reconciles her strong feminist views with putting her body on display so blatantly.

You're always a bit taken aback by her brusque manner combined with the way she shows her body off, and can only present the container of orange liquid and say, "This."

"That? What is that, orange juice?"

Her tone makes it clear that she will know if you lie about its contents, and you know she would anyway. "Despite appearances, no. It's a formula that will make the drinker omnipotent."

You begin to think that maybe this wasn't such a great idea. Who knows what sort of Goddess Laura would be? "Er, on second thought, maybe..." As swiftly as you can you remove the lid and begin to raise it to your lips.

"That's for trying to deny me omnipotence," you hear her say, and managing to get your good eye pointed toward her you watch with a growing sense of horror and fear as she, standing well away from you, drains the container.

I'm wearing my usual two-piece, and shift around on my bed to make sure he gets an eyeful. As he sits down after I wave him in, I can easily tell that he's aroused by the sight of me.

We both know that I can almost always tell when someone's lying, and seventeen years of living with John has given me a unique insight into him. He can't lie to me, and he knows it. "Despite appearances, no. It's a formula that will make the drinker omnipotent."

He's telling the truth, or at least what he's certain is the truth. "Omnipotent? All-powerful? Able to do anything?" I ask, hiding my excitement.

I cannot alter the physical laws of My multiverse too far without being forced to expend infinite amounts of power keeping everyone in it alive--and if I let them die and complete what I must make, when I change the laws back the change I made to myself would be reversed. It is only here, in the void, that the changes can be made permanent.

The preparation itself is a variant of My sister's formula. However, the only way to make it requires manipulations that are impossible while confined to any physical laws in which humans can live, and also requires the expenditure of extreme power. Only here, inside My bubble, with no physical laws to constrain anything in it, can I do this work.

It is not long before I am finished. The final subatomic alteration turns the concoction green from its previous orange. Unlike the original formula, I know this will work, but even so I am not wholly prepared for its effect.

I had thought that the first instant of omnipotence would be the most rapturous experience of My life. I was wrong. As My formula increases My limitless power to levels far exceeding that of any other deity in any multiverse I see the parlour trick of the barriers for what it is, and marvel that I had been unable to breach them. As My power stabilizes, I know that I am powerful enough to wipe anything else from existence and create anything I desire. I prepare to enter another multiverse.

Suddenly a deity comes flying out at Me. I can see that she is drawing on power from almost every multiverse--precisely the Goddess I have planned to kill.

I unleash a torrent of raw omnipotence directly at her, but she absorbs it without any ill effects. Her counterattack is, I am forced to admit, equally impressive, but equally ineffective.

Our senses tell us that all our attacks will prove futile and merely risk erasing multiverses. I shift myself toward her and say, "I am Laura."

"I am Hokulani," she replies.

"You do not rule all the stars," I say.

"No, but together We can."

"How so?"

"Take My hand."

"And then?"

"And then We will rule all of existence."

I take Her proferred hand.

I was wrong that gaining power that second time would be the greatest experience of My existence. Mingling essences with another omnipotent being, as only Our extreme powers and the unique properties--or lack thereof--of the void allowed Us to do without risking a multiverse's existence, is beyond words.

When it ends I find that I am still Me. And yet I am also Hokulani, but She is still Her, and also Me.

"I can feel them. I can feel all those multiverses You created. I created them, too."

"And You know what else I intend."

Swiftly We slice through the barriers surrounding all the multiverses. The local deities are no match for Our power, but We do not kill them. They become part of Our gestalt, part of something grander than any of them could imagine. There are hierarchical structures in the power in some of them, which are left intact by the merging, but at the top level of power in all multiverses those there become Our equals. As part of the gestalt, We spread across all multiverses--anyone who gained power in one, gains power in all, and is one being with all their counterparts. But We also agree to generally leave each universe to those who gained power within it. While all of Us know what could happen, We are content to let things progress within each multiverse as they would have done had the gestalt never been formed.

I can feel Myself in every multiverse in which My mortal self existed, the same younger sister of the inventor of the potion. He too is a deity, and is not angered by the fact that I made Him a woman in one of My multiverses. In the void with Hokulani, I laugh as He turns Me into a musclebound man in one of His multiverses.

"You understand why this was necessary, Laura."

"I wish it were not so, Hokulani. I wish Your name truly fit You."

"Perhaps some day it will. And on that day it will fit You, also, and Your brother, and Mine, and all the other deities in these multiverses. But They do not yet understand. If They wished, They could perceive what We perceive, and know. But They accept that what has happened, has happened, and that must suffice for now."

"And in the meantime, We shall each of Us rule Our multiverses as We see fit. You know what that means for Makana in My multiverses."

"As does He. He accepts it, as He knows You will accept what he does to You in His."

"I cannot say that I approve, but they are His multiverses, not Mine. This alliance must not break."

"I hope it never shall, Laura."

Removing My laboratory from existence, I part ways with My sister Goddess and re-enter the multiverse I had left. Jana is still in My room, and We each know that the other is omnipotent. But She doubles over in pain like a mortal when I kick Her in Her breasts, and I can feel My brother in another multiverse kneeing Me in My male groin. Teleporting to My friend Kelly's house, I knock on her door, not wishing to disturb her overly.

"Oh! That way! I know you refer to yourself the way you do, but I don't agree with why you do it."

Immediately I shift into the void with the Eklepan, appearing next to Kelly.

Simon knew how much Dru and Dylan loved superheroes, so he was struck with a brillian idea!

"Hey Dru!" Simon said, as he stood in the corner of the comic book store. "Watch this! Keep your eyes on Dylan!"

"Huh? What? What are you gonna do to him?" Dru asked the teenage god.

Dylan had just finished helping another couple when he walked up to a teenage boy.

"Here, let me help find that comic you were looking for... Uhh..." Dylan groaned.

Dylan suddenly froze! he closed his eyes and moaned out loud! Then, his muscles inflated under his shirt! His pecs bulged, his abdominals became incredibly defined, and his biceps swelled. His shoulders became wider and his legs bulged with incredible muscle! Then, his clothes began to morph into blue tights, which covered his entire body! Dylan's sneakers transformed into long, bright-red boots which came up to his knees. And a long, thick red cape was suddenly draped over his broad shoulders! His bright, blue uniform showed off his bulging muscles as the "S" logo formed over his big, bulging chest.

"Uhhh... I... feel... strong..." Dylan moaned, as he transformed into the teenage version of Superman, as everyone in the comic book store looked on. He looked EXACTLY like him, too! Excelt for his face, which still looked like Dylan's.

When Dylan opened his eyes, he saw everyone staring at him. He was such an impressive sight!

Dylan stared around the store. He saw through the walls! he even saw the cars parked outside! he heard the phones ringing in the office upstairs!

"Ohmygosh! It's... too... much!" Dylan groaned, as he placed his hands over his ears and cringed.

"Oh man... he's getting overloaded with all the sights and sounds since his super powers kicked in!" Simon noted. "I want him to get used to having super powers... right NOW!"

Suddenly, Dylan relaxed... as he removed his hands from his ears.

"Wow... This... is... so cool!" the boy sighed, as he looked down at his new super-physique.

"Hey! You're Superman!" the teenager exclaimed, who was holding a comic book in his hand."And you work here, in this store? I gotta tell all my friends about this!"

"Sure! Let me ring you up, buddy!" Dylan smiled, as he ran over to the cash register at super-speed, where he made another sale. All the kids just gawked at Superman, who was working in the comic book store!

"Are you... gonna keep him like that?" Dru asked Simon.

"Sure! I'll let him have some fun as a superhero! I might not even have to make him normal again!" Simon chuckled.

Simon and Dru left to walk around the rest of the mall, and they returned when it was time for the store to close...

14533.content:
You walk across the street and you spot one of the teens from your neighborhood, standing in front of their house.

What better way to share your awesome God Formula than to give it to a teenager who lives across the street from you?

Do you give it to Jordan, the jock, who is always mowing the lawn, selling popcorn for the Boy Scouts (Eagle Scout!), or riding his bike, plays soccer and baseball, and rides his inline skates or his skateboard down the street? He is that cute, hunky guy who would love to become a young God.

Do you give it to Erica, the bubbly young girl, who sells Girl Scout cookies, dances, does gymnastics, plays soccer and volleyball in school? She's smart and cute and has loads of friends in school as well. She may have (at least) one boyfriend already.

Pick a teen and make him or her omnipotent and have FUN!
14533.title: more choices

choices: Jordan goes around the neighborhood and helps some friends
Jordan goes to school and helps some classmates and friends of his
145331.content:
You had been awake all night long, putting the finishing touches on your new chemical masterpiece! You are absolutely one-hundred percent certain that it will work! Whoever drinks the entire contents of your plastic container, holding just 32 ounces of liquid, will become completely omnipotent! He or she will gain the powers of a real and true God! He or she will be able to do anything just by thinking it! The new God can issue commands at will, and bend reality and command anything and anyone on earth or in the universe to do whatever he or she wants!

So, who do you give it to? You ponder this carefully! You don't want to drink it yourself because you want to record the effects of the formula. You want to journal the miracles that the new God performs. This is the start of your journal. You want to give it to someone who lives close to you, so you see the new God every day. So, who can it be?

DING DONG!

The doorbell! Like an answer to the prayer! Like divine intervention! You open the door and you see a handsome, tall young man standing before you, Clean cut and shaven, he has long, jet-black hair and dark brown eyes and a friendly expression on his face. He's wearing only khaki shorts and old running shoes.

"Mr. James? Do you still need me to mow your grass for you?" the boy asks.

"Sure, Jordan! That would be great!" you reply.

Of course! The teen from across the street! The kid is always working! He's either walking down the street selling popcorn for his Boy Scout Troop, or he's washing all the cars of all the neighbors for his school soccer team. Or, he comes running down the street wearing his soccer uniform, kicking a ball all the way. This kid is always active, always busy. Or, he's riding a skateboard or zooming down the street on his inline skates. He's always active, always working, always... busy. He would make a great God!

You decide to wait for Jordan to be done with your lawn. You glance out the window, and you see him sweating outside as he's pushing that old rusted lawn mower. What MORE could he do if he were omnipotent? This is so perfect!

The doorbell rings.

"All done, Mr. James!" the boy says. "Do you want to come and check my work?"

"Oh, I'm sure it will be perfect, Jordan! Come inside, let me get you something to drink!" you offer him.

"Oh, it's alright! I have some water--" he says, but you don't want to hear it.

"No, what I have here is a new energy drink!" you say as you pour the formula from the container into a glass. "This is revolutionary! This will make you stronger and more powerful than you can possibly imagine, my boy!"

"It... It looks like orange juice, Mr. James!" he says as you hand him the glass.

"Drink it, Jordan Jennings! It's god-juice! It will make you feel like a god!"

"Dang!" the boy sighed.

He stared at the glass.

He stared at you.

He closed his eyes as he raised the glass up to his lips and downed the entire contents down his throat in one big gulp!
