1531.content:
As you flip through the contacts on your phone, you start to think that probably the most interesting (if not the most risky) person to give the formula to would be a middle school boy; someone on the verge of becoming an adult, going through puberty and having all sorts of conflicting thoughts, emotions, and feelings running through their heads. You think back to yourself as a middle schooler and how awesome it would have been to be omnipotent then, and that settles it.

Of the boys that age that you knew, two immediately jumped out at you as possible candidates. The first was Alex. Fourteen years old and in eighth grade, Alex was the son of a friend, and you had always found him to be interesting and mysterious. He always seemed rather shy and quiet, and his long dark hair continuously covered his eyes, making him even more aloof. At the same time, the few times he did open up to you, he seemed to be friendly and had a lot of intelligent and creative things to say, unlike his dark, depressing emo appearance might lead you to believe. Maybe making Alex omnipotent would cause him to open up, or at least let him have a little more fun with his creative nature.

The second boy you thought about calling was Paul, who in many ways was the opposite of Alex. Just twelve years old and in sixth grade, Paul was always bright, chipper, and eager to talk to anybody around him. He also had a generous heart; you had first met him at a soup kitchen you were volunteering at, where Paul was helping out along with some of the boys from his Boy Scout troop. In fact, you saw him volunteer at that soup kitchen a lot, many times coming without anyone else from his troop. You knew that Paul would be a generous and kind god, and would probably be less risky than anyone else you knew.

Switching back and forth between the two boys' names, you finally decided to...
1531.title: A preteen boy (age 12-14)

choices: "I'm gonna need to try things out on my own, John." (Switch to Alex's POV)
"If we're gonna hang out together, I should probably make you my age, at least."
15311.content:
Settling on Alex's name and hitting the "call" button, you wait for Alex to pick up the phone, which he does after four rings. "H-hello?"

"Hey, Alex, it's John, your parents' friend. Listen, do you mind if I stop by your place? I've got something for you that I know you'll really enjoy." You waited for an answer, an uncomfortable silence starting to linger. "Alex? Ya there?"

"Y-yes," he finally responds. "Okay, I'll be out in front of my house."

"Great, I'll see ya in fifteen minutes." Flipping your phone shut, you put it in your pocket and start walking to your car. Traffic is light, so you actually arrive at Alex's house in thirteen minutes, seeing the skinny fourteen year old sitting on the front porch waiting for you.

"Hey, Alex," you call out as you turn off the engine of your car and step out of it, walking over to him. "How've you been?"

"Okay, I guess." He barely tilts up his head, and you can tell that he's a little unsure of why you're here.

"Good," you say, shifting your weight from foot to foot. "Listen, I wanted to give you to be the first to try this formula I've been working the last three years on." You pull the plastic container out of your pocket and hand it to him. "If my calculations are correct, anyone who drinks this will become omnipotent, and have the powers of a god!"

"A god?" Alex brushes the hair out of his eyes and takes the container, looking at it questioningly, shaking it lightly from side to side and watching it slosh in the container.

"Yes, exactly," you beam, trying to sound confident. "I thought you'd be the best person to test it out on, as I know you'd have a lot of creative ideas on how to use your powers."

He looks up at you skeptically, but something in his eyes seems to indicate that he believes in you. "O-okay, John. I'll try it, as long as you say it's safe."

You nod. "It's as safe as drinking anything else. Worst case scenario, you might have a slight upset stomach for a few hours. But even the chances of that are low."

Shrugging, Alex pops the top off of the container and brings it to his nose, sniffing it slightly. Apparently unfazed by whatever he smelled, he then brings it down to his lips, pouring it into his mouth. He lets it sit on his tongue for a moment before swallowing, wrinkling his nose slightly. "Wow, that's more carbonated than any soda I've ever had. Very tingly."

"Go ahead," you say as you motion with your hand. "Try it out. Think about something you want to change, about yourself, or our surroundings, or even me, if you want."

Standing up, he looks around, trying to find something that would be useful to test it on. Seeing a squirrel running around in the yard, he closes his eyes, appearing to be concentrating hard at the squirrel, then opens them again. You look back and forth between the squirrel and Alex, not noticing anything different. "Uh, what did you wish for, Alex?"

Before he could answer, the squirrel runs up in between the two of you, his eyes darting between you both. "Hey," you hear a squeaky voice that seems to be coming from the squirrel itself. "Do you two have any acorns or nuts on ya?"

Your mouth drops open, stunned. "Wow! Alex, I'm guessing you did that?"

Alex slowly nods, seemingly as stunned as you are. Looking back down at the squirrel, he kneels down. "No, little squirrel, we don't."

"Rats," the squirrel says. "Well, let me know if you find any." He then quickly scampers off, around the corner and out of sight.

"So I guess the formula works!" You say with a laugh. "Awesome!"

Alex grunts in the affirmative, still looking stunned. "I... I can't really believe it. This is... this is something I've kinda always dreamed about."

Smiling, you pat him on the shoulder. "So what are you gonna do next with your powers?"

"Well..." Alex thinks for a moment before looking back up at you.
15311.title: ...call Alex.

choices: Alex quietly changes and helps some friends from school at the mall
Alex changes John so he can fit or buy some shoes or clothes he likes
153112.content:
Alex stared at you for a moment, with his deep, brown eyes. Then, a smile formed on his face.

"I... I know what you want... I know what you like..." he said quietly. You begin to realize what he's talking about. His omnisense has kicked in. "I know... I feel... I hear... Everything..."

You just smile as you look at the boy. You remind yourself that you're looking at... God, in the form of a fourteen-year-old teenage boy with long, black hair.

"I want you to hang out with me..." he says, or actually, he ORDERS.

"I... I'll hang out with you!" you feel compelled to reply.

"I'm grateful for this gift you have given me... I know what you want... You want to be my age... Which is good..." he continues. "I want that, too!"

As soon as Alex expressed his wish or desire, his will was done. You feel yourself becoming younger, just as the young God ordered. You regress from being in your 20's to becoming fourteen years-old again... a teenage boy! You shrink down a bit, losing a few inches in height until you're suddenly an inch shorter than Alex! You lose some muscle as well and your hair grows a bit longer. You lose some weight as well as some facial hair. Within moments, you transform into a teenage boy.

"Whoa! I'm a kid again!" you say, looking down on yourself.

"Yeah!" Alex grins. "You need to dress like one, too!"

Your clothes change from the button shirt and slacks to shorts and a t-shirt and tennis shoes.

"There! Much better!" Alex smiles. "I'm getting the hang of this God-stuff!"

You're totally amazed by the way he completely changed your age and your looks in a matter of moments.

"One more thing... I want you to forget how you made this God-formula!" Alex ordered. "You don't need to make more of it!"

You blink. God-formula? What's that?

You look at Alex now as your friend from school who just happened to be... God. He has always been that way.

"Cool! Let's go somewhere where there are people!" Alex smiles. "Got any ideas?"

"I always like to go hang out at the Plaza mall..." you suggest.

"Good! I'll take us there so we can hang out! Right now!" Alex says.

He snaps his fingers.

There is a flash of bright white light.

In an instant, you and Alex are standing in front of the mall entrance!

"Whoa!"

"C'mon! Let's hang out, John!" Alex says, as he waves his hand, making the glass doors open like magic...

It's so cool when your best friend is God!
153112.title: "If we're gonna hang out together, I sh...

choices: You help out a super skinny boy
You help out an overweight kid
1531121.content:
Walking around with a kid with god-powers now seemed like the coolest thing on earth. He was totally capable of doing anything, literally. So, being at the mall was like the first and best place to hang out, right?

You two walk around and run into Liam, one of the guys from school. He was carrying a big bag from one of the shoe stores.

“Hey, Liam! What’s up?”

The short, slender boy gave a shy, sad look.

“I got a cool, new pair of high tops for my birthday from my stepdad, but… They’re just way too big for me!” he replied.

“Really? Can we see?” you asked him.

Liam sits down on a bench and pulls the cool shoes out of the box. He kicks off his old shoes and puts the shoes on his feet. The shoes are definitely two sizes too big for him!

“Darn! Why did you get shoes that big?” Alex asked.

“I guess my stepdad had thought I had grown a bit taller by now…” Liam sighed.

“Well, stand up, dude!” Alex ordered.

Liam stood up to face Alex, with the huge shoes on his feet.

“You need to grow into those big shoes!” Alex smiled.

Suddenly, Liam was overcome by a weird tingling everywhere. His legs grew longer and his torso widened. His arms stretched out and his muscles increased. His feet grew until they fit his shoes perfectly. Within seconds, Liam grew a foot taller, passing 6 feet in height, and he was now like a big, tall basketball player!

“Whoa! My shoes! They fit perfectly, now!” he exclaimed.

Both you and Alex were looking up to the towering hoopster now.

“Looking good, big guy!” Alex grinned, since he made his friend grow a foot taller.

“Sweet! Well I’ll catch you guys later!” Liam said, walking off while wearing his new shoes.

You and Alex decided what to do next…
1531121.title: Alex quietly changes and helps some friends fro...

choices: Alex buffs up the skinny boy as well
Alex makes the skinny boy grow into a Hulking giant
Alex buffs up three boys who are walking around in the mall
Alex grows another group of boys at the mall
15311211.content:
“John… I was just thinking…” Alex suddenly stated while they were walking down the wide corridor of the mall. “We need a little protection, just in case.”

“What are you talking about?” John said. “You’re God! Nobody’s gonna hurt you!”

“Yeah, I know, but I can buff us up but to be honest, I really don’t feel like having to fight anybody, either, in case somebody wanted to mess with us.”

“So, what do you propose? You want a bodyguard?” John suggested.

“Something like that. I wish I had a younger brother or something, who was really big and buff. Hmm… I don’t have any siblings but maybe I can create one using my powers!” Alex smiled. “Somebody I can totally trust with everything!”

“Oh wow! Very cool!” John shrugged.

Alex walked into the boy’s bathroom and he glanced at the corner of the room where the sink was located. Suddenly, he took a deep breath and he spit on the floor.

The small puddle of Alex’s spit changed color and turned into a small ball of flesh. It started to grow bigger and bigger, forming what looked like a head, arms, a torso, and legs.

“Holy crap! A baby!” John gasped.

“Not for long!” Alex smiled.

The little figure grew bigger and bigger until it was a full-size baby, laying in the tiled floor in the bathroom. It was sleeping, with eyes closed and slightly moving its short legs.

“Awwww… It’s so cute!” John giggled.

“Wait! Don’t touch it!” Alex warned. “I’m not done yet!”

The baby continued to grow bigger and older, with its arms and legs stretching out further and further as its head grew bigger and started to show a patch of straight, black hair on top. His arms and legs grew longer and became more muscular. His torso developed pecs and abs as he grew. He became taller and taller, reaching about 5 feet in height. The boy had deep, brown eyes and jet black hair.

The most striking think about the boy was his muscles. Large lumps of muscles ballooned from his arms and chest, and his quads inflated into large, thick pillars of muscles while his calves became as large as soccer balls. His arms were covered with veins and they were bulging with thick, hard muscle from his shoulder all the way to his wrists. Large triceps, biceps and forearms filled out his arms, making him look like a wrestler or a junior bodybuilder.

The boy opened his eyes and slowly got up from the tiled floor.

“John, meet Cody, my little, 9-year-old brother!” Alex said.

“Hey, big bro!” Cody said as he gave Alex a big hug using his massive arms.

“Uuuurhhhh” Alex groaned, feeling Cody’s tremendous strength.

Alex then waved his hand and Cody was instantly wearing shorts, underwear, and a red tank top with tennis shoes on his feet.

“Cody’s my little bro so I can totally trust him!” Alex grinned, as they left the bathroom and walked outside to the food court.

No sooner had they stepped outside or they found two big kids teasing a short, skinny boy, who was sitting all by himself at a table in the corner.

Cody walked over to the table and tapped on one of the boys’ shoulders. The boy turned around and gasped when he saw Cody, a short but super-buff kid with huge muscles!

“Leave him alone!” Cody ordered.

The two boys walked away and left the skinny boy alone, leaving Cody alone with the skinny boy as Alex and John walked up to him.

Alex then wondered what to do with the skinny boy as Cody and John looked on….
15311211.title: You help out a super skinny boy

choices: Paul enlarges the entire house in an instant!
Paul changes the old SUV into a sports car!
15312.content:
You think of your friend Kevin Zimmer, your incredibly smart and geeky friend from high school. In fact, you have known Kevin almost all your life, ever since you met him in elementary school. Shy, quiet but super bright, Kevin was always interested in math and science and giving back to the community. You were so impressed when Kevin met Mary, equally smart and geeky and just like him.

Kevin and Mary had a son together, and they named him Paul. Luckily, both of them did get the boy involved in sports at an early age. They tried him out for American football but they pulled him out since they hated the thought of their precious son getting tackled by a 300-pound giant wearing pads. So, they put Paul in soccer and gymnastics instead, and he has been flourishing in those sports ever since.

On weekends Kevin and Mary had been helping out at the Homeless Shelter for about two hours every Sunday, thanks to the church that they had been involved in. In fact, the work in the soup kitchen was right after the worship service and Paul had begun to enjoy serving in the kitchen. Paul was an altar boy in the church so he would spend his entire Sunday serving the community in some form or the other. Lastly, Paul was a member of his Boy Scout troop and participated in the scouting events every Saturday after soccer practice. This is what made Paul a great candidate to receive the formula and the powers which came with it.

You called Kevin and you told him that you had been working on a secret formula which would help everyone in the whole family but that you were most interested in having Paul take it. So you poured all of the formula into a container and you drove over to their house.

You sat in the nice, comfortable living room by the fire place as you explained the formula to Kevin and Mary. The house had high ceilings and wide hallways and rooms so there was plenty of room for the kids to run around and play. Of course, Kevin and Mary had a hard time believing your story as you told them about this formula which you had created.

“Okay, let me get this straight. You created a formula which could give anyone who drinks it the power to make anything he desires happen? Why don’t you drink it yourself?” Kevin asked him.

“Well, according to my calculations, the formula will have the maximum effect on someone who is still growing! I don’t want to give it to someone who is too young or too old. I think Paul is the perfect age to receive it because he’s a teen.” You reply. “If I take it, chances are that it won’t even work on me.”

“So… what if it doesn’t work? Will it hurt him or make him sick?” Mary wondered.

“No, but I’m very confident that the formula will work!” you respond.

“Okay… Let me go and get him.” Kevin said. “He’s in his room playing on his computer since he just got home from soccer practice!”

Kevin stood up and walked to the room. About a minute later, he walked out again, followed by a shy boy with long, straight, brown hair and bright, blue eyes. He had a friendly face and a tall, slender stature although he seemed rather athletic, like a seasoned soccer player. He wasn’t very muscular, but his legs were beginning to show some muscle development from all the hours of running on the soccer field.

“Oh, hi Mister James!” the friendly boy said, while he was still wearing his soccer shorts and jersey with his number 8 displayed on the front of his shirt. The front of his jersey also displayed the team name, the “Saints”.

“Hey there, Paul!” you chuckle as you read the name on his jersey. “How appropriate is that your team is called the ‘Saints’.”

“Uhh… Why?” the boy wondered.

You pick up the plastic container, which is on the couch next to you and you hold it up in front of you, showing it to the boy who is standing before you.

“I hold here the only container with the God Formula!” you say to him. “Now, I want you to drink it… All of it… And then tell me how you feel, okay?”

“Oh… Okay… Will it make me smarter so I’ll understand my math homework better?” Paul grinned as he took the container in his hands.

“Ahh… Very good question!” you smile. “Yes, Paul… You will know and understand everything about math, history, physics, astronomy, anatomy, biology, chemistry… You will understand everything about anything… and MORE!”

Paul stared at the container and smiled.

“Ooooh!” he grinned. “Me likey!”

Paul removed the cap from the top of the container and he then tilted the container as he placed the spout right up to his lips, gulping the formula down his throat. Apparently, he liked the taste of it, since he drank all of it in one big gulp. In about a minute, he finished all of it and set the container down, just an empty plastic container now, and not one drop of the formula left in it anymore.

“Ahhh… That was delicious!” Paul smiled. “Best fruit juice I’ve ever had!”

“So… How do you feel? Do you feel anything?” you ask the boy.

You can tell that Kevin and Mary were eagerly waiting for something to happen, although nobody was sure of what to expect.

“I dunno… I don’t feel any diff—“ Paul shrugged, while taking a step back from where he was standing, when I noticed something. It was as if his entire body was glowing a bright, white light!

“Ohmygosh! Paul?” Mary shouted. “What is going on?”

The light surrounding Paul was growing more intense! It was as if a tremendous force was entering his body!

“Uhhhh!” Paul moaned out loud as his feet began to rise up and off the ground! He was literally levitating about a foot above the carpeting as the bright light became so intense that you, Kevin and Mary were forced to close your eyes or turn away! Paul was practically becoming as bright as the sun!

That’s when I understood what was happening! Paul was gaining the powers of God! He had gained the powers of billions of planets, stars and galaxies… All converging into the body of this one, preteen boy! It was amazing! You can’t see because of the blinding light! As you squint your eyes in another direction, you see that bright light dimming rapidly, seen by the reflection of the light on the walls and the ceiling in the room around you.

You turn around and you see Paul before you, still levitating, but with just a faint, white glow surrounding him, making him almost seem angelic.

“Paul? PAUL!” Mary screams as she gets up and runs towards the boy, who is floating in mid-air.

“Whoa! What a rush!” Paul speaks, with his voice almost having echo. His voice seems to be coming from every direction! “Wowww…. This is intense!”

You and Kevin stand up and slowly walk up to Paul, where Mary is standing. She wants to hug him but she scared to touch him since he’s still glowing and levitating a foot above the floor.

“Paul? Can you like… land back on the floor?” Mary asked her son.

Paul looked down and descended, allowing his socks to touch down on the carpet again. She then rushed up to him and hugged the divine boy.

“Are you alright? Are you okay?”

“Mom! I’m feeling great!” the boy smiled. “I have never felt this good in my life!”

“So, did it work?” Kevin asked you.

“Ask him!” I reply. “We’ll find out!”
15312.title: You give the formula to Paul, Kevin's youngest son

choices: ...go see what Taylor and his son(s) were like now
...find someone else on his block to change
...do something to one or both members of the elderly couple in the duplex.
153121.content:
"So for my first trick!" Paul said suddenly, "I'll make this house bigger!"

To which suddenly the whole house was quite literally, larger. As in every single object, room, floor, ceiling, and so on was twice as big as before! It was as if the group of humans (and one young God) were in a house built for giants!

"What do you think?" Paul asked with a bit of a laugh at his silly joke, "I made you guys a bigger house!"
Kevin sighed a bit, "Paul this is pretty amusing, but your mother and I won't be able to do anything in a house like this."
"I know I know! I just wanted to mess around a bit!" Paul replied.

Now he snapped his fingers, and the house was back to normal proportions, but was far larger and nicer! It was luxurious! It had a large pool in the back yard, a tall fence, a Jacuzzi, a half-dozen bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a huge kitchen and dining room, and much more!

"There, now you two are not only living in a house worthy of the parents of God, but also you both are super-successful now. I'll probably be gone a whole lot from now on, mom, dad, so I wanted to make sure you both wouldn't have to worry about money! So with that, I'm off to be God!" Paul said.

Before anyone could say anything back, Paul had vanished! Kevin and Mary though, while a little surprised, decided to trust their new God-Son and let him make his own decisions. After all he had literally infinite power, so worrying about him getting hurt seemed a bit silly now. They figured they would see Paul again whenever he felt like coming home.

Meanwhile, Paul had, funny enough, only gone a few hundred feet away, to a small duplex building, where a man named Taylor lived. He was 33 years old, and was currently contemplating suicide after losing his job. He felt like he had nothing left in his life, as he looked at a long, sharp knife he had laid on a table in front of him, which suddenly he heard a young voice behind him, telling him to stop!

"Wh-what?" Taylor asked, turning around and seeing who it was, "Paul? How did you get in here?"
"I'm God now Taylor, and I read your mind because I know what you are wanting to do, and I'm here to make sure you don't go through with it. If you feel like you have nothing left in your life, let me help!"
Taylor, not quite getting what was going on, just tried to talk him into just going away, "Listen, Paul, there are some things that only adults understand, it's not for kids to get."
"I'm not a kid, not a normal one, I'm God. THE God in fact." Paul replied bluntly, "And so I'm gonna give you a new chance at life!"

Before anything further could be stated, Taylor suddenly felt the world get WAY bigger to him as he shrank! No...not just shrank, got younger as well! He shed 25 years of lifetime in seconds, suddenly ending up the same height as Paul was, now wearing clothes appropriate for his new age.

"Wh...what?" Taylor asked, in a kid voice he did not recognize.
"Ok Taylor, as God, I have your new life for you. I'm going to send you back in time, and then you're gonna spend every single day working out. I'll make sure you have everything you need to grow up big and strong! But you also gotta make better choices too, I'm giving you a chance to redo your life and make things right. Even so, you're the one who's still living this life, so I don't wanna have to do this again, alright?"
Taylor, having taken a moment, has calmed down and nods "Right, I understand! Thank you, Paul!"

With that, Taylor was sent back in time, and would start living out his life, again. As such, now things changed with Taylor no longer here in the present, the duplex apartment was inhabited by an elderly couple. The old lady of the pair saw Paul standing in the middle of her kitchen all of a sudden, a bit surprised.

"Oh hello dear, can I help you?" she asked politely
"Oh no, I'm good. I was looking for my friend, I guess I wandered into the wrong house." Paul told her.
"That's alright dear, thank you for being honest." she said back, returning to making her tea.

So now Paul decided to...
153121.title: A bigger house, and a new life for someone else

choices: Call Hope
Call Laura
Keep looking for other candidates
1532.content:
Although on the one hand you didn't want to risk making yourself omnipotent, choosing who to make a new God was certainly the toughest decision you've ever had to make. Eventually, however, you decided that a young girl would be the best option. Being well-connected around the community you were lucky to know a few girls that you could choose between.

The first girl who came to mind was Hope. Hope was 12 years old, still very sweet, cute and innocent. She was always impressive when she was rollerblading or skateboarding through town, and apparently was a good athlete in general. Her weakness, unfortunately, was in her academics, because she was always too dreamy to concentrate in class. She was always smiling and laughing, and had a lot of friends. In her spare time she played tennis, volleyball, and soccer. Apparently she was also a girl scout, guitar player, and avid reader. You liked her because she always made people smile, and because you figured that maybe with her dreaminess and imagination she could make the world a much better place.

Second, you remembered Laura. Laura was a rather shy 14-year-old girl who wanted to become a doctor. You knew her because you kept reading in the paper how she was always winning awards for her detailed knowledge of science. Unlike Hope, Laura was neither popular nor particularly good at athletics. She was, however, much more mature, and shaping up to become quite a beautiful woman. She had a boyfriend, Jack, age 15. You liked her because she reminded you a lot of you when you were younger, and because she seemed to have a kind of maturity beyond her years. On the other hand, you didn't know quite so much about her, as she wasn't as talkative as Hope and you didn't see her so often, because she was always studying.

After much deliberation, you resolved to:
1532.title: A preteen girl (age 12-14)

choices: Hope spends more time with you
Hope shows her powers to her friends
15321.content:
A short while later, you heard a soft knock on your door. Outside was Hope, dressed in a plain blue shirt, short white shorts and white socks, beaming up at you. She carried a pair of pink roller skates that she had presumably used to get to your place, and grinned up at you with her soft golden hair and pretty green eyes.

"Heya" she said "How are you?"
"I'm alright" you replied "Come in, make yourself comfortable."

With little hesitation Hope giggled and raced inside, tossing her skates aside and leaping on to your couch.

"Now are you sure you want to be a goddess?" you asked, trembling a little with excitement as you went over to the kitchen to retrieve the formula.
"Are you kidding me? Of COURSE!" said Hope "I'd LOVE to be a goddess."
"It's a lot of responsibility" you continued seriously.
"I'm the queen of responsibility" countered Hope "My mom says I'm the most responsible person she knows."

You chuckle a little as you hand her the formula. "Drink it" you instruct with a smile "This will make you all powerful, all knowing - just perfect in every way."
"Thanks!" she beamed, before slugging it down quickly "Hmm, tastes like orange juice. Woah..."

"What is it? Are you alright?" you asked.
"Yeah, I just feel a little strange..."
"I'm sure having unlimited power will take some getting used to. Go ahead, try it out. Just wish for something."

Hope smiled shyly and closed her eyes. Slowly but surely, she rose up off the couch and levitated in the middle of your living room.

"Oh come on" you laugh "You can do anything in the world and all you want to do is fly? You're an omnipotent Goddess now, Hope. You might as well show me what you can do."

"Well... let's see..." continued Hope "How about I remove all the disease from the world... done. All the unhappiness... gone. Corruption, gone, wars, gone, evil, gone, bullies, gone... hmmm, I'll probably think of some other stuff later."

You smile. Seemed like you had made the right choice after all.

"Try creating some stuff!" you said excitedly.
"Alright" she replied with eyes narrowed "More rainbows - let's have some dragons... mermaids... fairies... unicorns... elves... oh, and I'd like to be a princess!"
As she finished, a regal tiara appeared out of nowhere and landed on her head. As it did, her casual clothes were replaced with a gown of ornate silk which looked very comfortable.

"Just a princess?" you said astonished "You deserve to be much more than that! As a goddess I should think you ought to be physically perfect."
"And now I am!" replied Hope, as within the blink of an eye, her body changed from that of an ordinary human being to a perfect 12-year-old girl. You couldn't help but be in awe at how powerful and beautiful she really was. Her voice changed too, becoming sweeter and softer, and somehow an extremely strong, very pleasent smell began to fill the room which you simply couldn't get enough of.

You smiled broadly, fell to your knees, and bowed before the omnipotent girl. "You really are amazing, my goddess!" you exclaimed.
"You really think this is all I'm going to do?" she asked, raising your head with her amazingly soft hands so that you were looking directly into her beautiful gleaming eyes.
You were speechless.

"You haven't seen anything yet..." she giggled, knowing that this was the least of what she was capable of.
15321.title: Call Hope

choices: Laura makes some changes to her life
Laura wants to talk to somebody about it first
15322.content:
Laura groaned in the back seat of the family car.
"What's the matter Laura?" asked her dad, Ryan "Are you alright?"
"Just a bit sore after soccer practice" replied Laura "Even though I was on the bench half of the time... I'll never be any good at sport."
"There there - you're the smartest high school girl I know" consoled her mother, Stephanie "And besides, I think you played really well."
"Mom, we ALWAYS lose!" retorted Laura, her voice rising in frustration "This is our 14th consecutive loss, we've conceded 47 goals and scored NONE, and we haven't won a game, like, ever. All the other girls teams laugh at us because we're the loser team. Let alone what the boys think."
"Hey - I'm sure if Jack was here he'd say the same thing as we did" said Stephanie "He's such a nice boy, and you really did play well today, honestly."
Laura lowered her head and her cheeks blushed. "Don't talk about my boyfriend" she warned her parents. She wished her parents wouldn't take so much of an interest into her private life.

The car pulled up at their home, a middle class suburban brown brick dwelling near the bottom of a hill, surrounded on all sides by other nearly identical looking homes with large TV antennas. It wasn't the best area in town, and somewhat dirty, but it was a nice inconspicuous place for Laura to conduct her "secret" experiments. She loved learning about all aspects of science and doing her own research was the best part.

Laura hopped out of the car with some effort, due to her being sore from the game, on to the bare brown earth that substituted a driveway. She was still wearing her soccer gear, except for her boots which she had removed at the pitch, so she walked towards the front door in just her socks... when suddenly, her mom called out from the letterbox. "There's a package for you here, Laura! Looks like some kind of chemical."
Laura turned around. It was not unusual for her to order random chemicals she needed for her studies from the internet, but she didn't think she'd ordered anything recently. Nonetheless, she figured she'd take a look and see what it was. "Thanks mum" she said as she grabbed the container.

The next thing Laura did was go into the kitchen and make herself a snack. After having a bite to eat, she took the mysterious formula back to her room, feeling tired and worn out.
"Welcome home Laura" said her computer as she entered "Can I do anything?"
Laura smiled at her little AI bot in one corner of her desktop "No thanks. I've got to take a look at something."
"No problem" said the broken, synthesized voice "Just let me know if you need me."

Laura opened the package to find a plastic container of orange liquid, and a note, carefully packed away inside. First, she thought to read the note, and saw that it came from some student she'd met at a science fair some time ago.

Dear Laura,
This is a substance I've been working on for the last few years. It should, all going well, turn you into a Goddess. I figured you should be the one to test it. Please drink it and fulfill your destiny.
Thanks!

"Whatever" she chuckled "One heck of a prank"
Then, looking the container over, she added "This is pretty clearly just ordinary orange juice anyway. Oh well, might as well humor him."

With that, she opened up the container, slowly lifted it up to her waiting lips, and tipped it slightly. In slow motion the liquid inched closer and closer towards her body, time itself seeming to slow down to a standstill just a moment before the impact.

The next thing Laura knew, all around her was a bright light, as all the power of the universe and infinite power beyond crashed into her.

And then she woke up on the floor of her room, which looked exactly the same, only that the liquid inside the container was gone. Immediately, she felt different. All her aches from soccer practice were gone. Instead, she felt ... powerful. Like, everything around her was nothing compared to what she could do. There was a physical sense about her that space and time were bowing to her command.

"What the heck..." were her first words as a goddess, as Laura The Almighty stood up and glanced about.
"Are you alright?" asked her computer in concern.
"Yeah, I'm fine. Just uh..."

No way could this be real she thought to herself in disbelief. If she was a goddess ... what did that mean? It was scientifically impossible! Was all her science for nothing since she could now change the very laws of physics on a whim? Somehow it made the rest of her life feel distant and irrelevant. Regardless, here she was, the one and only ruler of everything for all eternity. She was the alpha and omega, the all-powerful, the queen of queens. In the body of a young teenage girl. There was no denying it - in that instant, everything was clear to her. No doubt was in her mind about that or anything else - she was a goddess, and all that ever was, or would ever be, was hers to change as she liked.

"Just what?" asked her computer, interrupting her train of thought.
"Just feeling a bit strange" replied Laura, smiling.
"Would you like me to call a doctor?" asked the computer.
"Oh no, I'm fine."

With that, she started to think about how she should start using her unlimited powers.
15322.title: Call Laura

choices: Laura goes to the library
Laura goes to the mall
153221.content:
"Well, I guess a few improvements to my life would be a good start" she said to herself.

Immediately her small house was transformed into a giant palace truly worthy of her majesty, with spires reaching seemingly to the heavens and all the luxuries only the ruler of the universe could afford. The walls were inlaid with gold, crystals and precious gemstones, and the rooms were a true testament to Laura's new divine authority ... each one seemingly more incredible than the last. In the very center of the enormous palace was Laura's bedroom, the most stunning room of the whole palace. The amber walls were decorated with unearthly art of the finest quality, while the room's furnishings were priceless specimens of craftsmanship. She put particular attention into ensuring her bed was the most comfortable thing in the universe.

All around the palace, the houses changed too. The very land changed so that her palace was at the top of a hill, not the bottom. All around, green gardens and springs came up from the ground, stretching for miles around the palace. Beyond that were expensive villas of those privileged enough to live near the immortal goddess and ruler over all creation herself, Laura. Whole populations shifted in an instant, the very course of human development having been changed by the presence of the teen goddess in that particular spot. The only thing that didn't move was Laura's school, but that too got an upgrade, now being the best resourced and most elite school in the universe. Anyone would kill to have the chance to go to school with Laura, after all, since 100% of the world's population immediately converted to Lauraism. Religious disagreements ended in a flash, as everyone accepted that Laura was indeed the one true goddess.

"Well that was pretty easy" said Laura "I think just a few more changes would be good though..."

Presently her clothing disappeared, replaced by something a little more befitting of Laura's new status - a stunning white dress with millions of shining diamonds. The socks on her feet were replaced by glistening golden sandals, golden armbands appeared on her arms, a stunning necklace materialized around her neck, and a crown of golden laurels popped into existence on her head. The clothing was all perfectly tailored for her body - which, in the same instant, wasn't really the same either. The young divine girl had of course made herself into an idealized version of herself - a radiant, youthful, strong, insanely beautiful goddess, so much better than the sum of every religious idol who had come before her. Even Laura was captivated by her own figure for a moment.

No longer were Laura's soccer team constantly defeated - instead, thanks to Laura, they won every game by a margin of thousands of goals. Her team were the top of the league and she herself had, of course, been offered placements in all the world's top teams. Not only soccer, but every sport imaginable - she now did everything from volleyball to karate to table tennis. No matter what she did, she was the best, always, and her teams always won. This was equally true of academics, as Laura awarded herself honorary doctorates in everything she could think of from every top university. Oh, and every science fair prize. And to top it off, she made herself student president at the newly-renamed Glory of Laura High School.

"Perfect" remarked Laura, her voice now sounding powerful and seductive "Oh and one last thing..."

Finally her computer disappeared, looking terribly out of place in her magnanimous room anyway, and was replaced by a human - a 13-year old boy. Laura made him look cute, with dark hair and green eyes, along with a toned body exactly to her liking. It was, of course, still her computer - implants in the boy's body gave him direct access to the internet, for example, and he could calculate things nearly instantly. Finally, Laura made a pair of small fluffy white feathered wings spout from the boy's back, adorned his head with a halo, and dressed him in a simple toga.

"You're called Archangel Luke now, and you're my second boyfriend as well as my chief messenger, ok?" Laura said to her new creation, smiling.
"Oh, uh, alright" said Archangel Luke, who was formerly known as Laura's computer. Laura also made Jake, her other boyfriend, understand and completely accept her divine decision.
"Great" said Laura "Well, I'm done with improving my life for now, I think... I wonder who else I can help..."
153221.title: Laura makes some changes to her life

choices: Laura goes to the beach
Laura goes to the town square
1532211.content:
"Maybe you could help some of your friends" suggested her Archangel "When I was a computer you told me you were going to meet them this afternoon for a study group at the library."
"That's a great idea!" said Laura, her face lighting up "I knew turning you into a boy was a smart decision. Now, to reward you..."
"There's no need to give me anything" interrupted Luke humbly, bowing his head "Being in the presence of you, my goddess, is the highest honor anyone in the multiverse could possibly have."
"Oh no, I am a just goddess - I will not allow those helping me to go unrewarded" decreed Laura.

With that said, Luke screamed as he was overtaken by a thunderous orgasm. His toga fell off his body, leaving him naked before the divine goddess of everything, while he could feel her awesome power work directly on his privates. Thick ropes of hot white cum shot out of his generously-sized dick as Luke's eyes rolled back into his head. The pleasure was mind-blowing as the angelic boy shot his divine seed all over the room, but the orgasm showed no signs of stopping, and the flow of the cum didn't stop.

"And if you think THIS is good" chuckled Laura "Just you wait until what I have planned for you and Jake tonight!"

Luke was rather too preoccupied to reply, so Laura left her room to go through her palace. Remembering her other boyfriend for a moment, she made it so that he lived with her also, and subtly buffed his body in a manner befitting his new status as the divine one's boyfriend - stronger, smarter, and generally sexier. She also made him the chief priest of Lauraism and gave him the power to have a divine orgasm whenever he felt like one. Laura herself was getting wet just thinking of all the naughty things her young teenage mind could imagine herself, Jack and Luke getting up to.

But of course, for a nerd, she had always been fairly lucky in the looks department. Most of her friends were rather more insecure about that, and could never seem to find boyfriends. Therefore she resolved to help them out. She knew where they'd be, after all.

As she was about to leave her palace, she ran into her dad. "Anything your mother or I can do for you, my divine daughter?" he asked immediately.
"Yeah - you know, I kinda want a little sister" said Laura "Could you make one for me?"
"Of course!" replied her dad happily, before racing off to his bedroom to screw his wife's brains out.

With that accomplished, Laura opened the front door of her vast and beautiful palace, and looked out at the wonderful gardens that surrounded it. Here it was sunny every day of the year, but Laura made it so that the lush gardens around her palace would never need rain. Nor would there be a lack of rainbows despite the weather. The whole garden, in fact, was at Laura's command colorful, graced with all kinds of adornments, pretty flowers and delicious fruits. It was a true garden of Eden, the most wonderful place in the world besides her palace. And she created fairies who would tend to the garden with their butterfly wings and magic powers, because she liked stories about fairies.

Satisfied with her gardening, Laura flew up, into the sky, soaring over her garden from above. She flew faster than a spaceship through the atmosphere, because as a goddess, ordinary physics did not apply to her. Nor did it affect her clothing, which remained intact as she landed, seconds later, right outside the library. Of course, she knew she could have teleported, but flying was much more fun.

Nobody dared to approach her as she entered the marble library building, which she upgraded as she went into it. The old, derelict brown building was replaced by an impressive structure of marble, like a classical temple to Laura's formidable wisdom. Not wanting her former scientific interests to be completely vain, Laura changed nearly every section of the library, which now comprised nearly every book ever written, numerous museum-like interactive exhibits, and other research materials. She changed it so that her friends wouldn't have to find a table somewhere, but that special rooms were now set aside for groups looking to study, one of which was permanently reserved for the library's new patron, Laura herself. And of course, to make things easier on the librarians, the whole thing was managed by a fail-safe computer, with small drones flying about returning books to shelves in their correct positions. In an instant, the library was transformed into the foremost research institution in the world.

As Laura walked into her private study area, she found all her friends were already there, waiting for her. There was Jill, a somewhat chubby girl with lots of freckles. Katie, an obsessive short girl who wished she could be taller. And Serena, who always looked lost for some reason and wore huge glasses.

"Hey Laura, wow, look at you!" said Jill in her usual bubbly way, though stunned by the glory of Laura's divine appearance "Got to say I love what you've done with the place. This new library is going to make our study group so much easier and more fun."
"You can say that again" said Laura, and in an instant all of the girls found their minds filled with all the things they wanted to revise.
"Oh wow, that was easy!" replied Jill "Oh well, guess that means we can all go home girls!"
"Oh no" Laura said forcefully "You're not going anywhere. You're my friends and I wanted to thank you for all you've done for me as well. Now I want all of you to close your eyes and imagine your ideal boyfriends."

All three girls complied with the wishes of their friend, closing their eyes and thinking honestly about who they would like.

Laura first focused on Jill, who she knew was imagining a boy with looks like a movie star or pop idol. She could tell that Jill was attracted to people who were famous. Therefore for her, she created a guy her age called Zephyr, who WAS a highly talented singer and actor. She made this guy live in one of the mansions beside her palace, because he was more immensely popular and wealthy than any other teenage idol who had gone before him, with the exception of Laura herself, of course. And the best part was, he loved Jill with every fiber of his being. Jill herself felt her body change, as her legs grew a little longer, her breasts a little bigger, her waist much thinner, her fat fading away... Laura left the freckles as they actually made her look quite cute now. And by Laura's divine will, Jill would never need to do anything to maintain her new body - it was just naturally that way from this point forward.

Second she focused on Katie, who was imagining...
"Uhm, Katie? Are you thinking of Jack?" asked Laura "I mean - you do know he's MY boyfriend, right?"
"Yeah" admitted Katie under her breath, very much embarrassed and on the verge of tears "I'm so sorry - I've just always had a crush on him and - well, when he picked you I was heartbroken. I've never told anyone. I'm really sorry Laura - please forgive me."
"Oh" said Laura "Well uh - I guess that's alright. I'll see what I can do."
So Laura set about creating Jake's identical twin, Jim. She made Jim an exact copy, adding that the two brothers got along really well, except that as Jake loved her, so did Jim love Katie. She even allowed Jim to have the same powers and the same improvements to his body as she had granted Jake earlier, because she hated seeing her friend Katie so heartbroken. Katie likewise found her body changed, growing to normal height and then a little more. She became quite athletic also, as Laura also knew her from her soccer team, and she made her eyes sparkle, a unique feature that set her apart and made her extra appealing to Jim.

Finally, she focused on Serena, who...
"Ok, are you serious?" asked Laura "You really want... ?"
"Yes" interrupted Serena without hesitation.
"You, uh, sure about this?" asked Laura.
"No doubt in my mind" replied Serena.
Laura shrugged and created the tiger Serena was imagining. Just a big, strong tiger - in fact, Laura made this particular tiger the lord of all tigers. To go with this, she made it so that the tiger could mate with Serena and produce anthro tiger babies. She also made it so the tiger could always understand Serena perfectly, and that nobody would question Serena's choice of boyfriend. Of course this tiger was attracted only to Serena, nobody else. She made Serena strong as well, so the tiger wouldn't hurt her accidentally. Her glasses disappeared as her eyesight became perfect on its own, while her seemingly "lost" expression was replaced by a confident, happy one.

All three boyfriends and their now-hot girlfriends assembled before Laura. Laura wasted no time issuing her divine command: "Alright - you can all open your eyes now!"

Just as she had expected, the boys and the girls immediately embraced. "Oh my gosh Laura he's so perfect!" squealed Jill.
"He's even BETTER than I imagined!" yelled Katie.
"You're the best goddess ever!" said Serena joyously.
"I'm the only goddess ever" reminded Laura "From now on, none of my friends will be lonely ever again. Oh, and I'm holding a pool party tonight. Everyone want to come?"
"RARWR!" roared the tiger loudly in affirmation, and everyone else nodded their agreement, not finding Serena's object of affection strange at all.
"Great" said Laura, mentally inviting Jake and Luke as well "I'll see you all then"

With that she left, pleased with how she had helped her friends. The only question in her mind was whom she would help next.
1532211.title: Laura goes to the library

choices: Go to a restaurant for lunch
Stay on the beach
15322111.content:
Laura figured some sea views would be nice as she exited the library. Once again the whole world changed to suit her every whim. Mountains moved, luxury resorts appeared, and a sparkling beach was just beyond the town, covered in a good number of tourists. Luckily Laura made the beach huge, so it never felt crowded, but not so huge that it felt lonely. The water was warm, glistening and inviting - and for good measure, Laura created a small community of mermaids who lived just off-shore. Instantly, the whole town was much more prosperous. From her palace towers, Laura would be treated to views of her bountiful garden, bustling city, and the ocean just beyond, signifying her divine mastery of people, land, sea and sky.

Once again she flew upwards. Just for fun, she created a small cloud, just so she could fly through it, smiling at the small drops of water vapor that the cloud left on her skin. She landed at the beachfront, suitably decorated with dune plants and palm trees, and lined with the most amazing shops, parks, hotels and restaurants. There was a small crowd there, going to and from the beach by numerous sandy access paths.

Barely did Laura have time to take the scene in when she was suddenly addressed by a small boy, only six years old: "Goddess Laura? Have you seen my mommy? I think I'm lost."
Laura smiled and knelt down so she was at the boy's level. "You're Andrew, right?" she said kindly.
"Yes my queen" said Andrew, bowing.
"I can tell you're very reverent and you always remember to worship me" said Laura "I like that about you. You're a good example for other kids, you know?"
"Thank you" said Andrew.
"And sometimes you get teased at school, right?" added Laura "What about that Ryan kid, he's always calling you names isn't he?"
"You know everything, don't you?" asked Andrew.
"Of course I do" confirmed Laura with a wink "And I know you'll use the power I'm about to give you responsibly. From now on you're a superhero, Andrew. You can fly, you can breathe fire, you can shoot lightning, you're super fast, and super strong, too. Also, you're the most popular kid in your school because of your wickedly awesome powers. Everyone will know that you're a crusader for all the things I stand for - love, peace and kindness to all people. In your spare time I want you to use your powers to lock up bad guys, and help other people too, ok? That includes others who are bullied at your school, too. Kids will know you as a role model, because I want everyone to worship me like you do."
Andrew was overwhelmed as his clothes morphed into a spandex costume that fit him perfectly. "Wow" he said "Thank you your eminence." And then quickly he reached his arms around Laura's beautiful divine body and pulled her in for a huge hug.
"You deserve it" said Laura "Oh, and if you keep it up, and do your best in school, I've got quite the girlfriend lined up for you when you're older."
"Andrew! Andrew!" called out Andrew's mom "Oh - there you are Andrew! I've been looking all over for you!"
Andrew smiled at Laura "Goodbye goddess. You're the best!"
Laura lightly kissed the boy's cheek, causing the young boy to immediately shudder with pleasure "I look forward to seeing how you use your powers. Now go back to your mom."
Andrew didn't waste a second, making a point of flying back to his mom to test out his nifty new powers. "Mom! Mom! You'll never guess what just happened!"

Satisfied with herself, Laura walked towards the beachfront, taking in the salty sea air. As she did everybody stood aside for her, not wanting to be in her way. They bowed their heads reverently as she passed, in gratitude to her for the much nicer lives they were now all leading thanks to Laura's changes around the town. The ocean was beautiful. Deep blue, calm waves, with lots of swimmers about. Suddenly Laura saw an older teen girl out at sea swimming all by herself. Laura recognized her - it was Anne, a cheerleader from her school, who Laura had never spoken to much. She was 16 years old, and looked upset about something, so Laura resolved to help out.

Her outfit, while it certainly looked like something a mythological goddess would wear, was not particularly well suited for swimming. As such she instantly changed into a stunning two-piece bikini, that did much to accentuate her natural beauty, covered with the most exquisite gemstones - notably, two giant fiery red rubies above her nipples. At the sight of the near-naked teenage goddess everyone on the beach would ordinarily have become uncontrollably horny, but Laura made everyone on the beach forget about sex for the time being. Regardless, the effect was pronounced, and heads turned everywhere in awe at Laura's smoking hot body and indisputably pretty outfit.

With that Laura stepped into the sea, which was just as warm as she had imagined, and waded out towards Anne. From some distance out, Anne noticed that her divine schoolmate was coming towards her, and tried to put on a smile, swimming a little towards the shore so Laura didn't have to come so far. Anne had a toned body, actually quite ideal for cheerleading, which she took quite seriously.

"Hey Laura" said Anne, putting on a brave face "You look - incredible!"
"Didn't you get the memo? I'm the ruler of the universe now, of course I look good" replied Laura "Now what's the matter with you?"
Anne sighed before breaking out in tears. It was pointless to try to hide her emotions from her divine friend. "David dumped me" she cried "We were going to spend a nice romantic day at the beach but ... he just said I'm too flat and too dumb."
Laura hugged her "I'm sorry" she said "That was really mean of him."
"Thank you" sobbed Anne into Laura's shoulder, comforted by the touch of a goddess "I couldn't stand to be out there with all those people on the shore so I thought I'd come way out for a swim. Maybe I could find a mermaid or something to comfort me. My goddess though is so much better."
"Giving yourself some space is a good idea, but I have an even better one" declared Laura "From now on, David will never find love again until you forgive him completely, and you really mean it. In the meantime, you're not dumb, you're actually ahead on all your classes. You're not flat - I mean, you don't have proportions like mine but I'm still making your boobs a lot bigger and stuff. And because of your enhanced looks and smarts, you're now vice-captain of the cheerleading squad. Second only to me, since I'm the best at everything."
"Oh my god Laura" said Anne, drawing back from the hug and feeling up her new body "You really know how to cheer a girl up!"
"I was actually just getting to the best part" said Laura with a mischievous grin "David's not the only boy you like, is he? You also have a crush on that new English teacher, Mr Green, don't you?"
"Uh..." said Anne, suddenly very embarrassed "Maybe. But he's a married man! And like 7 years older than me. It'll never work."
"Oh no!" said Laura in mock upset "Good thing I'm a goddess and can change all that for you. His wife is happily married to somebody else. He somehow managed to become a teacher at just 16, so he's your age now. And nobody thinks it's inappropriate that the two of you are in a relationship. He'll never dump you, never cheat on you ... he loves you totally, Anne. Oh and I've made him a bit taller too, since I know you like tall guys."

Anne was agape. "What... but I mean like... you can't do..."
Laura rolled her eyes. "Seriously? I can do whatever I want. You deserve it, Anne."
"Thank you so much" said Anne, totally stunned "I can't believe how kind and generous you are. You're just like ... wow! Perfect! I'm speechless! How can I repay you?"
"No need" said Laura "Now go home, your new boyfriend is waiting ... you're going to have the ride of your life! Tonight I've got a pool party at my palace, so if you'd like, the two of you can join me there. Trust me it's going to be great!"
"I can't believe I was so stupid as to doubt you" Anne sighed "From now on I'm dedicating my whole life to you. You are fair and kind to all people and just ... unimaginably great. I'm so glad you're the goddess. Of course I'll come to your party, and I know my boyfriend will too. You've blessed me so much in less than a minute. I hope you can forgive all my transgressions."
"When you're in bed with your boyfriend, that will be like a prayer for forgiveness" explained Laura "I'll make sure he produces lots of fertile cum, and the two of you will have many babies together. I know you really want them. Sleep with him every day, make him happy, because you might not know it, but Mr Green's former marriage was quite loveless too. Even his ex-wife is much happier in the new relationship I've put her in. You might find he's more like you than you know. When people really love each other, that's honoring me, because it spreads happiness through the world. So I'm making it so that every time the two of you have sex, you'll also find your skills as a cheerleader improve, and you'll become stronger and more agile, while he'll become a more creative, better teacher, just like he wants to be. So heed now my first commandment - go forth and multiply!"
Not needing much convincing, Anne raced out of the water as fast as she could run.

Laura watched her for some time as Anne ran off, smiling to herself. In the background she could see the young superboy, Andrew, showing his powers off to his little friends and giving them free rides in the air, all the while spreading praise of Laura. Satisfied, Laura wondered what she should do next.
15322111.title: Laura goes to the beach

choices: Someone else in the restaurant
Back to the beach
153221111.content:
Of course, as a goddess, Laura no longer needed to eat - but she felt like it would be a good idea to keep up some human habits, to stay connected with the mortals around her. Therefore she exited the water, her stunning bikini changing back to her regular clothing as she stepped on to the shore. Seeing two young siblings nearby having trouble flying a kite due to the lack of wind, she created a small gust right where the kids were, just for them and their kite. Both were overjoyed and cheered as their kite flew up into the air.

As she crossed one of the sandy paths back towards the shore, she saw an ambulance parked near one of the nearby resorts. Immediately she knew an elderly gentleman there had a serious heart attack. Channeling her unlimited power, she healed him completely in an instant - in fact, while she was at it, she decided that nobody else would be going to hospital today. She didn't like to see anyone hurt.

Ahead of her was a nice upmarket looking restaurant that seemed packed with customers - perfect, Laura figured, for lunch and meeting with people. She walked inside, and there she was immediately greeted by a waiter, before being led to a table specifically reserved for her. Laura ordered a large variety of dishes - virtually everything on the menu.

As the waiter rushed off to inform the kitchen of Laura's order, Laura looked about the restaurant. One table in particular caught her eye. It was a single mother with two pre-teen girls, both looking upset about something. In an instant, the whole room rearranged itself such that Laura's table was next to theirs. She leaned across and pulled her table over to join theirs.

"You don't mind if I sit with you, do you Margret?" asked Laura.
"Of course not!" said the mother, Margret "Your grace, you're always welcome with our family! These are my daughters, Holly and Violet."
"Mom promised us we could visit the library while we were here!" explained Holly.
"Yeah!" protested Violet "You promised, mom! And then you only ordered a starter for us! I'm still hungry!"
"I'm sorry but we just don't have enough time" she said sternly "We have to get back home by tonight and you both know we live a while out. And we don't have a lot of money! I told you I'll get you some food when we get home, I promise!"
"You always say you promise stuff!" whined Violet.
"I wanna see the library!" complained Holly "Help as Laura!"
"I'd be glad to" said Laura.

There was a pause. Everyone in the family looked at Laura.

"From now on I declare, this isn't how families are meant to behave" said the young goddess "But that's alright - I want you three to become my example of an ideal family. For a start, your lunch."

At this several waiters rushed out of the kitchen, bringing all sorts of delicious looking food and setting it down at Laura's table.

"Thank you goddess!" said Violet excitedly.
"But ... we can't eat this!" said Margret "This is your food, oh holy one! We are not worthy of it."
"No - Violet's got the right idea" said Laura "When I grant my divine gifts, I want you to take them. Know that you are under my protection. From now on, because of your faith, Violet and Holly, you can dine free wherever they like. They'll be perfectly healthy regardless of what they eat, too. Everything will be paid for by me. And Margret, the same goes with any other costs of caring for your daughters. I know you love them very much and your struggle to support them on your own should inspire everyone."
The whole family looked at Laura stunned and speechless.
"As for the library visit, I've made a few modifications to your car. Now you can teleport home, to the library, to the beach, to school - anywhere you need to go, in an instant. So you'll avoid the traffic and have lots of time to visit the library. Because Holly asked me - those who ask shall receive much more than they wish. Margret, I command you to allow Holly or Violet to go to the library whenever they want to. Holly and Violet will both become more beautiful and intelligent every second they spend in the library. Know that the library is sacred to me, just as your daughters have now received my divine blessing."
Margret covered her face with her hands in shame "I'm sorry my goddess. Thank you for blessing my daughters. You are right in everything you do."
Laura smiled and reached out to Margret "Hey, it's ok. I'm here to help you, too. I know you're stressed and feeling terrible since your husband died, right?"
Margret nodded solemnly.
"Well because you apologized and have turned back to me, I've decided to bless you too. When you come home, your husband will be there waiting for you. I'm raising him from the dead, Margret. And he has a great job so he can provide for the family. Both of you will now live long and happy lives together, because of your faith in me."

Margret was crying "You ... you ..."
"Hey, it's ok mom!" said Holly, with a mouthful of delicious food "Just take her divine gifts!"
"See, Holly's been paying attention to my divine word" explained Laura "For that, I'll let you have one wish, Holly. What would you like?"

Dana stood there, all sixteen pairs of eyes trained on me. Some were a few inches higher than others, given that eight of her bodies were seemingly hovering off the ground. Directly in front of me stood her fully hermaphroditic male and female bodies, and to either side of those were bodies, male and female, with each combination of sexual parts possible. She squealed in delight when she realized that two of her bodies had no sexual parts at all, and again as she realized that all of those that did had doubled up on their parts.

"Oh thank you thank you thank you!" she said. "I've always wanted to be a multi, and a non? I've never heard of anybody who was a multi with different bodies, and I've definitely never heard of a multi with a non body, never mind two. At least," she looked a bit confused, "part of me has always wanted to be a multi, and the other part of me has no idea what a multi is."

"That's because there weren't any multis before now, and you're remembering both realities. There are others now, of course, but most of them, as you know, have only two or three, maybe four, bodies. There's a man with nine somewhere, but sixteen is off the charts. And he's the only other person whose bodies are different, and all of his are male."

"So, how do you want me to thank you properly? Full herm sex, or maybe a double-teaming, or one of my non bodies could just suck you off..."

"Or I could just drown you in a sea of my own bodies," I said, and as I spoke, the hall was filled with trillions upon trillions of me.

155211.content:
You pick up your cell phone, almost trembling with excitement. You dial the number of your best friend and colleague, named Vincent. He knows all about your secret experiment and the ramifications of coming up with a successful formula which can grant complete omnipotence to anyone who drinks it. He works in another lab down the hall and comes over to your lab.

"John! You know what it means when the military finds out about this, right?" he says to you.

"Yes! That's why I want to test it on someone outside of the lab! Someone we can trust!" you insist.

"I can give it to my wife... But we're kinda going through some tough times right now. She's dealing with health issues and problems with her parents..." Vincent tells you.

"No... I don't want to give it to someone with emotional issues. It has to be someone who is stable and who likes to help others!" you tell him sternly. "Unfortunately, I don't have any family nearby..."

"Umm... How about.... Taylor?"

"Isn't that your son?" you ask him.

"Yeah!"

"How old is he?"

"He's twelve... But he's very mature for his age. He works part-time at the bagel-shop down the street on weekends and he has a paper-route. He's also on the soccer team at his middle school." Vincent explained.

"Hmm... That might work! Nobody will suspect a kid with Godly powers!" you whisper to him. "I'll come over after work tonight!"

The hours fly by. You have known Vincent for over thirteen years and you remember the day like it were yesterday when he announced the birth of his son. Taylor was this short, skinny kid with pale skin and brown eyes and jet-black straight hair. He was always quiet, shy and polite. He never said much when he came to the lab. He was intelligent and curious although he was also shy and timid at times. He was known as a geek at school and often picked on for being a bit of a nerd. He got into soccer because he thought football was too rough and he was too short to make it on the basketball team.

You drive over to Vincent's house and you ring the doorbell. Vincent opens up and lets you in. The two of you talk about the weather and about the news for a few minutes until the short, shy boy shuffles out of his bedroom.

"Taylor! Come say hi to Mr. James!" Vincent says to him.

"Oh... hi!" Taylor says, as he waves at you before he almost heads back into his room.

"Taylor! Come back!" Vincent orders. "Mr. James brought something for you!"

"Oh..."

The shy boy turns around and walks back towards you. He's wearing a cap, a tank top and shorts. The boy is probably no taller than 4-foot-8-inches tall.

"Hey, buddy!" you say to him. "How's going?"

"I'm good!"

"How old are you now?"

"I'll be thirteen next month!"

"Oh cool! Big boy, huh?"

"Yeah! I'm going to the seventh grade!"

"I got you something!" you say, as you pull out the plastic container with the formula.

"What is that?"

"This is the God Formula!" you say, as you unscrew the cap. "Here, drink it! It will make all your wishes come true!"

Taylor took the container and stared at it for a moment. Then he glanced over at his father for his approval. Vincent just smiled and nodded.

Taylor took a whiff of the juice before carefully taking one sip of it.

"Hmm... Yumm..."

Once he had a sip of it, he drank the rest. You and Vincent sit and watch quietly as the young boy gulped all of it down, to the very last drop.

"Man, I was thirsty!" he said, as he set the empty container on the table.

Vincent then stared at you.

"Did it work?"

"I don't know." you shrugged. "Ask him!" you reply, pointing at Taylor.

Taylor turned around and stared at the small TV set, which suddenly began to grow! The older device transformed into a flat screen TV which grew from a small 22-inch screen to a whopping 42-inch screen, right before our very own eyes!

"Ahh... Finally a bigger TV!" Taylor grinned.

"Whoa!" Vincent gasped.

"Yup! It worked!" you smile. You look down at the boy, who had just become a young, preteen God before your very eyes...
155211.title: You call Vincent, who gives the formula to his ...

1552111.content:
“Wow, this is so cool!” Taylor smiled as he looked up at you. “I can do anything!”

You look at Vincent with a grin.

“Dad, do you mind if I go to Jason’s house really quick?” Taylor asks his dad.

“No, not at all!” Vincent replies.

Then, suddenly, Taylor snaps his fingers and he vanishes into thin air! He teleported!

Meanwhile, a block away, another teenage boy is working at his laptop. He’s writing a paper for school when a familiar face suddenly appears on his screen.

“Ohhhh Jason, what are you doing?” the face says, looking at the other objects on the computer screen. “Almost done with your paper? Oh! You got a typo!”

“Hey! Taylor! How did you get in my computer? Get outta there!” Jason shouted.

The image of Taylor disappeared from the computer screen just as Jason’s cell phone beeped.

“Ohhhh Jason…”

Jason turned around and grabbed the smartphone on his bed. It has the talking image of Taylor on the lock screen!

“HEY! What the heck? Did you hack my phone?” Jason asked him.

“I’m everywhere! I… AM… GOD! Mwuhahaha!” Taylor laughed out loud before he vanished from the cell phone screen and appeared standing before Jason in the bedroom.

“What the--?” Jason gasped. “How did you do that?”

“You didn’t hear me?” Taylor said, folding his arms before his chest. “I can do anything. I’m God!”

Jason stood up and walked up to his best friend. His jaw dropped wide open.

“If you’re God…. Then you can make me big and buff, right?” Jason wondered.

Suddenly, Jason’s clothes vanished. The boy was standing before Taylor, buck naked.

“HEY! What the hell, Taylor? Are you NUTS? Uhhhh…”

Taylor didn’t respond. He just issued commands in silence as he looked on to observe the results of his handiwork.

Meanwhile, Jason was overcome by a powerful, tingling sensation all over his body as his muscles inflated all over! His calves grew into big mounds of muscle while his quads inflated into large, wide, and thick columns of power. Jason’s torso widened by two whole feet as thick rows and columns of abdominal muscles appeared over his lower torso. His chest expanded to make room for mighty pectorals while his shoulders widened considerably, giving him a very noticeable V-taper. Jason had big, thick wide vein-covered arms with hard triceps and biceps. Within moments, the skinny boy had morphed into a teenage bodybuilder!

“WHOA! Holy shit!” Jason exclaimed as he examined his new physique in the mirror. “Is this for real?”

“You happy now?” Taylor grinned, as he walked up to his bigger pal and rubbed his bicep.

“Man! I look like I just spent years in the gym!” Jason mumbled as Taylor made a tank top, spandex pants and cool work out high-top shoes appear on his best friend. Jason looked like a total jock now!

“Come on, big guy! Let’s show off your big muscles at the park!” Taylor grinned.

Before Jason could even respond, the two boys had teleported to the park where they normally played soccer. They just walked around there, approaching the familiar soccer field. They were bound to run into some friends from school or some guys on the soccer team. No matter who they would see, everybody would spot the new, improved Jason and Taylor would have more opportunities to use his cool, new powers!

John said to Jerry. ' Hi, Jerry... I got this formula that I want you to try out....or at least, a member in your family. It is supposed to give you powers like a god. Want to try it out?'

John replied ' Sure. Just be sure that it is in good hands.' and gave the small bottle to Jerry.

After work, Jerry went home to find his daughter Amy studying for her math lesson in school. Most of her household chores were done. And she wanted to have a break from it to improve her math. Amy was already a friendly student at school without being flirtatious. She just want to be helpful and kind.

Jerry asked his daughter ' Hello, Amy, how is Math? Is it still tough?' Amy nodded, feeling embarrassed that she could not totally understand it. She nodded ' Yes. I got a tutor in school helping me. My grades are better but still I am struggling to keep that C. She adjusted her brown hair that was in a ponytail as she talked

Then she noticed the small bottle and asked about it. ' Daddy, what is that?'

Jerry replied ' A friend gave it to me. It is supposed to make one like a god. He or she could do anything with it. Hey, maybe this can help you in Math and in school in general. Is your school getting more dangerous now. I could put you into a private school if I could just afford it.'

Amy smiled ' Well, it is not that bad here in school. Hey. let me see if this formula works.' Her dad, Jerry, gave her the formula and she drank it down. She looked at him and said " Now what?' sweetly. He replied with a smile ' Try understanding Math now.'

With a second or two, Amy realized that Math was much easier and fun..She exclaimed in excitement ' Hey, I understand Math now. Wow, Thanks Dad!' and gave him a grateful dad/daughter hug. Then her dad had to leave to help the mom in the kitchen.
After another 30 seconds passed, Amy could understand per-calculus too. But she did not want her dad to know yet. She quickly completed her math homework and went and finished the last of her chores--trimming the bushes. Her muscles was aching somewhat so Amy made the muscles quit hurting.

Amy then wondered what else to do with the powers. She was nervous about using it too much. After a minute, she decided to help someone in school. So she decided to
