1552212.content:
Amy thought about Ethan, the boy who started tutoring her in math and science. She realized that she really didn’t need Ethan as a tutor anymore, but she still wanted to remain friends with him. After all, she had started to develop a crush on the boy, who was twelve years old and in the sixth grade but who was in the same middle school as her. Amy realized that Ethan was very concerned about his mother, who was very sick since she had been diagnosed with breast cancer a few months earlier.

Amy closed her eyes, while standing in her own bedroom, and wished to be at Ethan’s house. Then, in an instant, she was standing in Ethan’s living room!

“Oh, cool! It worked!” she grinned, as she walked into Ethan’s bedroom.

Ethan was about average with black hair and brown eyes. He was always friendly and helpful. He was sitting at his desk, studying science.

“Hey…” Amy whispered, as she quietly knocked on the door.

“Amy! How did you get here?” Ethan said, as he slowly got up from his chair at the desk.

“Oh, I let myself in! What are you doing?”

“I’m doing science homework… It’s hard!”

“Ohh… But you’re so smart! You’re the smartest kid in the world!” Amy grinned. “You know everything about math and science! You should finish this in five minutes!”

Ethan blinked. Suddenly, he felt his IQ rise dramatically. Ethan became smart… REALLY SMART! He suddenly knew and understood everything, just like Amy had said.
“Oh… Yes, of course! Give me five minutes to finish!”

Ethan sat down and quickly finished all his science and math homework assignments, which now seemed super easy for him, now that Amy had made him into a total genius!

Amy sat next to Ethan as he finished up his assignments. When he was done, they stood up and they quietly walked over to Ethan’s mother’s bedroom.

“Your poor mom!” Amy sigh. “Don’t worry, though! She’ll get over this cancer thing really soon!”

“Uhh… Are you sure?” Ethan asked her.

“Yeah, trust me! She’ll get better!” Amy said confidently.

“Wow, that would be the best news ever!” Ethan said, as he led Amy out of the room. From there, the two of them walked back to Ethan’s bedroom where they sat together on the edge of his bed.

Amy sat down and looked Ethan right in his deep, dark, brown eyes. She instantly knew absolutely everything about him, including his deepest wishes and desires.

“Gosh, Ethan… You’re such a cute boy… With your cute, short, black hair…” she giggled.

“Yeah, but all the guys with blond hair are the ones who get all the girls!” Ethan groaned. “Not guys with black hair, like me!”

Amy quietly wished for Ethan to have blond hair instead of his usual black hair.

Suddenly, Ethan’s hair color began to change! It became lighter as it turned from jet black to dark brown. Moments later, it turned to light brown before it faded to a blond tint.

“Go and look in the mirror, Ethan!” Amy smiled, as she saw her tutor’s hair change color before her very eyes.

“AAUGH! MY HAIR!” Ethan exclaimed when he saw his reflection in the mirror. “I’m blond!”

“Yeah! Isn’t that what you always wanted?” Amy smiled.

“Y-y-yeah! I-I-I m-m-mean… of course! But… How did you do that?” Ethan wondered as he turned to face Amy, who was sitting on the edge of his bed.

“Ohh… A little magic trick!” she shrugged.

“No kidding!” Ethan shouted. “That’s intense!”

Amy then got up and walked up to Ethan, who was maybe four inches taller than her.

“You know I’ve always had a crush on you, right?” Amy asked him.

Ethan looked down on her. Did she appear to be shrinking?

“Uhh… You did? I mean… Really?”

Ethan looked down on Amy and smiled. Amy was such a cute girl. But, somehow it seemed like her face was getting farther and farther away from his gaze. Then, when he looked up, everything in the room seemed smaller. In fact, the entire room seemed smaller.

“Hey… What’s going on?” Ethan wondered as he looked around. Everything seems to be… like… shrinking or something!”

“Everything’s the same, Ethan!” Amy grinned. “Nothing and nobody has shrunk!”

“But… But… you seem… like… short…” Ethan said, feeling confused.

“That’s because you’re having a little growth spurt, my dear Ethan!” Amy giggled.

Ethan turned around and walked back into the bathroom again. He noticed that things were smaller now. When he saw his reflection, he realized that he had indeed grown almost six inches taller than before! Ethan was standing about six feet tall now!

“Holy crap! What is going on here?”

He walked back into his bedroom, where Amy finally confronted him.

“You always wanted to be taller and have blond hair… now your wishes have come true!” Amy grinned.

“But… How is that possible?”

Amy then walked right up to the taller boy.

“I’m a Goddess now… I can do anything!”

Just then, the bedroom door opened. It was Ethan’s father.

“Ethan! Your mother… has been cured of her breast cancer!”

Ethan and his dad then embraced for two minutes, crying as they held on to each other.

After his dad had left, Ethan hugged Amy.

“Thanks, Amy! I know you did that! You cured mom! Just like you made me taller and you gave me blond hair!”

Amy and Ethan hugged one another for five minutes, crying the whole time.

Finally, when they were done, they decided to get out of the house.

Where did they go?

15531112112.content:
When the bell had finally rung, the boys walked out of the classroom together and huddled up outside in the hallway.

“I got English class in room 107…” Sebastian noted, looking at his schedule card.

“I also got English class, but in room 201 upstairs. Oh well, no biggie!” Jake grinned.

“Aww…. I guess my class will be boring, then…. You won’t be there!” Seb sighed.

“Not necessarily! I have God-powers, remember?” Jake grinned.

“Yeah? So?” Seb shrugged.

Jake then walked up to Seb and he touched Seb’s forehead with his finger.

Suddenly, Seb started to talk…. But it was Jake’s voice that was coming out of his mouth while Jake himself remained silent!

“Now, then…. I will always be with you!” Jake’s voice spoke while coming out of Sebastian’s mouth. “I can see everything you see and I can hear everything you hear! I can make you walk, talk and do whatever I want you to, if I need it!”

“Whoa!!” Sebastian exclaimed. “You made me say that!!!”

“There! You’re my minion from now on, Seb!” Jake smiled. “But, don’t worry! I’ll tell you when I’ll take over your body. But, I can see everything you’re doing so I can still use my powers in all your classes because I’ll use them through YOU!”

“That is freaky! I mean…. It’s cool, but…. It’s freaky at the same time and--- I love you, Jake!” Sebastian exclaimed. “HEY! You made me say that!”

“Ha ha ha ha!” Jake laughed out loud as the bell rung. “Oh! I better get to class!”

Then Jake snapped his fingers and vanished.

Seb then walked over to his classroom, which was two doors down. He sat down in the back, just where Andy was seated. Ben sat down next to him. Ben was a member of the wrestling team. Andy was a short, skinny nerd with glasses and he was always very shy and timid.

“You better come up with that lunch money, twerp!” Seb overheard Ben growling at Andy.

“I… I don’t have it…” Andy whispered. Seb had just overheard it since Andy was sitting right next to him.

“After school…. You’re gonna get it!” Ben warned him.

Seb leaned in towards Andy.

“Dude, are you in trouble?”

“I don’t wanna talk about it…” Andy whispered back. “I think he’s gonna beat me up after school….”

Sebastian looked over at Andy during class when he started to notice some changes that were happening to him….

Sebastian was sitting at his desk in the back row of his English class next to Andy, the timid, nerdy kid, and Ben, the wrestler jock, who had promised to beat up Andy over his lunch money.

This was after Jake had made Seb one of his “minions”, allowing him to see, hear and feel everything in or around Sebastian’s surroundings, thanks to his powers.

“Andy, are you alright?”

Then, Seb heard Jake’s voice ringing in his ears.

“I’ll help your friend Andy for ya! Nobody will even DARE to beat him up after I’m done with him! Just sit back and enjoy the show!” Jake’s voice boomed through Seb’s head. “Andy will look and feel AWESOME in another minute!”

Seb then turned and glanced over at Andy, who had closed his eyes really tight as he gritted his teeth.

“UHHGGNNN!!”

The changes happened very quickly! Andy’s arms thickened with incredible muscle covered with thick veins almost right away! His biceps grew to big mounds of bowling-ball-sized lumps of muscle. His forearms were the size of bowling pins and his pectorals ballooned from his chest. As his arms and chest practically ripped his shirt apart, his shirt and jeans magically morphed into cool, black Lycra shirt and shorts covering his growing thighs and super-pumped upper body.

Next, his massive shoulders grew twice as wide as before as mighty lats and delts covered his shoulder region. Big, bulging pecs inflated on top, with super-powerful abdominal muscles forming over his wide, lower torso like a layer of armor. Truly, Andy was becoming SUPER RIPPED as Seb was looking on with a big smile on his face! Nobody else in the classroom noticed a thing! It was all like Andy had ALWAYS been a jock!

Finally, Andy’s thighs grew thicker and wider, becoming massive pillars of steel-plated muscle, bigger and wider than oak tree trunks. He had massive columns and cords of muscle running from his waist to his knees like those of the guys who run in the Olympics. His calves grew bigger and bigger until they were the largest of ANY other kid in school!

When the insane muscle growth spurt ended, Andy opened his eyes and looked down at his super-pumped-up body by raising up his left arm and flexing it, right in front of Seb’s face. A titanic 23-inch bicep quickly sprung to life, the largest muscle the boy had ever seen in a teenager.

“Whoa! Andy! You’re totally ripped!” Seb whispered to him.

“Holy crap! Wh… What happened?” Andy gasped quietly.

Ben looked over and saw Andy, all big and ripped with muscle. In fact, Andy was even bigger than HIM, now! His jaw dropped wide open in disbelief.

“Uhh…. Andy…. Dude…. I’m sorry about what I said to you earlier…. Forget about the lunch money…” Ben said calmly.

“Yeah…. Sure…”

There were big students, small students, older students, younger students, tall students and short students. Some of the students were nerdy and some were athletic. Bigger than bowling balls, Andy now had strength in his arms never seen or known at his school! His abs morphed into a 12-pack and from there into a 16-pack with large square stones covering his wide torso.

Large, thick, long cords or muscle spanned the whole front length of Andy’s mighty legs, making them thicker and wider than any human muscle seen by man. His calves inflated into massive balloons of muscle bigger than soccer balls. His calves were so big, that they rubbed against each other when the boy walked.

“Ohhhh……” Andy gasped as the massive growth spurt ended, leaving Andy panting heavily as thick drops of sweat dropped from his forehead.

Jake quickly morphed his clothes, so he was wearing bigger, adjusted, black Spandex shorts and a black tank top with white athletic socks and white high tops on his massive feet. Andy was also standing 7 feet tall following his massive growth spurt, towering over both of his friends!

“Holy CRAP!” Andy gasped as he looked down at his arms and his chest before he caught his reflection in the mirror on the wall. He was truly gigantic!

“Dude! You’re a muscle GOD!” Seb grinned as he stood next to his nerdy friend, who was now, without a doubt, the BIGGEST kid in school.

“Aww, man… I’m like… TOO BIG!” Andy sighed. “How can I walk around and be big like this?”

“You’ll get used to it!” Jake smiled. “Come on! Let’s get outta here so everybody else can see you!”

“I… I’m… I’m kinda nervous…” Andy uttered. “I mean…. Look at me!”

“Nobody will notice anything unusual, big guy!” Jake grinned.

Jake snapped his fingers and the three boys were standing in the hallway, instantly!

Andy noticed that he was the biggest and the tallest kid around, no matter which way he looked… Everybody was looking UP to him!

Right then and there, Tyrone, Steven and Jerome, three of the football players, walked past them. They were all smaller and shorter than Andy!

“Hey, guys…” Andy grinned as the shorter and smaller football players walked past him, all three of them having to look UP to the giant boy.

“Guys…. Did you see the LOOKS on their faces when they saw Andy?” Seb whispered after they walked into one of the classrooms. “They were scared out of their MINDS!”

“YES! It was classic!” Jake laughed. “They were so scared of our big man over here!”

Jake, Seb and Andy took their seats in the back row. Jake quietly made Andy’s desk and chair bigger, so that it was comfortable for the boy’s bigger frame. He was so happy with the way Andy looked now, he was determined to keep him that way for a LONG, long time!

John drove over to his friend, Jack’s house, who had his teenage nephew from England visiting over for a week. He was about to leave the next day, so Jack invited John over to come and meet the boy.

When John arrived, Jack let him sit down on the couch in the living room, when he called James inside. James was out in the back yard, kicking the soccer ball with a few other kids from the neighborhood.

“Yes, Uncle Jack?” the teen said politely as he walked in wearing a soccer jersey, socks, shorts and cleats.

“John, this is my nephew, James Weaver! He is from Plymouth, England!” Jack said as John stood up so he could shake hands with the British boy.

“Cheers!” James smiled politely as he shook John’s hand before he sat down next to him.

“I heard you’re flying back to England tomorrow?” John asked the teen.

“Aye! I need to go back! I should be back in school… I would love to stay but my mum wants me back, so I can return to classes…” the teen said sadly. “But, I like school, and football, of course!”

“I hope you’ll be back soon, over here!” John smiled.

“Oh, yes! I loved it here!” James grinned.

“So, do you do any other things besides football and school?” John asked him.

“Oh…. I also like rugby and cricket and I like to watch television now and then… When I have time, of course!”

“Do you like to help other people?” John wondered.

“Of course! I’m in a service club in school and I’m always helping out with chores and activities at school and at home!” James smiled as he shrugged.

“Well, I got something very cool for you!” John said as he pulled out a plastic container. “If you drink this, you will gain the powers of a God! By the time you arrive home tomorrow, you will be all-powerful and you will be able to do anything and you will have control over anything and anyone! All your desires and commands will come true!” John explained.

“Ohh wow… “James exclaimed as he held the container in his hand. “You want to give all that to ME?”

“Yes. Your Uncle Jack here says you’re very responsible and mature and he told me you could certainly handle all the responsibility! Is that true?” John smiled.

“Ohh…. Sure! I’m also in the Boy Scouts and I’ve been in leadership positions before!” James shrugged.

“Good… because you will need to make life decisions over the people whom you decide to help with your new powers…” John explained. “You may need to make decisions for them, do you understand?”

“Ohh… But…. If I drink this now, then will those powers start to work right away?” the boy asked.

“No, it takes about twelve hours for them to kick in. “John stated.
“That’s a shame! I’ll be in England, then!” the British boy exclaimed.

“Yes…. But…. You can always teleport back over here!” John smiled as he patted James on his back. “You’ll have God-powers, remember?”

“Oh! Right! Of course!” James chuckled. “I need to remember that!”

“So, go ahead and drink up!” John smiled.

James unscrewed the cap from the plastic container. He placed the spout of the container against his lips and he took one sip. Then, he continued and drank the rest of it, finishing the entire container. When he was done, he put the cap back on. He drank all of it in one, big gulp.

“That was good. It tasted just like apple juice!” James smiled as he handed John the empty container.

“Well, you will have God-powers in a few hours. Nothing will stop that now. Have a great flight and… Come and visit me!” John said as he stood up and walked out of the room after giving Jack and James a big hug.

“Thank you, Mr. John!” James smiled as John got in the car and drove back home.

Later, Jack brought James to the airport where the teen caught the plane back to London. He slept peacefully on the flight, not even thinking about the wonderful powers which had manifested themselves inside of the boy during the trip.

Several hours later, as James walked out of the airport, he realized he needed to take a taxi home. He silently wished he was back at his small flat already since he was tired from his trip. Then, in a blink of an eye, the teen vanished from the airport entrance and he materialized back at his own house in Plymouth!

“Whoa! It worked! I teleported! It really worked!” James cheered.

Then, James turned around and glanced at his suitcase. He bent down and opened it, looking down at the clothes. He waved his hand and the clothes were instantly folded and put away in his dresser and his shirts were all hung in his closet!

“Ohh…. I like having this power!” James grinned. “Now…. Shall I stay here and have fun with my friends, or go back to America and have fun over there?” the teen god wondered out loud.
1553112.title: James Weaver

15531121.content:
The next day, John went to visit his friend Jack from the university, back in the USA. He drove over to his house and the two men sat on the couch in the living room. John was the younger scientist, only 21 years old. He was the one who created the secret God-formula. So, Jack is about 44 years old, but his wife had divorced him years ago so now he’s all alone.

“Gosh, it’s all quiet in the house now, since your nephew left to go back to England, huh?” John said to him.

“Yeah….” Jack sighed. “I had so much fun with him…. It was great having a teenager in the house…” Jack whispered, when he suddenly started to cry.

“Ohh, Jack…. I’m so sorry!” John groaned.

“I hate the loneliness, John!” Jack sobbed. “It was so nice having a kid in the house…. I feel so empty now that James is gone again… He was here for three weeks and I had never felt so happy in my entire life!”

John hugged Jack for a minute when suddenly he looked up and saw a boy standing before him with his arms folded before his chest.

“James!!”

“Aye, Mr. John! I’m back!” the British teen announced. “I see that Mr. Jack is feeling a bit gloomy?”

“JAMES!” Jack cheered as he turned around and hugged the boy “How… When did you get here?”

“I teleported, Uncle Jack! I have God-powers now!” James grinned.

“Ohhh…. Of course! You can do all those things now!” Jack answered.

“Yes! And I hate to see you so sad, Uncle Jack! I need to give you something to cheer you up!” the divine boy added.

“Well, I think, now that I’m no longer here, living with you… How about John move in with you instead?” James suggested.

“Yes, but… John isn’t a teen anymore…” Jack noted.

“I can fix that!” James smiled, as he waved his hand at John.

Suddenly, John let out a soft groan. His clothes disappeared, and he was left standing there, completely naked! Then, his legs and his arms started to dwindle! His torso became smaller and he lost all his body hair. His face became younger and he became shorter. He now looked like a 13-year-old kid! Still, he had some muscle for James made him a bit more athletic than he was, with a toned chest and abdominal muscles.

“Hey, what did you…. OH! I’m a KID!” John gasped, since his voice had changed.

James waved his hand and all of John’s clothes, his books and all his belongings now appeared in the guest bedroom. John was fully moved into Jack’s house. John was now wearing shorts, t-shirt and tennis shoes!

“Wow! You made John into a kid!” Jack gasped.

That’s right! John is a kid again…. A thirteen-year-old teenage boy! He lives with you from now on!” James smiled.

Then, James turned to face Jack.

“I’m going to hang out here in America for a while. So, if you need me, just say me name! I always respond to prayer requests!” James smiled, before he snapped his fingers and vanished into thin air.

“Wow! Unbelievable!” Jack grinned. “He truly has become a teenage God!”

“Yes…. And we can call on him anytime!” John smiled.

Meanwhile….

15532.title: The Goddess is a Teenage Girl

info.brief_description: You're a scientist who has created a formula that can make anyone omnipotent.
info.description:
NOW OVER 10,000 VIEWS!!

****Now over 300 chapters and just over 1 year old with over 10,000 views!!!*****

Your name is John James and you had created the most unusual serum in the chemistry lab of the university where you work in southern Florida. You live close to the beach and you had been researching this serum for the last three years. Now that you believe you've completed it, you want to have someone test it.

Who do you test it on? You pour the serum in a plastic container as you ponder this question, knowing quite well that whoever will drink this serum will gain the powers of a god.

Story rules:

300 gift points awarded to good chapters of 50 words or longer, written in correct English, with no errors in grammar, spelling or punctuation.

Please, no vore, no killing of real living people, no gore, no gross details, etc. these will be deleted.

****I created this story because I got tired of adding to similar stories owned by other writing.com members who had either abandoned their stories, or who were too prideful to respond to my requests for feedback for my chapters. There are plenty of God-stories on this site but have you ever felt like the story owner just didn't care about you or your chapter additions? You never got ANY gift points for your chapters, you never received an email from the story owner thanking you for your efforts, you never got any feedback from him either, or the story owner has just vanished from the site altogether? This is why I created this story!


A HUGE THANK YOU to the following writers who have added multiple chapters to this story:
howlingsnail
yearends (55)
Moe (54)
skywalker7
The Author (66)

Have fun writing and email me if you have any questions.

Rex
rextorres
